361a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gugs par byed do// sngags 'das phan tshun du khu tshur bcings te mthe'u chung gnyis po 'khyud par bya'o// mdzub mo rab tu brkyang ste bkug nas cung zad bskyod par bya'o// oM badz+ra ro Sha mo hA kro d+ha sid+d+ha kar Sha ya hU~MH
361a3(rgyud 'grel): denas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yuM ge rnams bung ba nag po'i phyung ba me 'bar ba bzhin du bskum par bya'o// hU~M badz+rI phaT/ rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas khro bo'i sgra smyo ba dang / bsdu ba byed par byisam par bya'o//
361a4(rgyud 'grel): yang yi ge dngas mas rtse gtsug tu gyur pas so// bzlas pa s+yA sa n+d+he zla ba'i ra gi snying ga'i nang du bsgoms te/ thul mI sbyar nas dngos grub khrim sa r+b+ba zhu bar bya'o// sa~Md+d+ha badz+rA a b+hI ra yo sarba sa twa nA~M/ A
361a5(rgyud 'grel): med+d+hi ma pra yats+tsha d+haHde nas pad+ma'i d+h+r-ig rgyus mthab chen gnyis po bskyod par b+ha zhi / b+h+rUM thams cad gshegs gsol ba'i phyag rgyu dang / stegs ni/ oM si nA sa nA~M/ bi sa ra~M ba~M si ra/ grI ts+tsha gats+tshaHsarba da baud+d+hAn b+hU
361a6(rgyud 'grel): d+hAris mAdz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ nganas ring gi lus la cho ga byas te/ khro bo'i nga rgyal gyi yid kyis spyod lam mi bde bar bya'o// rim pa 'dis sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas myur du 'grub bo// de nas sngags pas dang
361b1(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba rje su gnang bar byas te/ sngon du bsnyen pas rdo rje 'dzin pa bsgrub par 'dod pas zla ba gcig tu thun mtshams gsum du stong phyug re bzlas par bya'o// de nas bco lnga la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas/
361b2(rgyud 'grel): tIng 'dzin la stegs par gnas te// ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas mtshan mo ril po bzlas par bya'o// de nas nang pAr s+thA ba rarA sa g.yo ba'i phyag rgyu 'bar la na sa kyi sa 'i 'i u pa bcom
361b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungaso// mdor bsdus pa yongasu rdzogs shing rgyas pa'i rim par gyur pa 'byung po 'dul byed kyi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dam pa thams cad 'dren pa'i 'jig rten gsum gyi rdo rjes
361b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogaso// // rgyu gar skad du/ shrI ma hA ka l-i sA d+hA nAM/ bod skad du/ dpal ldan nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs/ dpal ldan mgon po nag po chen po la phyug 'tshalo// de bzhin du sngon du gsungs
361b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rimA pa sku stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes la sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi mr-i la hUM yig nag po/ de yongs gyur pa lus dang ldan rje btsun nag po chen po phyag gnyis pa/ zhal gcig pa/ sku mdog nag po/ sbyin gsum pa/
361b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba chen po/ phyag g.yas pa dang / g.yon pa rig gis gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa/ mgo bo'i phreng ba'i ngo shal gyis sku la brgyan pa/ dbu sgo dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ 'jigs par
362a1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa dang / sku thams cad la sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ sku bong thung ba/ zhal nas khrag 'dzag pa'i bdag nyid du skad cig gis bskyed nas sngags bzlas par bya'o// de la sngags ni 'di'o// oM
362a2(rgyud 'grel): ma hA kU la hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ dug dang / khrag dang sgog pa dang / yungs kar rnams kyis nag po chen po'o spos phul nus sran me ma shA dang / dza ma bu ti ga dang / chang dang / me tog dang byug pa lnga'i lcags kyu'i bdud rtsis
362a3(rgyud 'grel): nag po chen po mchod par bya ste/ ga tor ma'i sngags 'diso// oM ma hA kA lA ya shA sA nA pa kA rI tI Sha pany+dzi ma hA lo yai i daM rat+na tra yA pa kA ri Ni ya ti pra ti dz+nyA sma ra sid+d+ha dA i daM duSh+TiM kha khe khA hi khA hi mr-i ra ma ra gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na ban+d+ha
362a4(rgyud 'grel): ban+d+ha ha na ha nA da ha da ha pa tsa pa tsa di ni me ke na mA rA ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ tsha ba gsum gyi bsgrub bya'i gzugs byas te lus la tsher mas dgang zhing dug dang ske tshe rnams kyis cho ga bzhin du byug nas me la bsro bar bya'o//
362a5(rgyud 'grel): gugadr-I gis ming+ga dang bcus pra de// de bzhin skad cig mthong mi 'gyur// slob dponra zhe sdang rtog khro gang // gang zhig dkon mchog gsum po dang // dbugra med sems can rnams 'tshe rnams// nag po chen pos za bar byed//
362a6(rgyud 'grel): de yi lus kyi sha gcod cing // de bzhin khrag ni 'thung bar byed// spyi bor thig le byas nas gus pa rgya chen po byas te bzlas pa'o// dpal ldan nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs rdzogaso// // rgya gar skad du/ ma hA kA li swA
362b1(rgyud 'grel): d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs/ dpal ldan nag po chen po la phyag 'tsha lo// dang por re zhig sngags pas rang gri yi dam gyi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis bdag nyid bskyed nas yi ges byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de
362b2(rgyud 'grel): la rim pa 'dris// nA mkha'i phyogasu pau yig yongasu gyur pa las pad+ma de'i steng du aHyig yongasu gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i dbu su hUM yig gI snga bon yongasu gyur pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ de'i lte ba nyi ma
362b3(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'i hUM yig bltos nas de'i 'od zer gyis sngon ma bzhin du bsgrub cing sku mdog la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i nag po chen po gad ni drings nas/ hUM yig las byung ba'i mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis yang dag
362b4(rgyud 'grel): par mchod nas/ oM AHhUM muHzhes pas gsheg su gsol lo// de nas thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom pa'i sngags brjod par bya'o// oM shU n+ya dA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ phyi nas pad+ma li A yig yongasu gyur pa
362b5(rgyud 'grel): las zla ba/ de la zla ba le hUM yig dkar po bltas nas de yongasu gyur pa las ral gri/ de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la hUM yig gis bon gyi byin gyis m+b+ha pa de thams cad yongasu gyur pa las/ nag po chen po sku mdog
362b6(rgyud 'grel): nag po dbu skra dmer ser gyen du brdzes pa/ klu brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ stag gi pags pa'i shel thabs can/ phyag bzhi pa/ phyag yas na ral gri dang / mchog sbyin mdzad pa/ phyagayon rtse gsum dang thod po
363a1(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa/ sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ drag po'i 'od zer can/ ljags bskyod pa/ zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can/ nyi ma la bzhugs pa/ de lta bu'i nag po
363a2(rgyud 'grel): chen por bskyed nas/ snying gar nyi ma la gnas po'i hUM gi 'od zer gyis sngon bzhin du nAg po rgyan po rab tu gzhugs par bya'o// slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gdun drangs te/ de rnams dang mU ma kI la sogs pa
363a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi sgo dbang bskur ba bsam par bya'o// de 'i su ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon gyi 'od zer las byung bya'i spyan mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis mchod cing bstod par yang bya'o// bdud rtsi lnga pas grub pa'i rim
363a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nyer spyod kyis de la gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// de la dbul ba'i sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta ka ya bA kA ts+tsha tA badz+ra naM/ na mo badz+ra kro d+ha ya ma hA daM Sho Ta ka Ta bai ra bA ya/ e shi mu Sha yau pA ra shu bAM sha he sta ya/ oM a mr-ita
363a5(rgyud 'grel): kuN+DA li kha~M kha khA hi khA hi/ b+han+ta b+har+N+Na/ ha ra ha ra/ da ha da ha/ gar+dz+dza gAr+dz+dza/ bi s+pho Da ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ ma hA ga Na pa ti dzI bi tAn ta kA rA ya hUM/ na myAHsa man+ta kA ya bAka tsi ta badz+rA nAM/ oM AHhUM/ oM mA maM/ haM tAM/ kaM kr-I/ ra ra/ ma hA kA ya
363a6(rgyud 'grel): bi go d+ha ke sha pan+d+he/ i maM pa l+yaM/ hAt+ta/ kr-ih+Na pa ya gr-ih+NA pa yaM/ oM daM ka ra ma/ ku ru ku ru/ oM AHhUM hUM/ sarba big+h+nAn bi nA ya k+She na/ oM ak+Sha ro mu khaM zhes pa la sogs pa ni ga tor ma'i sngagaso// oM AHmaM haM raM hUM phaT/
363b1(rgyud 'grel): t+ma/ zhes pa ni bzlas pa'i sngag so// dpal ldan nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs rdzog so// / lha ma sa'i sgrub pa'i thabs rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'di rnams ni dpal ldan sa sgra'i gtsug lag khang chen
363b2(rgyud 'grel): pobopor paN+Di ta chen po gau ta shrI las brgyud cing peN+Di ta chen po ka tsan tra'i zhal snga nas zhus nas/ slob dpon chen po d+har+m+ma pA la rak+Shi tA'i sku skyabs dang / dpon chen po kun dgu' gzhon nu dang / ma gcig pos sbyin bdag mdzad pa la
363b3(rgyud 'grel): brten nas/ de shAn ta ri yo gi grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis/ bya lo zla ba bcu gnyis pa'i tshes gsum la dben gnas dam pa chu mog khor yongs su rdzogs par bsgyur ro//
364a1(rgyud 'grel): klu dbang rgyal po'i sgrub thabs rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga byams pa'i sgrub thabs rnams bzhug so//
364b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ nA ge shwa ra rA dza sU d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i sgrub thabs/ rje btsun sgrol ma lA phyag 'tshalo// thog mar gnas khang nyams dga' bAr+ya kha
364b2(rgyud 'grel): gdong gdong dag par byas nas sten bde ba la 'dug ste/ 'byung po thams cad tshim par byed pa'i sngags/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM AMd+ya nut+pan+na tAd oM AHhUM phaT swA hA zhes brjod la/ oM AHbig+h+nAn
364b3(rgyud 'grel): takr-id hUM phaT ces badz+rod phyogs bcu'i bgegs thams cad bsal bar bya'o// des na byamos pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms sngon du song bas na mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad
364b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi don du sangs rgyas thob par 'dod pa'i blos rang gi snying gar hUM bai DUr+ya'i mdog lta bu las 'phros pa'i 'od kyis lus khyab nas/ rang nyid de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rgyal por gyur par bsam/ de nas snying
364b5(rgyud 'grel): ga'i hU~M las 'od 'phros pas/ mdun gyi na mkha' la bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rgyal po gtso 'khor lnga pa mdun gyi na mkha' la spyan drangs
364b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ phyag 'tshal ba sngon du song bas dngos su bshams pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod la/ yid las byung ba 'am/ mchod pa'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ oM badz+ra puSh+pa AHhUM zhes brjod pas me tog thogs pa'i
365a1(rgyud 'grel): lha mo sngon mos na mkha' khengs pa dang / oM badz+ra d+hU pe AHhUM zhes brjod pas bdug spos thogs pa'i lha mo sar mo dpag tu med pa dang / oM badz+ra dI pAM A hUM zhes brjod pas mar me thogs pa'i lha mo dmar mo
365a2(rgyud 'grel): na mkha' khengs pa dang / oM badz+ra gan+d+he A hU~M zhes brjod pas dri mchog thogs pa'i lha mo ser po dpag tu med pa dang / oM badz+ra nai pa t+ya A hUM zhes brjod pas zhal zas thogs pa'i lha mo sar skya ma dpag tu med pas mchod la/
365a3(rgyud 'grel): sarba bi shwa d+ha pU dza ma b+ha bA s+pha ro nas mu tre hU~M zhes pa'i sngags brjod la/ de nyid la rin po che sA tshogs dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dang / bla re la sogs pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rin po mu sna bdun
365a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis mchod par bya'o// de nas sdig pa bshags pa dang / rje su yi rang pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang / mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang / dge ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba dang / byang chub mchog tu sems
365a5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa dang / lamo brtan pa rnams bya'o// de nas ye shes kyi chags bskyed par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM sa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmas b+ha ba shud+d+ho haM zhes brjod pas/ chos thams cad spros pa med pa dang bral bar bsam// de nas su
365a6(rgyud 'grel): po nyid la gnas pas sems can gyi don mi 'grub pas snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyis pi las pad+ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yangs shing rgya che bar bsam/ de'i steng du chos thams cad mtha' dang dbus med par ston par byed pa'i yi ge a pa
365b1(rgyud 'grel): po 'od du zhu ba las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yangs shing rgya che bar gyur par bsams/ de'i steng du yi ge hU~M ming dpogs rin po che'i mdog lta bu las 'od zer 'phros pas klu rnams dang sems can gyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i sdig pa
365b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrib pa thams cad ngag nas hUM skad cig ma gcig lnga klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i skur gyur par bsam/ de yang sku mdog mi dpogs rin po che'i mdog lta bu sbrul mgo bdun gdengs pa'i rgyab yol can/ chos gos ngur smrig cen gso
365b3(rgyud 'grel): babadabu gtsug tor dang ldan pa/ klu thams cad klu'i skye gnas las thar bar byed pa dang / sems can thams cad ngan 'gro'i skye gnas las thar bar byed pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan par bsam/ de'i mdun du byang chub
365b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sku mdog dkar po/ rin po che'i myu gu phyag g.yas na bsnams pa/ g.yon na bum pa bsnams pa/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'o// g.yas su byang chub sems/
365b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' byams pa sku mdog dmar po klu shing gi mgo lcogs me tog dang bcas pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa'o// rgyab tu byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sku mdog gser btso ma'i mdog lta bu ut+pa la g.yon na/
365b6(rgyud 'grel): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku mdog dkar po pad+ma bsnams pa bac+doMs la lta ba'o// g.yas phyogasu byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang / g.yon phyogasu dgra bcom pa dpag tu med pa bsam mo// 'og gi phyogasu klu'i tshogs dpag
366a1(rgyud 'grel): tu med pa rin po che thogs pa thal mo sbyar ba gyen du lta ba bsam mo// de nas ye shes sems dpa' mdun gyi na mkhar spyan drangs la mchod pa dang / gsol ba legs par btab la/ dzaHhUM ba~M hoHzhes pa'i yi ge
366a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhis spyan drangs la/ dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dgyes par byas la snying po 'di brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA// oM ta thA ga to b+ha gaM bAn nA ga rA dze shwa ra a d+hiny+dzan a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ 'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas pas mdze nAd
366a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang / myong bar nges pa'i las tha~Mng zad par 'gyu ro// bum pa gnyis las gcig tu bac+doMs 'khor dang bcas pa'i sku gzugs dang / rin po che dang / 'bru sna tshogs kyis dgang bar bya'o// gcig tu klu nor rgyas kyi bu la klu chen
366a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyad kyis bskor ba'i gzugs bcug la rin po che sna tshogs dang / klu sman sna tshogs dang / 'bru sna tshogs kyis legs par bkang la/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi khor bum pa gnyis po bzhag la/ ba dmar mo
366a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyi 'o ma mgod pa dang / gdugs brgya rtsa brgyad dang / tshon sna lnga po'i ba dan brgya rtsa brgyad dang / a ka ru nag po'i bdug spos dang / spos dkar po dang / bdug pa sna tshogs dang / me tog dang / mar ma dang / lha bshos dang / rol mo sna
366a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pas mchod par bya'o// thun mong gi nor rdzas lo long sprod par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun du snying po rgyun ma chad par bzlas na dbul ba thams cadang bral bar 'gyur ro// sed dang / sar ba dang / lce 'bab pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bum
366b1(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis po yang 'og tu klu'i bum pa bzhag/ stang du bcom ldan 'das kyi bum pa bzhag nas/ gnas khang gi shar phyogasu gtar du sbas na phongs pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'gyu ro// klu'i gnod pa tha~Md dang bral bar 'gyu ro//
366b2(rgyud 'grel): khyim de'i skyes pa dang / bud med thAd dar bar 'gyur ro// cha re dbab pa ni/ bla ga bA med paSh+Ti sa phyogasu bya'o// char bcad pa nI bcom ldan 'das la phul ba'i me tog la sbyin sreg bya'o// sde'i gter 'byin par 'dod na bcom ldan
366b3(rgyud 'grel): 'das kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar rmi lam zhu bar bya'o// gtor ma gsum byas la gcig ni bac+doMs l-i dbul bar bya'o// gnyis pa ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la'o// gsum pa ni klu rnams la sbyin par bya'o// de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa
366b4(rgyud 'grel): ni bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o// de nas gshegasu gsol la/ thun mtsham su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa r-i re brjod par bya'o// de bzhin gash+ye
366b5(rgyud 'grel): pa klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon bdag nyid chen po klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM kA ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan lnga/
366b6(rgyud 'grel): pha'i pa'o// dge legs 'phel gyur cig// oM badz+ra satwa saM mi ya/ ma nu pA la ya badz+ra satwa tre no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho me b+hA ga su to Sh+yo me b+ha be/ u nu rak+to me b+ha ga/ su pa Sh+yo me b+hA ba/ sarba sid+d+hi me pra yauts+tsha/ sarbaM karma su tsi ma?
367a1(rgyud 'grel): tsit+taM shri yaHku ru hU~M/ ha ha ha ha hoHb+ha ga bAn sarba ta thA ga tA badz+ra mA me muny+tsa/ badz+ri b+ha ba/ ma hA s+ya ma ya satwa A swA hA/ oM ha phaT/ stong dang lha bskyed spyan drang dang / gdun bzhir byin brlab dbang bskur
367a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// zhes gzhan nas bshad do// gas sngags dang rig sngags thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo// rig sngags brgya pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa bshad par bya'o// gang zhig sems can don mdzad dang / sangs rgyas
367a3(rgyud 'grel): sras rnams thob bya'i phyir// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas// bdag gis rig sngags bsgrub par bya// sdom po gsum la gnas pa dang // shes bzhin dran par ldan pa dang // 'ophags pa'i nor 'dun ldan pa dang // sngags kyi rgyud//
367a4(rgyud 'grel): sde bzhi shes pas/ phyag rgya bzhi ljin snying rje can// tha bos shes yo byad tshogs par bsgrub// shes rab che ba stong pa nyid kyi don shes pa/ gci phyar can ma yin pa/ rig sngags bzlas pa'i tshe smra ba ma yin pa/ ma'i las la mkhas pa/ de ste
367a5(rgyud 'grel): sU bsgrub par bya'o// de lta bu la sbyin par bya'o// gzhan la ni ma yino// de lnga cho ga 'di'o thabs ni/ de la bum pa shin tu dkar ba/ gtsang ba/ cho ga thams cad tshogs bya ba'i rnam lnga'i dkyil 'khor shin tu gtsang ba dri'i thig le nyer
367a6(rgyud 'grel): gcig ga pur gyis byug pa byas la/ rig sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad yid la ma yengs par brjod nas khrus byas sam brjod na tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyams pa dang / bdag la mi dang mi ma yin pa
367b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bsam pa zhig par 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yang ma lus par zad par 'gyu ro// bum pa'i thub so// zhi ba la ni mang rA gsum dang 'o ma'o// rgyas pa la ni zas mchog gi gong bu dang yungs kar ro//
367b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang la ni yungs mar dang 'bras rnam pa sna tshogs dang nim pa'i lo ma'o// drag po la ni sha dang khrag dang dug dang ske tshe dang til mar ram chil gzhag go// rig sngags brgya rtsa brgyad pa gsum mam/ bdun pa gsum brjod par/
367b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// rig sngags re rI zhing rdza sa re re dbul bar bya'o// zhi ba la ni mthar swA hA brjod par bya'o// rgyas pa la aM/ dbang la ho/ drag po la phaT/ rig sngags 'di yis swA hA la sogs mi brjod pa ni 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i
367b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin las pa'o// til gyi sbyin sreg byas pas mtshamos med pa lnga nas nyes pa phra mo yan tshod 'byong bar 'gyur ro// de la rig sngags lan re zhing rdzas lan re dbul bar bya'o// de la grangs ni brgya rtsa brgyad pa gsum dbul ba
367b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// thu na rig sngags gcig tsam/ til gcig tsam thab tu dor ni yang sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur na mang ba rnams lha ci smos/ sdig pa 'byung ba'i dbang du byas pa'o// de la ro bsreg pa ni dong gi nang du chos kyi 'khor lo bri bar bya'o//
367b6(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi yi ge rnams kyang dgod par bya'o// shing brtsig pa thog gsum dang ldan par byas la/ stang khang la skar khung byas la/ ro kha nub phyogasu bstan la bzhag go// ro yi snying gar 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa/ ras sam gro ga
368a1(rgyud 'grel): 'am shing shun la bras te dgab par bya'o// 'khor lo la chos kyi yi ge dgod pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo'i// de'i dbus kyi lte ba nas gzungs thag bsgril ba drangs sngo ba mkhan gyis bzung ste/ chos kyi phyag rgya rig
368a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// 'di'i bsam pa ni rig sngags 'di brjod pas chos kyi yi ge rnams gsal bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi yi ge gsal bas dbus kyi yoM ge oM gsal bar 'gyur ro// oM ya shes kyi me byung bas phung
368a3(rgyud 'grel): po tshig pas ye shes lnga'i 'od zer 'phros pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa ni/ rgyud las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin mchod par bya'o// sems can rnams la bsngo ba ni/ dbang po lnga'i long spyod du 'dod pa lnga'i
368a4(rgyud 'grel): long spyod char bzhin 'bab par dmigs te/ de nas sngags mkhan gyi rdzas re re la rig sngags lan ri re brjod pas brgya rtsa brgyad pa gsum dbul bar bya'o// bsreg rdzas ni yaM shing lo ma can dang / mar dang til-i la sogs pa debu la
368a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bstod pa bya'o// bkra shis par bya ba'i phyir gong du bstan pa'i 'phrin las rnam pa bzhi char bya'o// de nas sngo ba mkhan gyis tshe thal ba dang / sems can gyi las gsum pa bla na med pa'i byang chub tu
368a6(rgyud 'grel): bsngo bar bya'o// de la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni/ bsngo ba mkhan gyis bskor ba dang / sngags mkhan gyis ro'i dbusu bskor ba 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i don du bskor ba ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum du bskor ba'o// lan bcu
368b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyi su bskor ba ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' nas rdo rje khu tshur du bskor ba ni zhi ba'o// rdo rje rin chen nus rdo rje legs par bskor ba ni rgyas pa'o// rdo rje chos nas rdo rje bzhad pa la bskor ba ni dbang ngo // rdo rje las nas rdo rje smra ba la
368b2(rgyud 'grel): thug pa ni drag po'o// de rnam pa bcu gnyisu bskor ba'o// gong du bskor ba thams cad de ltar bskor bar bya'o// yi gre brgya pa'i cho gA slob dpon pad+mas mdzad pa rdzog so// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI a dzI tA nA tha sA d+ha naM/
368b3(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ dpal mi pha ma mgon po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa byams pa la phyag 'tshalo// sa bcu'i dbang phyug 'jig rten mgon// byams chen mi pham mgon po la// phyag 'tshal nas ni rang dran phyir// de yi sgrub thabs
368b4(rgyud 'grel): ra bsdus bya// dang por re zhig sngags pas yid dang rjesu mthun pa'i gan su 'dug ste/ tshangs par spyod pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pas legs par gan par byas la/ chos thad stong pa nyid du bsgom mo// de'i ngang la pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du bdage nyid
368b5(rgyud 'grel): yi ge ma gser gyi mdog can bltas la 'od zer spro ba dang bsdu ba sngon du song bas byang chub kyi klu shing gi bum pas mtshan par bsam mo// de yang snga ma ltar sbyar te sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyang bas 'phags pa
368b6(rgyud 'grel): byams pa'i skur nye bar blta'o// de la 'phags pa byams pa gser betso mo'i mdog tson/ khru brgyad bcu'i tshad mnga' ba mtshan bzang po dang dpe byad bzang po yongasu dag pas brgyan pa/ brtson pa'i cha byad 'gying bag phun suM
369a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas chos 'chad dang / g.yon klu shing rgyas pa'i sdong bu ril bas mtshan pa 'dzin pa/ sku blta bas chog mi shes shing / rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phro ba
369a2(rgyud 'grel): ral pa'i cod pan mdzes pa la/ mchod rten gyi ni gtsug tor spras// tshangs skud dang ni phreng bas brgya ni// snying ga'i pags pa bsnams pa'o// de rjes mgon po nyid bskul ba// dga' ldan nas ni ye shes dgug/ dzaHhUM baM hoH
369a3(rgyud 'grel): rig pa yis// dam tshig lnga ni bstim par bya// de nas mchod sogs cho ga bzhin// byams pa snying rje chen po can// grub pa'i gsang sngags bzlas par bya// 'bum phrag bcus ni bsnyen pa 'grub// dngos dang rmi lam dag mtho
369a4(rgyud 'grel): la/ dgal ldan gzhalta me bgrod pa dang // de yis phyag mtshan gnyis mthong ngamo// mi pham rgyalnga tshab mthong gyur pa// de tshe de yi dri ma dag/ chu bos gros nas zos pa yi// ljon shing bzhin du 'bad med par// tshe 'di nyid
369a5(rgyud 'grel): la zad par byed// oM me tri mi tri ye swA hA/ sgrub po gang zhog 'phags pa la// dang ba ma dang 'gro la brtse// rtag tu smon lam yod ston pa// de dag rje btsun mdun du skye// dpal mi phim mgon po'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon ni ri ti/
369a6(rgyud 'grel): pas mdzad pa gnubs lots+tsha ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya maM tri ya sA d+ha nau/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pa'i sgrib thabs/ rje btsun byams pa li phyag 'tshalo// sngon du gsungs
369b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho gas/ stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes la/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil du bzhugs pa/ zhal gsum pa/ spyan gsum gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ nag po dang / dkar po'i zhal ni g.yas dang /
369b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon no// dbus kyi zhal gser gyi mdog can rab tu ser ba/ phyag dang po gnyis chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis mchog sbyin dang / klu shing me tog rgyas pa'i snye ma bsnams pa/
369b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyan sna tshogs pas rgyan pa'i gzugs can gyi/ byams pa mgon por bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o// khu tshur so sor bcings la/ mdzub mo mthe bong gi dbusu bzhag pa me tog gi rnam par byas la/ de nas sngags bzlas par bya ste/
369b4(rgyud 'grel): oM mo mai tri mai tri ye swA hA/ 'phags pa byams pa'i sgrub thabs rdzog so// / kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI bzang pos mdzad pa'o// lots+tsha ba byAms pa dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mai traM ya sA d+ha
369b5(rgyud 'grel): naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pa'i sgrub thabs/ rgyal ba byams pa la phyag 'tshalo// thog mar a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yo gau mau gsar gyi mdog cen las 'od zer 'phros pas/ bla ma dang / sangs rgyas dang
369b6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / rgyal ba byims pa nyid gtso byas pa yang dag por bkug ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ya kA ya bAk+Shir+b+ha pra na me na badz+re ban ta na ka ro mi zhes bya bas phyag 'tshal ba sngon du song bas/ oM badz+ra puSh+pa AHhU~M
370a1(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe AHhU~M swA hA/ dI paM/ g+han+d+haM/ oM badz+ra nAM pa t+ya AHhU~M swA hA/ zhes pas byin gyis brlabs pas mchod pa'i tshogs phul la/ de dag gi spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa dang / bskul ba dang / gsol
370a2(rgyud 'grel): pab gagadab pa dang / bsngo ba dang / sems ni bskyed pa byas nas/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms las tshangs pa'i gnas pa lags par yid la bya'o// de nas oM shU n+ye tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba smA ta ko haM zhes bya ba'i
370a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags lan gsum gyi bar du brjod de/ brdzun pa'i rnam par rtog pa goms par byas pa'i bag chags kyi dbang du gyur pa/ rang gi sems mig 'phrul mkhan gyi nye bar sprul pa'i seMn dang / snod kyi 'jig rten gyis rnam par 'khrul
370a4(rgyud 'grel): pi'i dri ma sbyang ba'i phyir/ rdul dang / khug sna dang / du ba dang / kha ba dang / sprin dang / sprin gyi grib ma dang bral ba/ ston ka'i nyi ma phyed kyi nam mkha' lta bur chos kyi dbyings mtha'i dang dbus med pa'i rang bzhin du/ phyi nang dang bcas pa'i
370a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa rnam par blta bar bya'o// de ltar yud tsam zhig rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin rab tu rtog po med pa na mkha' rdo rje'i ting 'dzin te/ de la gnas pa paM las pad+ma dang / a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
370a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi steng du/ yi ge me zhes bya ba'i 'od kyis/ phyi nang dang snod bcud mtha' dag sbyangs te/ thub pa skyes mchog byams pa ni// zhal gsum spyan gsum gyis rnam brgyan// de yi gdan ni pad+ma ste// sems dpa'i skyil krung gis
370b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa// phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par mdzes// bla mang chos ston phyag rgya yis// phyag gnyis dang po rnam par brgyan// phyag g.yas gnyis pa nyer bskyod pas// mchog tu sems can skyong ba po// g.yon phyag lha rdzas ya
370b2(rgyud 'grel): ga 'dud// klu shing me tog bcas pa'o// sangs rgyas sprin ni rab 'phro zhing // byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 'bar// dngos grub chen po mchog bsgom bya// de nas snga ma bzhin du mchod de// dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes pa'i yi gaM bzhe
370b3(rgyud 'grel): drangs nas/ dam tshig sems dpa' rang nyid l-i dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dong / bcing ba dang / dges par byas la/ dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab por bya'o// de'i rjes la sku gsung thugs kyis byon gyis brlabs nas/ rang
370b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyid kyis rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom par bya'o// de 'og phyag rgya bcing byas la// mnyam par gzhag par gsang sngags bzlas// lag gnyiso sor dag tu bya// khu tshur bcings te sngags mdzub gnyis// mthe bo'i dbus su
370b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhug bya ste// me tog rnam pa'i mchod paso// oM mai ma tI mai tri ya swA hU~M/ 'phags pa byams pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon thogs med kyi mdzad pa rdzogaso// // jo bo chen po dang / dge bshes ston pas bsgyur ba las dus phyis paN+Di ta
370b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po bud+d+ha shrI dang / gnubs lots+tsha bas dag par bcoso// / oM mu ni mu nau sma ra swA hA/ nyaM snying ngo // / rgya gar skad du/ sid+ha nA dA sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ seng ge'i sgra'i sgrub thabs/ 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshalo//
371a1(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig sngags shes pa'i sngags pa des/ brdzun rnam pa thams cad spang bar bya'o// dang por dus bzhin kha dag par bkrus te/ shin tu gnas dben par bris sku la sogs pa'i thad du dkyil 'khor
371a2(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ mchod pa mang po phul la stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ tshad med pa bzhi bsgom mo// de nas bdag gau snying gar tsam las zla bar gyur pa'i hri yig dkar por bsams pa'i 'od kyis na mkha' la bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub
371a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' gsal bar snang bar byas la/ yang de'i 'od 'phros pa las byung ba'i mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod la phyag byas te/ sdig pa bshags shing r+d+ha su yi rang nas/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu gsol te/ rgyal ba'i lam
371a4(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pas byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'od slar 'dus pa thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgoms te/ oM swa b+ho ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harma sA b+ha ba shud+d+ha haM/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA nA badz+ra sa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM zhes brjod do// de nas myur du paM las pad+ma
371a5(rgyud 'grel): dmar por a las gyur pa'i seng+ge'i gdan gyi steng du tsaM las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du hri las sang+ge'i sgra zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar po dbuskra'i cod phran can/ snang ba mtha' yas kyis dbu rgyan can spyan gsuM
371a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ phyed skyil du rgyal po chen po'i bzhugs stabasu bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yon gyi phyag mthil sa lo sbyar ba'i mtheb mdzub kyis ral gris mtshan pa'i pad+ma bzang po'i yu ba 'dzin pa/ de'i ngos su gzhan yang b+han d+ha dkar po dri zhim pa
371b1(rgyud 'grel): me tog sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i pad+ma'i yu ba can yod pa dang / phyag g.yas pa pus mo la brten te brkyang ba la rten par tri shul sbrul dkar pos dkris pa yod cing / bsam gtan mdzad pa'i tshul can dbu'i thad ka nas rigs
371b2(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i sangs rgyas 'phro ba bsgoms la/ snying ga'i zla bar hri bsams pa dzaH'od spros la/ hUM gis ye shes sems dpa' bkug ste/ baM gi dbang du byas nas hos dgyes pa bskyed par bsam mo// de nas 'dzab ni oM AHhrIHsi hA na
371b3(rgyud 'grel): da hUM phaT/ seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs rdzog so// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA kha sar+b+ba NI lo ka nA tha sA d+ha nAM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa kha ra swa pa Ni 'jig rten mgon po'i sgrub thabs/ 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshalo// gnas dpa
371b4(rgyud 'grel): par bde ba'i stan la sngags pa 'dug ste/ dang por tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom mo// de nas snying gar a'i zla bar hrIHdkar po bsams pa'i 'od 'phros pas mdun gyi na mkha' la b+h+ra ma dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'

372a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar po phyed skyil gyis bzhugs pa/ dbu skra'i cod pan can dang / snang ba mtha' yas kyi dbu rgyan can/ rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol ba/ phyag

372a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyer can dang khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsam mo// de ltar bsam gtan byas pa'i 'og tu bzlas pa ni oM hI swA hA/ 'phags pa kha sarba Ni 'jig rten mgon po'i sgrub thabs rdzog so// // rgya gar skad du/ tA ra de bye sA d+ha naM/

372b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlas par bya ste/ oM tA re tud tA re tu re swAhA/ lha mo sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzog so// // rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga pa ti pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA d+ha nama?/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i

377a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis gnas par gyur pa/ zhal g.yas pa pad+ma na ga lngar shin du dmar ba/ 'od zer bzang po 'bar ba 'phro ba/ zhal g.yon pa phag go gdong 'phro ba dang bcas shing mi sdug po/ mche ba rnam par gtsigs shing
377a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs su rung ba/ in+d+ra nI la'i mdog 'dra ba/ nyi ma bcu gnyis dang 'od mnyam pa/ smin ma bsdus shing khro gnyer dang ldan pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs pa rnams kyang 'jigs par mdzad pa'o// dbu
377b1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan rnam par s+yAng mdzA da sku mdog gser sbyangs pa ltar shin tu dag pa/ byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can/ ral pa dang thor tshugs mnga' ba bzhugs pa/ gra zhal yas khang mchod rten gyi dbyis

377b6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'i cho ga yid la gang zhig sgrub par 'dod pa'i bud med 'gugs par mdzad pa'o// de bzhin du ge ya su mA ri ts+yai bta tA li/ bA dA li/ ba rA li/ ba ra ha mu khi/ sarba duSh+TaM naM/ pra duSh+Ta naM/ mu kha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM/ lha mo sngar bshad pa'i na bza' dang rgyan

378a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshem par mdzad pa'o// de bzhin du rgyab tu/ oM mA rI ts+yai/ ba tA li/ bA dA li/ b+hai raM li/ ba ra ha u khi/ sarba duSh+Ta naM/ staM b+ha ya paM swA hA/ zhes bya bas lha mo 'di yang na bzla' dang rgyan lasau DI pa sngar dang 'dra med kyi/ 'on kyang phyag yas na rdo dang

378a4(rgyud 'grel): sha ma na ya ho swA hA/ zhes bya bas lha mo 'di yang na bza' dang rgyan la sogs pa snga ma dang / thun mongs kyi 'on kyang sku mdog nyi ma bany+dzar ka 'dra ba// phyag yas na mda' dang rdo rje bsnyems pa/ g.yon gzhu dang a sho ka'i yal
378a5(rgyud 'grel): gla bsnams pa/ sems can thams cad la rje su chags par mdzad pa bsgom par bya'o// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu me la stsogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dgug pa la sogs pa byas la/ ye shes sems dpa' dang dam

396a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil ltar rab dben pa// bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de nas skyon bzlas pa ni// 'bum phrag bzhi 'am 'on te drug/ 'bum phyag bcu yis las rnams 'grubo// rnal 'byor pa ni gang zhig gis// 'di don
396a3(rgyud 'grel): nyam su gang len pa/ thog ma tha ma med zhi ba'i// sgrol ma s+yA ma mchog nyid gyur nas// dngos grub gany+tsisa? sogs 'thob 'gyur te// yon tan dpyag med 'byung porA gsungs// de ltar steng dang snying
396a4(rgyud 'grel): rje'i bdag nyid can// srid pa gsum skyes zang nges shes dang ni// shes bya gnyisu med sku kun tu bzang mo spyod pa'i bdag nyid sna tshugs yum+b+ha// bcom ldan 'das ma'i sgru bo thabs rgyu du 'dzin ldeg
396a5(rgyud 'grel): par bkod pa las bstod nams dri mo med// bdag gis g+hang thob des nI 'gro ba maM lus rtag bde mya ngan 'odas thob shog/ lha mo sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs biN+ya rtswa brgyud pa zhesu bya ba/ slob dpon chen
396a6(rgyud 'grel): po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzog so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM kA ra shridz+nyA na dang / lo ts+tshab dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// // slad kyis rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta bAn shrI dang / da kyi lots+tsha bzlo gros grah+Na pra ban+do te gtanas
397a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma'i bstod pa la sogs pa bzhugs//
397b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hAhU tA ra sto tra na maHbod skad du/ dpal chen mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa zhes bya ba/ dpal chen mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshalo// zhi ba'i grong khyer 'jug
397b2(rgyud 'grel): la grong sgo'i mi mo bzod byas 'dru ba dang // rgyal ba'i lam du 'jug la dbyibs can mdun na gnas pa'i gzhung lam lta bu dang // shin tu bzlog par dkar ba'i bdud kyi rgyu las thar mdzad yang na gsang
397b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags lha// kho bo blo gros blun po 'dis ni dpal chen mo bstod bgyi ba ji lta lags// gang yang rgyal sras bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs 'dzin sa bcu'i pha rol phyin rnams kyi// khyod kyi yon tan rin
397b4(rgyud 'grel): chen tshegs ni gsal mdzad lha rnams kyis kyang glu len te// de lta na yang gus pa 'ba' zhig gis bstod lha mo bdag la bzod mdzod kye// mi shes byis pa yis ni rang gi ma la thal gyis mthor ram ci// mtha'
397b5(rgyud 'grel): ngag mi dbang 'dus pa'i gtsug gi nor bu rnams kyis btud byas 'dam skyes zhabs// gdugs dkar thig le gyen du 'bar zhing sa bdag khyed kyi 'dod pa yis ni 'gyur// rnam rgyas rdzing bur skyes pa'i 'od 'phrog
397b6(rgyud 'grel): can gyis gang la gzigs gyur de la ni// bcom ldan glang tshan seng ge'i gdan rta rkang thang mchog rnams rjesu 'gro// rang gi phyag gi stobs kyis nyer skyes rnam grangs pha rol gnon pas dgra rnams thul// 'bar ba
398a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po dkyil 'khor mchog gi phun sum tshogs gyur mi bdag rnams la ni// ster bar bsngags shing nges 'byed sngags kyi yul la mi dbang blon po'i blor gyur la// ri skyibs zab mor sa
398a2(rgyud 'grel): phug zab mo'i gzhi la rnal 'byor rnams kyis 'dzin par 'gyur// rab tu myos ma pad+ma'i tshal lam la ya rlung ngal bus g.yo zhing bskyod// 'dape ma rnams la phul byung bung ba'i tshogs kyis nye bar glo len me tog gi//
398a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung gnas ya mtshan mdzes mau khyod yin lha mo khyod kyi bsngags pa rnams kyis ni// rgyal srid 'bras bu 'grub mdzad 'gram rgyas rtsib logs myos chu'i mtshan la 'gro/ khyod zhabs bka' drin gyis ni rang dbang khang
398a4(rgyud 'grel): bi'i skyed mos tshal la yun ring du// rtsed mo'i spro l-i spyan mige drag tu g.yo zhing dga' mchog rnams kyis ni// zhal gyi pad+ma'i dbugs rlung gis bskyod bud med rnams dang nye bar longs spyad nas// de ni A sma sar pas bran
398a5(rgyud 'grel): las dri zhim sbrang rtsi rnams la 'thung bar 'gyur/ rab dga'i nags la me tog khur 'phyang myos pa'i skad snyan khu byug gis khyab cing // sbrang rtsis myos pa'i bum pa tshigs pa'i dar drir ldan lo s+yo ga'i dpal yin te// 'o mA'i
398a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho rlabs phreng g.yo bar bzhad gang ku mu do yi 'byung gnas dang // shol gyis sa gauzhi bla gab med par phul byung zla ba'i cha shas khyed 'di lags// bzo bos byas pa'i rtsed mo'i ra rtser bkod pa zla ba'i nor bu'i chun ni/
398b1(rgyud 'grel): bsrubs pas 'khrul 'khor chu srin kha nas 'thon cing rnyog bral lhung lhung sgrog pa'i chu// dpyid dus chang gis myos shing tshim pa khu byug skad snyan sgrog pa'i na mkha' la// sa sbyong gis sbrul khang pa dpe med pa la rab tu
398b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas mdzad khyed nyi lags// gleng chen mche ba gnyen la bzo byas skar khung du mig lngas 'thon bya 'dab la// gnas shing rnam par sgeg bcas skyes pa'i phug ron sgra snyan mgrin pa nas grag+na ste// nor bu'i rkang gdub
398b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu 'jam zhing sil khrol bskyod pa btsun mo'i dkyil 'khor du// sa skyong dag gi khyim la ti sI'i gangs mtshungs phun sum tshogs pa khyed nyid lags// nu ma nyer bzhag lag pa cig gis smad gos bshar pa g.yo ba'i
398b4(rgyud 'grel): mtha' bzung ste// rgyal zhing rtsed mo'i bde ba yun ring myos nas khar ba'i rdzing bu nas 'thon cing // skye bo 'dris pas skra rtse zlum zhing cung zad zur mig lte ba tsha ba'i dus// ri mo bris 'dra'i yan lag mchog ma rnams dang nyams dga'
398b5(rgyud 'grel): khyed kyi mthu yi su// zla ba'i chos las brdungs shing 'khrul 'khor khang khyim rtsed mo'i ri las bab// rab tu myos ma'i nags kyis nyi logs pad+ma'i ljon shing khang par swa bdag rnams// rgyun chad med par rlung ya ba dal bus
398b6(rgyud 'grel): gi ya b+ha pa yis ni dbuskra g.yo zhing bskyod// nyi ma tsha ba'i dus la khyed kyi bka' drin la ni nyin zhag 'da' bar 'gyur// mu 'bab sprin tshogs 'brug sgra sgrogs shing rma bya'i dkyil 'khor kun nas skad snyan 'don// 'dam skyes me thon
399a1(rgyud 'grel): la nI 'jam rlung rab tu g.yo zhing glu dbyangs chug tIr dus// spyan ngag mkhas pa'i dri zas bskor zhing 'jam zhing 'jam pos bsnun pa'i gting rnyings rnga skud kyis// khang pa'i nang rnams yongasu gAd+d+ha/
399a2(rgyud 'grel): khyed 'dod pas ni rgyun du thos par 'gyur// sbrang rtsi'i chang gis myos shing rigs 'dzin grub pa'i chung ma'i chu skyes zhal la btung byas las// lhung ba'i ban d+ha ra yi rdul gyis kun nas mdog ser ma pang mtsho las rgyal// lha yi
399a3(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer gzhal med khang gi lha mo'i skye bo dam 'khyud spro ba lo// khyed kyi mchog la sgrub pa po rnams bde nyid nyon rer NAM su myong bar 'gyur// sna tshogs 'gugs sngags phyag rgya'i tshogs sbrul rdo rje'i gur gyis me steg 'bar
399a4(rgyud 'grel): ba lA// 'gegs kyi gtso bo rnams ni skrag cing 'jigs pas rgya mtsho dag tu 'bros 'gyur te// myur bAr bskyod pa gtum po'i hUM yig sgra yis bsnun pas sgra ldan lcags sgrog gtor// lha mo khyod kyi gas skyugs zlos bya'i khang par
399a5(rgyud 'grel): rang nyid 'du zhing 'ong bar 'gyur// gar gnas khang sa'i sbyor la glu dbyangs 'du sar rab brdung gau ting ring rnga skad kyis// 'dris shing yid 'ong gling bu'i rjes 'gro'i sgra dbyangs nye bar longs spyod mdzad nas ni// de rjes grwa tshoms bung
399a6(rgyud 'grel): ba me tog snyam par gar gyi cho ga yid 'phrog la// rab tu myos pa rnams kyis khyed nyid gar gyi dpon por nges par gar gyi lha// rgyun chad med par lag pa'i rtsol ba'i bya bas bsnun pa'i yod 'ong rdza rnga'i bzhin// g.yer ga'i sgra
399b1(rgyud 'grel): yis myur bar rnam rol 'degs shing rma bya'i mjug sgro rnam par btsugs// rnam pa sna tshogs mkhas shing yid 'ong snod ldan skye bos yongs gang khang khyim la// khyed la bsten pas glu dbyangs bde ba nyin rer bde la
399b2(rgyud 'grel): long spyod 'gyur// rgyal mtshan dang ni gdugs dkar seng ge'i gdan dang gser gyi bum pa rnga yab dang // zla zer dkar ba'i bsil khang mgyogs 'gro'i phreng ba dri zhim chang ldan glang chen rnams// khyed kyi gzugs brnyan rtag
399b3(rgyud 'grel): tu dran byed bud med de yis rna lung rin chen 'od// lha mo cung zad bzhad pa'i rnam pas rnam par rgyal bar dri ma thag tu 'gyur// skad snyan ngang pa'i dbyangs ni mchog tu 'gying 'gro nar bu'i rkang gdub sgra yis pAma?// 'grim logs
399b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'jam rlung gis gdar g.yo zhing 'khyil ba'i sgra yis mdud pa 'byed// rkeng rmad mngoms kyi cha ni 'od 'phro'i dro shal nu ma'i khur bu'i ljid kyis bdud// lha mos gang la gzigs pa de la rnga ya ba dkar 'dzin bud med 'du
399b5(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur/ rgyun mi 'chad par lha mo khyod kyi yon rjes dran mi skyo gang yin te// nor bu'i rang bzhin zhal ba'i gzhi mer zla zer lo 'deb rnams lha 'gying ba yis// nu mAr lag gcig nyer bzhag bud med skye bo dag gi bzung ba'i ga
399b6(rgyud 'grel): bur chu// kha 'bus uta pal sngon po dri ldan sbrang rtsi 'thungs 'gyur mi 'jigs sbyin pa skye// mo btsun rnams kyi 'gram pa'i logs la rna rgyan mchog tu 'gying zhing rgod// spyan mig la yang khro ba soms bskyed pa'i mchi ma'i chu/
400a1(rgyud 'grel): yis dpa' rlabs g.yo// mkhregs shing 'bur ba nu ma so ma'i tshogs la gur gum 'dam gyi kha dog ser// rab rib sngon po dbu skra me tog kha 'bus tshogs la'ang mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur// sprul byas
400a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma ra ga'i stegs la 'gre ldog 'gyur ba lha mo'i skye bo las// sprul te gcal bkram mu tig do shal gyis khyab rin chen ljon shing khang po'i nang // des lhung me tog rdul gyis kun nas yongs sgos dga' ba'i sa yi dkyil
400a3(rgyud 'grel): ra la// bcom ldan 'das me khyed kyi zhabs zung mchod byed ga po de yun ring gnas par 'gyur// skad cig re rer rnga ring rdza rnga mtha' dag brdungs pa'i sgra yis rkang pa 'gying // glang po 'dzangs pa'i spyi la lag pa'i rna lcags rab
400a4(rgyud 'grel): 'god phyed btsums mig/ a mra sa ro bran dri zhim 'bab cing 'grom pa'i dkyil 'khor dri ldan glang chen rnams// bcom ldan 'das ma mi gang yud tsam dran byed la 'du bar 'gyur// spyi bo phug pas steng du'abur te rna ba'i rnga yab dang ni lcag+sas
400a5(rgyud 'grel): kyu g.yo// rkang pa srung byed rnams kyi rnam mang ca co'i bde bas chu thig gzer ma 'thor// bar du rgol ba'i glang chen chang gis khong 'khrugs khyed mtshan grags pa las// glang mo mi rnams g.yul 'byed pa na dgra bo'i sgrib pa rnams kyi sna
400a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrib par 'gyur// gser gyi rang bzhin ri yis skyibs dang lha yi skyed mos tshal gyi khang pa dang // mjug sgo rnam par rgyas pa'i rma bya rtse mor gnas pas bdag khang pa dang // nam mkha' chu bo'i rlabs kyis byas pa dri mede rin chen ljon shing
400b1(rgyud 'grel): khakhyang pa dang // bud med skye bo'i zhal gyi pud+ma'i 'byung gnas la yang gnas mdzad khyed nyid do// pad+ma'i sgo mA sbrang rtsi'i khu ba'i chang gi btung ba sred cing skor// sbrang bu'i tshogs pas dar dir mang ldan me tog tshogs pa'i dri
400b2(rgyud 'grel): zhim ldan// ngang pa'i rgyal po rab dgu'i tshogs kyis zos te pad+ma gzhon nus mche bo gtsigs// lha mi ze 'bru'i rdul gyi mdog ser rlabs ldan rdzing ldan yun ring gnas par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das mA rgyal ba dkon mchog cod
400b3(rgyud 'grel): pan spyi bor ldan pa pad+mo'i rigs// khyod nyid kun don mdzad par lha rnams kyis kyang bstod de mang po smras mod kyi// de slad lha mo khyod kyis bstod pa 'di yis mchog tu dge ba bdag gis kyang // gang tho ba de yis 'gro ba khyad gsod
400b4(rgyud 'grel): dbul ba'i 'jigs pa zhi bar shog/ bir+N+Na ta chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa'i dpal chen mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa rdzogaso// // paN+Di taM chen po rgyal ba'i snyan gyi zhal sta nas/ lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyi
400b5(rgyud 'grel): lots+tsha ba blo gros rgyal pos bsgyur ba las cung zad dag par byaso// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA ra sto tra da sha d+hI gA thA/ bod skad du/ 'phaTam sgrol mA la bstod pa tshi gsu bcad pa bcu gnyis pa/ rje btsun ma 'phags
400b6(rgyud 'grel): ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// bzlog dka'i srid pa'i mun pa ni// 'joms byed nyi ma'i 'od dang mtshungs// thugs rjes brlan pa'i thugs mnga' ba'i// sgrol ma la ni rtag tu 'dud // shin tu rmongs pa'i sems can
401a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ glang po che rnams gsong byed ma// lha mo seng ge khros pa yang // khyod 'dud pA las 'jigs shing bros// mche ba'i mdungs rtse rtse mo yis// brag 'joms shing drung rtsa ba 'don// khyod
401a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi sngags kyi bzlas pa las// 'jigs shing glang po 'bros par 'gyur// phyogs dang na mkha' mo lus pa'i// du bas khyab cing bzod par dka'// 'bar ba yis ni khro tshog pa// khyod stong char pa me zhir 'gyur// ma lus
401a3(rgyud 'grel): gdengs ka las byung ba'i// phaT sgra sgrog cing dug mig can// sbrul ni lha mo khyod bstod pas// na mkha' lding ni bzhin du 'jom so// ral gris gcod pa'i 'gro ba rnams// khrag gis yan lag bskus pa ste// khyod ni ming tsam dran pa yI/
401a4(rgyud 'grel): chom rkun nus pa med par 'gyur// rgyal po khros pa'i bran rnams kyis// skra nas bzung nas zhags pas bcings// btson+da ra s+pha nA lha mo kye// khyod la bstod byed 'jigs med 'gyur// dpa' rlabs tshogs ni na mkha' dang // phyogs bcur
401a5(rgyud 'grel): yang ni khyab byed pa// grub lag na yang rgya mtsho las// khyod kyis 'phangs nas pha rol phyin// khrag dang klad pa'i 'dam gyis byugs// de dag bza' ba la chags pa// lha mo khyod kyi sngags bzlas pas// sha zla de dag
401a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs par 'gyur// yan lag chad cing dri ngan pa'i// khrag dang zhag ni sna la 'dzag/ khyod ni dran pa tsam gyis ni// mdze can 'dod pa'i lhar 'drar 'gyur// bkres skom gyis gdungs gcer bu dang // slong ba'i yi
401b1(rgyud 'grel): dgas 'gro ba la// khyod la 'dud pa tsam gyis ni// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// 'jigs pa chen po 'jigs med pa// de ltar dad pas khyod bstod pas// dge ba gang bsags de yis ni// 'jig rten pad
401b2(rgyud 'grel): byAd pa tsa na thob shog/ rje btsun 'phags mA sgrol ma la bstod pa slob dpon tsan+d+ra gai mis mdzad pa mdzad pa/ tshigasu bcad pa bcu gnyis pa rdzogaso// rgya kar skad du/ Ar+ya ta rAsto traM bi sa kAr+m+ma sA d+ha nA ma/
401b3(rgyud 'grel): bong+ga skad du/ 'phags mya sgrol ma'i bstod pa phrin las sgrub pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma sgrolA ma la phyag 'tshalo// trAM y+r-ig ljang gu ut+pa la las byung ba'i// sku mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis me// phyag
401b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis sku la rin chen sna tshogs spras// yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// don grub la sogs rigs lngas dbu brgyan cing // bcu drug l-i lon bzhin dang ldan// gzi brjid bzod dka' sna tshogs lhag par
401b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dud/ yi dam sgrol ma lha laM phyag 'tshul bstod// phyag g.yas mchog sbyin phyag g.yon ut+pal 'dzin// sna tshogs pad+ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum tshul gyis rab tu bzhugs
401b6(rgyud 'grel): yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshol bstod// thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro lo rtag tu gzigs// sku la 'jigs pa brgyad skyobs sgrol ma 'phro// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal kun las sgrol byed pa'i// yi dam
402a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma lha lha phyag 'tshal bstod// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang drag po dang // las tshogs thams cad myur du grub mdzad ma// phrin las thams cad yongasu grub byed pa'i// yi dam
402a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// seng ge glang chen me sbrul+ya chomya rkun dang // lcags sgrog chu dang bgegs dang 'jigs pA brgyud// 'jigs pa kun las yongasu sgrol byed pa'o// yi dam sbrul
402a3(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bskyod// gdon dang rims dang smyo 'bog lce sogs dang // gnod medasogs dus min 'chi bsr-i skrag/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi byed pa'i// yi dum
402a4(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma l-I la phyag 'tshal lo// skye bo sngon bsags las dang nyon mongs kyi// mtsham yid lnga dang mi dge bcu sogs sdig/ sdig pa'i les rnams bdag gis ts+tsho bsags bya/ de dag
402a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ma lus byang bla ra shog/ bdag ni da ltar skye ba 'di la yang // rmi ngan mtshan ngan las dus min skrag/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad dag gyur nas// tshe dang bsod nams longs spyod
402a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par shog/ bdag ni ma 'ongs skye ba thams cad du// yi dam sgrol ma rjes su dran gyur nas// mchog dang thun mang dngos grub la sogs pa// lasas cad yid bzhin zab par sho gau/
402b1(rgyud 'grel): yi dam sgrol ma thugs rje ldan pa// bdag gis rab tu brtse ba'i gdung sems kyis// bstod pa bgyis pa'i bsod nams gang bsags des// yi dam sgrol ma lha dang mi 'bral shog/ 'phags mya
402b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma'i bstod pa// phrin las thams cad sgrub pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon tsan+na go mos mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA ri de bi sto tro pu shA ma laM nA mA/ bod
402b3(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa me tog phreng ba zhes bya ba/ mgon po thugs rna chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje'i spyan gyis
402b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro la gzigs pa'i// zhabs kyi pad+ma la nI btung de// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir du// lhag pa'i lha la bstod par bya'o// phyag 'tshal sgrol mo lha yi lho khyod// dngos grub ma lus ku ni gyi
402b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung gnas// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che ltar// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu sbyar bar mdzad mo// phyag 'tshal ngo mtshar khyad du 'phags po'i// yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'i sku la// yi shwes+t+waM lnga yA
402b6(rgyud 'grel): rang mdangs rgyas pas// thugs rje'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro ma// phyag 'tshal chu bzhi'i pho rol legs gnas// las dang nyo mangs srid las rnam grol// sangs rgyas yon tan phyir ni ldog pa'i//
403a1(rgyud 'grel): sa lam ma lus mthu ru phyin ma// phyag 'tshal srid pa'i dra ba 'joms mdzad// thugs kyi snying po yi ge bcu pas// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang mngon spyod// phrin las
403a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyis na mkha' gang ma// phyag 'tshal 'gro bo'i skyabs mchog sgrol ma// bud med gzugs kyis 'gro ba 'dul mdzad// dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug sras mo// 'phags pa'i spyan chab
403a3(rgyud 'grel): las nI 'khrungs ma// phyag 'tshal 'gran zla med pa'i sku mchog/ zag med bde chenA zla ba'i gdan laM// bzhugs pa'i zhabs kyi pad+ma la ni// lha dang lha min cod pan gtugs ma// phyag 'tshal
403a4(rgyud 'grel): cha bya'i nang ni che mchog/ 'byung po ro langs ma lus tshogs 'joms// gzhan gyis mI b+hA ba drug rtsal chen mo// stobs chen pha rol mnan par mdzad ma// phyag 'tshal sgrol ma 'khor bu sgrol mdzad//
403a5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das ma khyod kyi zhabs lA// skyabs pa'i mi de mya ngan 'das rtog/ mchog gi don chen 'grub par mdzad ma// phyag 'tshal skyong ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma// rigs drug bur 'dzin bai rtsu ba'i thug
403a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis// snying rje chen po'i gru gzings kyis ni// srid gsum 'khor ba'i mtsho las sgrol ma// phyag 'tshal phongs po kun las skyob mdzad// mchi bas mnar te mchu mgul skams nas/
403b1(rgyud 'grel): bkres pas khyod lA gsol ba btab pas// longs spyod mi zad char rgyun 'bebs ma// phyag 'tshal dpa' mo rdo rje sgrol ma// dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog can// rdo rje la sogs
403b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag mtshan brgyad kyi// phrin las rnams kyi 'gro don mdzad ma// phyag 'tshal spyi 'gro rnams la dbong bskur// 'jig rten gsum na mthu rtsal ldan pa'i// dregs pas myos pa rnams
403b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi cod pan// khyod kyi zhabs kyi mthil gyis brdzis me// phyag 'tsha l-i thu ba dbab stobs bcu'i rtsal ldan// sku lnga'i rang bzhin khyab bdag chen mo// bsrung med gsum dang ma 'dres dran
403b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum// yongs su dag pa bzhi pa mnga' ma// phyag 'tsha l-I srid pa'i 'ching ba laswA gr-Il// ye shes sku le rdzu 'phrul thogs med// thabs dang shes rab mchog la mnga' brnyes// sdug bsngal 'khro/
403b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dri ma dug ma// phyag 'tshal mthu stobs bdag mo'i snying po// yi ge bcu pa spyi bor btags nas// dpung tshogs bde bzhi'i nang du phyin pa// pha rol dmigs gi g.yul ngo bzlog ma// phyags
403b6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal mkhyen dang brtse ba'i bdag nyid// bsam gtan ting 'dzin rnam thar mang pos// brgyan pa'i gter mdzad dpal gyi be'ur// shes bya'i dkyil mtha' rtag tu chung ma// phyag 'tshal nyi ma
404a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bum gyi mdangs can// shes rab chen po'i 'od zer 'bar byas// khams gsum sems can rnams kyi rgyud la// ma rig sgo nga'i mun rum sel ma// phyag 'tshal ye
404a2(rgyud 'grel): shes lnga yi bdag nyid// dpal ldan dri ma med pa'i sku la// mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras ma// phyag 'tshal khams gsum dbang du sdung ma// tshangs
404a3(rgyud 'grel): pa khyab 'jug ma hA daM bya// lha chen rnams kyi dbu yi cod pa nA// khyod kyi zhabs lo rab tu btud ma// phyag 'tshal 'jig pa kun las skyob mdzad// me dang chu dang rgyal po'i chod pa// stag dang seng ge
404a4(rgyud 'grel): sbru lo dang srin po// glang po che yi bred dang sel ma// phyag 'tshal byin bau rlab rmad du gyur nas// 'byung ba 'khrugs dang gdon gyis bskyed pa'o// srog 'phrog nad kyi bye brag ma lus// khyod lnga gsol ba btab
404a5(rgyud 'grel): gdung ba sel ma// phyag 'tshal btsun mo rin chen tshwa byang // smin pa'i bar nas mdzod spu 'od 'bar// spyan dgu ut+pal mdog 'dra'i 'dzum madrangs// thugs rje tshogs pas 'gro lo gzigs ma// phyag
404a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal dpa' mo bdud kyi dpung 'joms// 'khor ba'i 'dam las 'gro ba 'dren mdzad// shul nor 'phreng la thugs rjes bzung nas// thar pa'i lam la khrid par mdzad ma// phyag 'tshal bdud bzhi 'joms
404b1(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad ma// sangs rgyas kun dngos rje btsun ma khyod// phung po lnga spangs lnga'i bdag nyid// yer shes lnga rdzogs nyon mongs spangs ma// phyag 'tshal dge legs gzi brjid chen mo// zhal
404b2(rgyud 'grel): bzangs bcu drug zla ba rgyas 'dri'i// 'od kyis khams gsum mun pa 'joms mdzad// shes rab dpal dang blo gros spel ma// phyag 'tshal bud med sgyu 'phrul khyod la// mA ma ki dang spyan ma gos dkar// lha
404b3(rgyud 'grel): dang klu dang gnod sbyin rnams kyi// che ba'i tshe mchog rnams kyis bstod ma// phyag 'tshal hUM gi sbyor ba dang ldan// gnas gsum du ni de nyid bkod pas// nus pa'i rdzu 'phrul mtha' la rgyal nas// phrin las
404b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi yi rtsal dang ldan ma// phyag 'tshul dge ba rgyas par mdzad ma// ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar bas// mun pa rang sar dag pa bzhin du// khyod bsgom sgrib pa spangs par byed ma// phyag 'tshal phyin las
404b5(rgyud 'grel): du ma'i bdag mo// khyod sku sna tshogs ngo bo shel bzhin// sku mdog phyag mtshan gcig tu ma nges// grang la nye bar tha dad 'char ma// phyag 'tshal don dam rgyal ba'i yum las// ma g.yos kun
404b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzob lha mo'i gzugs can// sku mdog sngo ldang gar gyi nyams dgus// bde gsal mi rtog pa yis 'gying ma// phyag 'tshal 'khor ba'i g.yul ngo zlog ma// nga bdag dngos por zhen pa'i snying
405a1(rgyud 'grel): la// spros bral ye shes ral gri bsnun nas// gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i dpa' bo gsod ma// phyag 'tshal tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i dbu skra// mthon mthing lhung lo
405a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khyil ba'i dbus na// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med las// thugs rje'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro mdzad// gang gis me tog phreng ba'i bstod pa// klo gra gum khwa don 'don par byed pa// de yis
405a3(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams dpag med 'thob cing // sdig sgri bya stobs chen ma lus dag 'gyur// gang zhig skye bo tha mal rnams kyis// 'di 'don pa de dge sbyong du 'gyur// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi// sangs rgyas rnams
405a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis byin gyis rlob 'gyur// su yi b+h+yo la bstod pa 'dzin// 'dul khrims sdom pa dam tshig rnams kyi// nyes byas bsam pa rtsa lcang dri ma// ma lus dgra nas dngos grub thob 'al/ 'dri 'don blo yaM pad+ma kha
405a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byed// rgol ba ngan pa'i lung rigs tshar gcod// rlig pa'i gnas la shes rab chen po// zla bA yar ngo bzhin du 'phel 'gyur// e ma bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di ni// lhan cig yid la dran pa
405a6(rgyud 'grel): tsam gyis// zhing mchog dam pa bde ba can der// the tshom med par nges par skye bgyur// 'gro ba'i skyabs mchog rdzi btsun ma lo// bdag gi me tog phreng bas bstod pa'i// dge ba gru gzings
405b1(rgyud 'grel): lta bu des ni// sgyid gsum 'khor ba'i mtsho lus sgrol 'gyur// me tog phreng ba'i bstod pa 'di ni// rje btsun ma la lnga brgya pa rnams kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i khur che ba'i yon tan du ma dang /
405b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mi zhes bya bas bskyod pa rdzogs so// / rgya gIr skad du/ Ur+Ya tA ra dwe bi s+yA bo nA maHbod skad du/ 'phags
405b3(rgyud 'grel): me lha mo sgrol ma la bstid pa zhes bya ba/ rje btsun mA 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshalo// bzlog dka' srid pa'i mun pa ni// 'joms byid nyi ma'i 'od dang mtshungs// thugs rjes
405b4(rgyud 'grel): bAR+Yan bya'i thugs mnga' ba// sgrol ma la ni rtag tu 'dud// shin tu rno ba'i sems rnams kyis// glang po che rnams gsol byed pa// lha mo seng gre khros pa yang //
405b5(rgyud 'grel): khyod bstong pa las 'jigs shing 'bros// mche ba'i mdung rtsi rnon po yis// brag 'joms shing gi rtsu ba 'don// khyod kyi sngags ni bzlas pa las// 'jigs shing
405b6(rgyud 'grel): gling chen 'bros par 'gyur// phyogs dang nem mkha' ma lus pa// du bas khyab cing bzod par dka'// 'bar ba yis ni 'gro tshig pa// khyod bstod tshor bas me zhi 'gyur// ma rungs gdengs ka las byung ba'i/
406a1(rgyud 'grel): phung sgra sgrog shing dug mang can// sbrul ni lha mo khyod bstod pas// namakha' lding ni shin tu 'jigs// ral gri gcong cing 'dral ba rnams// khrag gis yan lag bskus pa ste// khyod kyi mang tsam dran
406a2(rgyud 'grel): bya yis// chomu rkun nus pa med par 'gyur// rgyal po khros pas bra nu rnams kyis// skya nas bzung zhing zhags pas bcings// btson ra spangs te lha me kye// khyod la bstod byed 'jigs med 'gyur// dba' rlabs
406a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis phyog sde bcu dang / namakha' yang dag khyab byed pa// grub log na yang rgya mtsho las// khyod kyi 'bangs ni pha rol phyin// khrag dang glang pa'i 'dam gyis byugs// de dag bza' ba la chags pa// khyod la
406a4(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa tsam gyis ni// sh+yo za de ltar 'jigs par 'gyuraro// yan lug chad cing dri drA bA// khrag dang snag ni sna nas 'dzag/ khyod la bstod pa tsam gyi su ni// mdze can 'dod pa'i lha 'drar 'gyur// bkres skom gyis
406a5(rgyud 'grel): gdungs gcer bu dang // slong ba yi dgas dang 'dra ba// khyod la bstor pa tsam gyis ni/ 'khor lis sgyu ru ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// 'jigs pa chen po 'jigs byed pa// de ltar sems nas khyod bstod pas// dge
406a6(rgyud 'grel): gang bsags de yis ni// 'jig rten bde ba can thob shog/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa slob dpon chen po tsin+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogaso//
406b1(rgyud 'grel): sangag klung chen me sbrul chom rkun dang // lcags sgrog chu dang sha za'i 'jigs pa ni// 'jomasu mdzad zla 'od phung po ltar 'dzin ma// sgrol ma bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal 'dud//
406b2(rgyud 'grel): N+ya gar skad du/ Ar+ye tA ra ASh+TaM d+ha yu tr-i ta nA ma sU dA ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags mya sgrol ma 'jigs pa bar+g+ga dA las sgrub pra zhes byA baSh+Ti sgrub thabs rje btsun ma sne la ma la phyag 'tshal
406b3(rgyud 'grel): kun mAkhyen rta lci ba'i bdag po ldan cig skyes pa'i chos sku de bzhin du// longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku ste pad+ma'i 'dab mo bzhin du yangs pa'i spyan// rnal 'byor dag par rnam
406b4(rgyud 'grel): par thar gyur srid dang srid las bral byi'i sku gra srung thugs chags pa// thabs dang shes rab gnyis meng lha dang lha mi ni mis mchod de la phyag 'tshalnga to//
406b5(rgyud 'grel): skye 'jigs rnam par spangs phyir chos nyid mi 'gyur yang dag nyid du dbyer med kyang // 'khrul bcas 'gro ba'i don phyir sku gsung thugs kyi
406b6(rgyud 'grel): phrin las khyad par gsang sngags lam// sgrib pa myur 'joms sna tshogs phyag rgya'i gzugs 'phres sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed byed yum// 'jigs pa brgyad las sgrol
407a1(rgyud 'grel): bu 'ang dang bsgrub la dga' phyir dang bas brtsam par bya// dang ldan rab brtson dam tshig ldan// rje btsun sgrub la dga' ba yis// rnam par 'tshe med dben pa'i gnas// nyams dga' dngos grub 'byung gnas
407a2(rgyud 'grel): rten dang mchod rdzas sna tshogs pa// rab bshams bde ba'i stan nyid la// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs tshul gyis// phyi nang khrus kyis dag byas te// de nas rang gi snying gu ru// nga ro dang po las byung ba'i// chu shel dbus su
407a3(rgyud 'grel): yi ge ni// sde chen bzhi pa'i dang po la// lbu ba'i thu ma'i thig les brgya nA// de yi 'od kyis rje btsun dang // 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams spyan drangs te// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// gti mug ldongs pa'i sems can
407a4(rgyud 'grel): ma rig mun pa sel mdzad ma// bde gshegs sgrol ma phyag 'tshalo// dri zhim me tog thams cad dang // a kA ru sogs bdug spos dang // rab tu mun sel sgron me dang // ga bur la sogs dri yi mchog/ gcing sbyar ba sh+lo
407a5(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhan yang ni// sgra snyan la sogs mchod pa'i tshogs// thams cid dbul te sngags dang ni// phyag rgya'i rgyas kyang gdab par bya// 'khor ba thog ma meng bar du// sdig bgyis gang lags ma lus pa// da lta nyid du
407a6(rgyud 'grel): bshags bgyis nas// slan chad nam yang mi bgyid// rdzogs sangs rgyas sogs 'phags rnams dang // 'gro ba kun gyi dge ba ni// zag med zag dang bcas pa la// bsam pas rje su yi rang ngo // 'gro mgon sprin
407b1(rgyud 'grel): nyam ste// dkyil 'a n+d+has par gyu rnams la// 'gro ba rnams la phyin pa'i phyir// sa kyi 'khor lo bskur bar bsdus// rgyal ba zag mang byungs nyid du// mya ngan 'das gzigs bzhid rnams la/
407b2(rgyud 'grel): ji srid 'khor ba gnas kyi ba ro// mya ngan mo 'da' bzhugs par gsol// don dam rang bzhin mtshan ma med// rnam par mi rtog chos sku las// gzugs sku lta bu'i tshul 'chang ba'i// 'gro mgon khyed la spya
407b3(rgyud 'grel): su me che// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub mchog tu thugs bskyed ltar// bdag kyang 'gro rnams bsgral ba'i phyir// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// phyag 'tshal la sogs bgyis pa
407b4(rgyud 'grel): las/ bdag gis bsod nams gang thob pas// sems can ma lu sangs rgyas kyi// sa ni myu du thob par shog/ 'gro ba bde dang phrang la sogs// tshad med bzhi yang bsgom par bya// de nas 'phags rnams
407b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs byas la// brtan g.yo'i chos kun stong par bsgom// oM shU n+yA tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de nas chu skyes steng du ni// mu shel de stengs sa bon no// de yongs gyur las ut+pa la// sa bon nyid kyis
407b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa'o// de yi 'od kyis skye dgu rnams// sbyangs nas yongs gyur bcom ldan ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dUr ba'i mdog/ bcu drug ni tshod rgyan rnams rdzogs// mchog sbyin pa dang ut+pal// g.yas
408a1(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yon du shes bya ste// phyed krung gis bzhugs 'dzum pa'i bzhin// mtsho stengs rin chen brag phug nang // ltos 'gros zhabs brten bsgom par bya// g.yas dang g.yon gyi dang po ni// ma~M dang pr-i las lha
408a2(rgyud 'grel): mo ni// 'od zer can dang so sor 'brang // giser mdog zhal gcig phyag gnyis mya// rgyan mdzes g.yon nA shing lo ni// mya ngan med dang rdo rje bsnams// g.yas pa bdud pa'i tshul du'o// g.yas kyi 'og mar phag gdong ya/
408a3(rgyud 'grel): pa lnga sha mdog rgyun gyis mdzes// chos 'chang ba yaM phyag rgya can// g.yon gyi 'og mor khro gnyer ma// mig sman mdog can khro ma'i tshul// gri gug thod khrag bsnams pa'o// de dag rnams kyi phyogs mtshams ni// brgyad
408a4(rgyud 'grel): na 'jigs pa rnam pa brgyad// bgegs drang dgra dang glang chen dang // me dang sbrul dang mi rgod dang // lcags sgrog gos bcings chu rnams las// skyob byed sgrol mi brgyad 'phro ba// rnal 'byor po yis bsgom par bya//
408a5(rgyud 'grel): nas snying ga'i sa bon las// 'od 'phros ye shas+t+ra sems dpa' ni// snga ma'i tshul can spyan drangs la// mchod nas yi ge bzhi pA yis// gnyisu med par bstim par bya// yi ge gsum gyis gnas gsum du// byin
408a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab bya de yi rjes// dbang bskur rigs kyi bdag po ni// don yod grub pas spyi gtsug brgyan// de nas sa bon las byung ba'i// 'od kyi spro bsdu cung zad bya// skyo ni gsang sngags bzlas pa ni// yi ge bcu pa bgrang
408b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// oM tA re tut+tA re \u0f7f swAhA/ 'bum phrag 'am yang na drug/ 'bum phrag bcu yis las rnams 'grub// gal te 'byung po rnams la ni// gtor ma sbyin na snod gtsang du// zan blugs cho gas byin rlabs te// lag gnyis
408b2(rgyud 'grel): thal mo sbyar ba las/ mdzub gnyis gung mo gnyis pa la// legs bcad pa ni ut+pa la// khaM 'bye bas ni phyag rgya ste// gnas gsum dag tu gtugs byas nas// 'byung po rnams l-i gtorA ma sbyin// oM A kA
408b3(rgyud 'grel): ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA naM a d+yA nuta ban+na ta twAta oM AHhUM phaT swA hA// las kyi yan lag thams cad ni// rgyas par rgyud las gsungs pa'i phyir// 'odi ru ma bkod de ru blta// rnal 'byor pa ni gang zhig gis// 'di don
408b4(rgyud 'grel): nyam su len byed na// dngos dang dngos med blad gtso gi/ thog mi tha ma med zhi ba// skye dang zag pa rnams spangs pa// dpal ldan yum nyid thob 'gyur te// bum pa bzung so gus dngos grub dang // gzhan yang gsung dang
408b5(rgyud 'grel): bskrang dang dbye// dgug dang zhi dang rgyas pa yi// las 'grub 'gyur ba smos ci dgos// de ltar stong dang snying rje bdag can srid pa gsum skyes zad dngos shes dang ni// shes bya gnyisu med sku kun+ya tu bzang po spyod pa'i
408b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid sna tshogs yum// bcom ldan 'das ma'i sgrub thabs rgyu de bzhin legs bkod pa las bsod nams dri ma med// bdag gis gang thob des ni 'gro ba ma lus rtog bde mya ngan 'das thob shog/ 'phags pa
409a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa brgyad las skyong ba skyes bya baR+Sha sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs skyob yon chen paN+yan+na drAg mas nad+hA ba rdzogs// / rgya gar gyi mkhan+ta pa dI bkar shA dz+nyA na dang / bod kyi la rtsu
409a2(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba laso// slad kyi rgya gar gyi mkhan po byang chub sems dpa' dI na shr-I dang / bod kyi wets+tsha byA mal gyi blo gros grags pas bcos te gtan la pabya pa'o// rgya gare skad du
409a3(rgyud 'grel): s+yA ta tA ru sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags ma sgrol mi dkar mo la phyag 'tsho lo// ched du zla ba drug grI ba ra// sgrol ma'i la bAr lo bsgom pa'o// dngos grub thams cad 'thob 'gyur
409a4(rgyud 'grel): zhing 'chi ba'i sbyin gyis mi gos so// ngag gi dbang phyug gnang byas pa// 'chi bdag bslu ba bsdus pa las// byung nas sgrol ma dkor mo 'di// bsgoms na 'jigs pa nyams byed pa// bzhi pa'i sde tshun dang po a/
409a5(rgyud 'grel): bcas nas na mkhor 'od zer 'gro// bad dkur zla ba'i gang nA bltas la// gsumA la skyibs 'gro yang brjod la// rlung bzhin sgro btags gzhom phyir du// skad cig stong pa nyid du blta// de nas sngon gyi smon
409a6(rgyud 'grel): lam dbang // byang chub sems kyi yaM ge bsgom// pad+ma dkar po'i dbus gnas pa'i// zla ba'i gdan gyi steng du ni// rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas pa// mchog smyon pa dang ut+pal bsnams// ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od gnA~M tsam/
409b1(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i rgyu ba la mnyam brte nA ga/ rgyan rnams thams cad rab tu rdzogs// bcu drug lho lon lus can ma// sangs rgyas kun dang de smras dang // yum ni 'dod pa'i gzugs can mA// sgrol ma de yi thugs kar bsgom// 'khor
409b2(rgyud 'grel): laM dkar po 'od zer can// re mig brgyad la yi ge brgyad// yongasu bskor bar bya ba'o// oM hA gsal byed dbus gnas pa'i// bsgrub bya'i ming ni lci bar bya// zla drug rtse gcig pa yi yid// nges par brtan pa rtag tu bya// yi ge
409b3(rgyud 'grel): bcu pa'i sngags 'di ni// mi bskyod yid kyi sna bzlas bya ste// oM gyi yi ge dang po ro sbyin// phyis nA tAM re rab tu sbyar// tud tA re la tu re phyis// swA hAM mtha' ru las kun byed// tshangs dbang khyab 'jug nyi zla dang //
409b4(rgyud 'grel): drag po phyogs skyong 'dod lhas kyang // ba spu'i rtse mo 'ong gicod mi nus// 'chi bo dgu las rgyal sgrol ma bzhin// sgra dkar gnyer mo skal nga ni nad// dbul ba la sogs mad+mor bsdu na// seng sogs
409b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzugs po che brgyad dang // sdug bsngal rab tu che 'joms bye de// bskul ba med par gos btung ba// khang bzung rin chen tshogs kyang 'du// ral gri dang ni mig smen dang // rkang pa bum pa
409b6(rgyud 'grel): bang sogs 'byug/ tshogs bci ma khyen dang spyan drung / gzugs kris ra dri ming 'gyur// gzhan yang ci 'di dus // mas de las 'byung ba 'brub sa
410a1(rgyud 'grel): nad dang 'jigs pa rnam nyams pa// gang zhig phyung nas dge bsags pa// des ni skye 'gro sgrol mar shog/ sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs// slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa'i slob ma thu bos mdzad
410a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogs so// // paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang / lots+tsha ba khams pa dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o// // bcom ldan 'das ma la phyag 'tshalo// mau dor bsdus pa la dga' rnams phyir//
410a3(rgyud 'grel): sdom tshig le 'ur byas pa yin// phyogs rnams gtsang mnyan bde ba dang // kun tu dri dad ldang gyur pa// bde ba can gyi zhing khams ltar// sa gzhi byin gyis brlab par bgyi// phyi nang ma bsgribs gsal ba dang // rin chen rnams
410a4(rgyud 'grel): las grub pa yi// thub pa'i dbang po sras bcas kyi// gzhal yas khang du byin brlabo// bla ma dkyil 'khor lha tshogs dang // phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas sras// bka' sdod phyogs skyong ma lus pa// de ring spyan
410a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dren gshegasu gsol// gtsang zhing dri zhim bsil ba yi// dri chab bdud rtsi rgyun lta bus// rgyal ba sras bcas ma lus lo// chu gsum gyis ni mnyes par bgyi'o// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i bla ma lha// rin chen gsum
410a6(rgyud 'grel): ni na mkha' la// til gyi gang bu ltar dmigs nas// sgo gsum gus pas phyag 'tshalo// me tog la sogs nyer spyod dang // rgyal srid bdun du grub pa'i rdzas// mchod sbyin na mkha' gang dmigs te// 'gro ba bsgral
410b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir dbul bar bgyi'o// bdag dang sems can mkha' mnyam gyis// thog med dus nas da lta'i bar// ma lus sdig pa ci bgyis pa// shin tu 'gyod pas bshags par bgyi'o// mngon mtho nges legs rgyur gyur
410b2(rgyud 'grel): po'i/ skye bo'i dge ba gang bgyis dang // 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis gang bgyis la// lhag par spro bas yi rang ngo // sgo gsum nyams len mi dge bcom// ched du bya ba gzhan don brtson// lam bde tshegs chung
410b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jug po zab// sdom pa gsum la gnas par bgyi'o// btang bar dka' ba'i lus 'di ni// mgon dang bde gshegs sras bcas la// bran+da g.yog nyid du dbul lags kyis// deng nas khyed kyi 'bang su mchi'o//
410b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal srid bu dang chung ma dang // 'bru dang rta glang bran du bcus// sku gzhi gser sogs rin po che// gus pas thub mchog rnams la mchod// sbyin dang tshul khrims bsgom pa dang // thos bsam tshegs gnyis ci bsags
410b5(rgyud 'grel): pas/ dus gsum bsdus pa'i dge ba gang // thub pa chos kyi spyan la dbul// sgeg 'dzum ldem zhing brjid pa dang // rngam zhing khros pa khro bo'i gzugs// sras bcas sku yi dkyil 'khor la// dad pas mi 'dzums
410b6(rgyud 'grel): pas blta'o// sangs rgyas byang chub ma lus pa'i// tshe dang yon mthu stobs dang // sku gsum mdzad pa ma lus la// rtag tu gus pas skyabasu mchi// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dang // yi dam dkyil 'khor lha tshogs te// sa
411a1(rgyud 'grel): chos dang dge 'dun la// rtag tu gus pas skyabasu mchi'o// rgyal ba byang chub mchog brnyes nas// cung zad snyoms par bzhugs pa la// tshangs pa lta bur gus pa yis// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul//
411a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub mdzad pa mthar phyin nas// bde gshegs mya ngan 'da' bzhed la// ji srid 'khor ba mtha' yod par// sems can don du bzhugasu gsol// ji ltar sngon gyi skyob pa yis// byang chub sems ni bskyed pa ltar// de bzhin
411a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag kyang sems can phyir// byang chub chen por sems bskyed // rgyal sras 'jig rten skyong rnams la// sku gsum grub dang rigs pa 'dzin// las tshogs phrin las rnam dbye sogs// los bcol de ni grub par mdzod// 'dir
411a4(rgyud 'grel): nyes pa gang bgyis pa// gang yang lus skyabs gyur la// mi 'tshal ba rnams bshags par bgyi// gtso bos cis kyang bka' snang 'tshang // 'bras bu mchog dang thun mong ste// ma nor tshig dang shes rab dang // spobs pa mthu rtsal
411a5(rgyud 'grel): phun tshegs pa'i// dngos grub de dag gnang bar rigs// dus gsum bstsags pa'i dge ba ni// tshogs gnyis bdud rtsi lta bu 'dis// sku gsum 'bras bu grub gyur nas// gzhan don 'bad med 'byung bar shog/ dkyil 'khor du
411a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa/ slob dpon pa pa b+ha dras mdzad pa rdzogaso// // dge'o// /
412a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i bya ba la sogs pa bzhugs//
412b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA ra mAN+Da lA byA tA ra kr-i tA nA maHbod skad du/ 'phags mA sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa'i bya ba zhes bya ba// mgon po'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa
412b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mo shes rab pha rol phyin// gos pa med pa'i ye shes ni// sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu ltaro// ma lus mdzad la phyag 'tshal// dus gsum
412b3(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs thams cad dang // sna tshogs 'gro ba'i ma khyod la// gus pa'i blo yis sgrol ma yi// cho ga'i rim pa brjod par bya// de la 'dir lha ma sgrol ma la lhag par gus pa'i gang zag gang yang rung ba/ gnas khang
412b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan cing byi dor legs par byas pa la sku gsung thugs kyi rten dgram khyad par sgrol ma 'am// thugs rje chen po'i rten bzhugasu gsol la/ tshul ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor bzhengs la/ der tshogs pa rnams

413a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi steng du po tA la nas spyan drangs pa'i sgrol ma 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs par bsam pa la thog mar phyag bya/ nye bar spyod pa lngas mchod la mtshan gyi dngos gzhi bstod pa lan gsum brjod/ snying
413a2(rgyud 'grel): po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la cog tsog por 'dug pas gso sbyong blang bar bya'o// phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras
413a3(rgyud 'grel): gzigs dbang phyug bdag la dgongasu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma bdag la dgongasu gsol// ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / sa chen po la
413a4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir dang / bde bar bya ba'i phyir dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab
413a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi phung po dang / rnam por grol pa'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po yongasasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ gso sbyong nges por byas te yang dag par blangs pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi
413a6(rgyud 'grel): ngas kyang dus 'di nas bzung nas sang gdugs rtse shar gyi bar du sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir dang / bde bar bya ba'i phyir dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung
413b1(rgyud 'grel): po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gso sbyong nges par byas te yang dag par blang bar bgyi'o// deng nas srog gcod mi bya zhing // gzhan gyi
413b2(rgyud 'grel): nor yang blang mi bya// 'khrig pa'i chos kyang mi spyad cing // brdzun gyi tshig kyang mi smra'o// skyon ni mang po mnyam btson paso// chang ni yongasu spang bar bya// khri stan mthon po mi bya zhing // de bzhin dus ma yin pa'i zas// dri dang phreng ba dang ni
413b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyan// ga ra dang glu sogs spang bar bya// ji ltar dgra bcom rtag tu ni// sgo gcod la sogs mi byed pa// de ltar srog gcod la sogs spang // bla med byang chub thob par shog/ sdug bsngal mang dkrug sems can kun// srid pa'i
