418a1(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyis dgongs/ snyan gyis gsan/ spyan gyis gzigs nas so so'i zhing khams dang gnas nas sngon gyi thugs dam khyab par can las bzhengs nas yid du 'ong ba'i pho brang dam
418a2(rgyud 'grel): bar gdan 'dzom pa la byon par gnang bar mdzod cig ces lan gsumo// dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum du gyur pa rig pa'i rgyal mo chos kyi sprin gser du snang ba'i sgrol ma dang / yang dag
418a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rab tu mi g.yo ba'i sgrol ma dang / chos kyi don yang dag par sngon du gyur pa'i sgrol ma dang / dri bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi blo gros sgrol ma dang / kun nas 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba'i sgrol ma dang / nyon mongs pa thams
418a4(rgyud 'grel): cad ring du gyur pa'i sgrol ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyi 'od byed pA sgroyang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rab tu sbyangs par gyur pa'i sgrol ma dang / dri ma med par rab tu snang ba'i sgrol ma dang /
418a5(rgyud 'grel): yon tan gyi tshogs me lus pa rab tu dga' ba'i sgrol ma dang / rnam par grol bar gyur pa shes rab sgrol ma dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sgrol ma dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
418a6(rgyud 'grel): thugs mnyam par mnyam pa'i sgrol ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje'i stobs kyis sgrol ma dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las la brtson pa'i sgrol ma dang / smon lamom gyi rgya mtsho'i pha rol
418b1(rgyud 'grel): tu phyin pa'i sgrol ma dang / brtul zhugs mchog tu gyur pa'i rab tu bzod pa'i sgrol ma dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi thabs dang ldan pa'i sgrol ma dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan ma lus par 'gyed pa'i sgrol ma dang /
418b2(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrol ma dang / chos thams cad kyi srog rnam par 'jig pa'i sgrol ma dang / sems dang las rab tu mkhyen pa'i sgrol ma dang / yo byad kyi dbang phyug za ma tog gi sgrol ma dang / lus dang skye
418b3(rgyud 'grel): ba yang dag par mkhyen cing grub pa'i sgrol ma dang / thabs nges par rnam par sgrol bya'i sgrol ma dang / chos yang dag par grub pa rgya mtsho'i sgrol ma dang / smon lam gyi mchog legs pa'i dbyings kyi sgrol ma dang / mos pa'i
418b4(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba rab tu brtan po chos kyi sgrol ma dang / rdzu 'phrul kun nas nges par 'gro ba'i sgrol me dang / mkhyen pas rnam par mdzes pa'i dpal gyi sgrol ma dang / rin po che'i blo yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i sgrol ma dang / gtsug tor rnam
418b5(rgyud 'grel): par rgyal ba'i sgrol ma dang / kun nas 'od zer rnam par 'gyed pa'i sgrol ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang 'dzin ri khrod lo mra'i sgrol ma dang / shes rab kyi sgo yang dag par 'phel ba'i sgrol ma dang / sangs rgyas thod mi zad pA/
418b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes za ma tog gi sgrol ma dang / las thams cad yang dag par sbyor zhing 'dren pa'i sgrol ma dang / spobs pa ma lus par skyed cing dug sel ba'i sgrol ma dang / rnam par bkod pa kun nas mdzes pa tsun da'i sgrol ma dang / sangs
419a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad kyi zhal rnam par mtha' yas pa'i sgrol ma la sogs pa yang / tsha ge mo la sogs mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa bla na med pa'i byang chub la 'god pa'i phyir di ring dpung gnyen dang
419a2(rgyud 'grel): bkon stabasu spyan 'dren cing mchis na/ so so'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa nas sngon gyi thugs ngam khyad par can gzhes te thugs kyis dgongs/ snyan gyis gsan/ spyan gyis gzigs nas yid du 'ong ba'i pho brang dam par
419a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i tshogs 'byor pa'i dbus na gang na 'joms pa chen po la byon par mdzod cig/ ces lan gsum du bya'o// dong 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
419a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa'i snying po
419a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes tog dang / byang chub
419a6(rgyud 'grel): semadapa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems
419b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
419b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
419b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po ngan song kun sbyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od
419b4(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan kun sel dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' song ba chen po mya ngan dang mun pa
419b5(rgyud 'grel): thad sel ba la sogs pa rnams kyang / che ge mo la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa bla na med pa'i go 'phang la dgod par bya ba'i phyir de ring mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du skyon 'dren zhing mchis na/ so so'i zhing khums rnam
419b6(rgyud 'grel): par dag pa nas sngon gyi thugs dam khyad par can las pa zhengs te/ thugs kyis dgongs/ snyen gyis gsan pa/ spyan gyis gzigs nos yid du 'ong ba'i pho brang dam par mchod pa'i tshogs 'byor pa'i dbus gdan 'joms pa
420a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po la byon par mdzod cig dang zhes lan gsum du'o// deng dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis nges pa'i tshig yang dag pur rig pa lcags kyu sgrol ma dang / chos yang dag par rig pa zhag
420a2(rgyud 'grel): papa sgrol ma dang / spobs pa yang drag par rig pa lcags sgyog sgrol ma dang / don yang dag par rig pa dril bu sgrol mU la sngogs bu dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo skyong ba rnams kyang che ge mo la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i
420a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba mA lus pa bla na med pa'i byang chub la dgod pa'i phyir/ de rnying mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren zhing mchis nA/ so so'i zhing kha myas rnam par dag pa nas sngon gyi thugs dam khyad pAr can las glengs nas
420a4(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyis dgongs/ snyan gyis gas na/ spyan gyis gzigs te/ yid du 'ong ba'i pho brang dum par mchod pa'i tshogs 'byor pa'i dbus gdan 'dzom pa chen po la byon par mdzod cig dang / chos kyi dbyings kyis byin gyis
420a5(rgyud 'grel): rlab dang/ tshogs gnyis yongasu rdzogs pa'i mthu dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i stobs kyis de bzhin du grub par gyur cig/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ a mi tA b+hA ya ta thA gA d+hA ya/ an+ta te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ na mo Amra
420a6(rgyud 'grel): ba lo ki te shwa rA ya bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya ma hA kA ru NaM kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA raM tA re tut+tA re tut+tA re tu ra tu re ku ma ri pad+ma gar+b+he sid+d+ha b+hi ga ban/ ak+Sho b+h+ya ra ta ne saM b+ha bi bai raM tsa na a mo g+ha sid+d+hi badz+ri tA ra rat+na tA rA
420b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma twA ru d+hU pa tA rA puSh+Ta tA ra dI pa twA ra gan+d+ha tA ra sarba bud+d+ha bo d+h+r-i sAt+sA da sha dika byA ba lo kiMs+t+r-i ta A gan+d+ha A gats+tsha swA hA/ zhes lan gsum du'o// dang rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cud kyi spyan sngar dbang pau dang me lha dang
420b2(rgyud 'grel): shin dz+haiM dang / srin po dang / chu bdag dang / rlung wA dang / nor 'dzin dang / dbang ldan dang / tshangs pa drung / thigs bzangs ris dang / sngo'i lha mo dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / klu'i rgyu la po rnams dang / nag po chen po dang /
420b3(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i dpung phyug dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang / gza' dang / rgyu skur la sogs pa chos skyong ba'i srung ma mthu dang gzi brjid phun sum tshegs pa ma lus pa rnams kyang so so'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa
420b4(rgyud 'grel): nas che ge mo la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa'i tshe dang bsod nams la sogs spel ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dar zhing rgyas pa'i slad du di ring mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan
420b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dren zhing mchis na/ sngon gyi thugs dam khyad par can las glengs te/ thug sde dram gyis dgongs/ snyan gyis gas na/ spyan gyi sna gzigs nas yid du 'ong bre'i pho brang dam par gang na 'dzem pa chen
420b6(rgyud 'grel): po la byon par ci gnang zhes lan gsum du'o// dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / che ge mo la sogs pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis deng rgyal sras dang bcas bam
421a1(rgyud 'grel): lus par myangon sum du byon par gyur pa rnams la/ sman gyi rgyal po rnams dang mchog tu gyur pa'i dri phun sum tshogs pa ldeg smra pur sbyar ba rnams kyis rmya shel gyi bum pa la rin po chu du ma'i phri n+dan na
421a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul la nges par 'thon pa'i rgyun gyis rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i zhabs la bkru bar bya'o// de yang phyogs mtshams rnamasu dri zhim po'i ngad dang ldan pa'i tsan dan dang a ka ru dang du ru ka la sogs pa mi lu
421a3(rgyud 'grel): khyad par 'phags pa dpal dang gzi brjid 'bar bar byed pa'i lha rdzas mchog tu gyur pas bla ma dang de bzhin gshegs pa s+ya sA dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du nges par grub pa rnams kyi sku lnga byugs par bya'o//
421a4(rgyud 'grel): de yang dri ma med cing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi 'o ma'i rgyan lta bu dkar zhing bsil ba legs 'dzin gyi dbang po tshim par byed pa phyi dang nang rnams kyang rnam par dag par sbyar ba'i chus bla ma dam pa
421a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang rgyalnga ba sras dang bcas kyi zhal bsil zhing mnyes par bya'o// / na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHbo d+hi satwa b+h+yaHsA ta tsa ra naM li bya pra bA ra sad ka rA ar+g+haM pra tits+tsha any+tsa ma ye swA hA// de
421a6(rgyud 'grel): lhur chu gsum gyi mnyes par byas pa las dkon mchog gsum gyi badren pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / tshogs gnyis yongasu rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang dang / rig sngags kyi mthus de bzhin du gyur cig/ de ltar
421b1(rgyud 'grel): de'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sangs rgyas g+hud+hA g+h+ra'i klung gi b+h+yom+b+ha skyed dang mnyam pa'i zhabs 'bring du/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rtul phra rab thams cad dang mnyam pa'o/ gla sa g+h+r-i byung chub snyoms dpya'i rnams can
421b2(rgyud 'grel): mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mA lus par sbyor ba dang / rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i phrin las ma lus pa la 'jug par gyur cig/ skabs thams cad du lha'i sde sum cu rtse gnyis la sogs pas
421b3(rgyud 'grel): srung bar gyur cig/ klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i mching la stsogs pa rnams kyis bsrung ba dang / dus dang ldan pA ra char 'beb par gyur cig/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pas krung bsrung ba dang
421b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyab pa dang sbed par gyur cig/ mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams kyang mi khon pa brgyud lngas thar pa dang ral ba dang 'byor ba'i lusu gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa bskyed pa
421b5(rgyud 'grel): dang / bskyed pa rnams 'phel ba dang rgyalnga par gyur cig/ sangs rgyus thams cad kyis bstod cig dgongs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs rab tu rangs par yang gyur cig/ sangs rgyas
421b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa dang / mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes chen po la gnas par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gdung rnams kyang rgyas shing 'phel nas sems can thams cad kyi
422a1(rgyud 'grel): gnod pa zhi bar gyur cig/ de nas sngar spyan drangs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mtshan nas brjod cing zhabs lu gtugs pa'i phyag gsum gsum bya'o// glangan
422a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzom pa chen po la bzhugs pa'i rgyal bu srasA dang btsos pa'i tshogs rnams la/ phyogs bcu'i 'ujig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi'i me tog gi bye bragu rang rang gi bsod nams kyi stobs kyis yid
422a3(rgyud 'grel): lngas byung ba dang / chu dang thang dang spanga'i dang ljon shing las 'khrungs pa'i kha dog dang dbyibasu phun sum tshogs pa dri bsung chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyang phreng ba dang mi tog sil ma spel legs gi me tog gi
422a4(rgyud 'grel): gyikyigyi rgyun lta bur sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbu lu dbulnga bor gyi'o// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwAM naM ai AHpuSh+Ta pu tsi me g+ha sa ma dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ phyogasu bana' 'jig rten gyi
422a5(rgyud 'grel): khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi bdug pa'i bye brag rang bzhin ni ting 'dzini las byung ba dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / rab tu sbyar ba la sogs pa'i phyogs thams cad du dr-i dang chen po drung ldan pa sprin gyi
422a6(rgyud 'grel): phung po 'khrigs par gyur pa lta bu yang gangan 'dzem pa chen po la bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams kyi shangs la dbul bar bgyi'o// / na maHsa rba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwe naM oM AH
422b1(rgyud 'grel): d+hAd+hU pA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu tra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi snang ba'i bye brag yid las b+hur+yA pa 'am rin po che las skyes pa 'am 'bru mUR+Sha la sogs pa la sbyor
422b2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / nyi ma dang zla ba dang rab tu snang bar gyur pas phyogs mtshams go 'byed pa legs par 'khrungs shing 'bar bas lus can rnams kyi mig gi dbang po gsal bor byed pa'i mur me'i phreng ba la sogs
422b3(rgyud 'grel): pi yang gdan 'dzom pA chen+ta pi la bzhugs pa'i rgyalta ba sras dang bcas pa rnams kyi spyan+na l-I dbul bAr bya'o// / na maHsarba b+hud+b+ha bo d+hi satwa nAM au AHlo ka pU dza me g+ha
422b4(rgyud 'grel): sa mu twA s+phA ra NA sa ma ye hUM/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten g+hu khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi dri byug pa'i khyod par khums las skyes pA dang / 'bru dang sman las byung ba dang / me tog+ma dang 'bras bu laMs
422b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba'i d+hi mchog dkar zhing bsil ba dang / reg na bde ba'i rkyen rtsir gyur pA dri chab bI dud+yA d+hi rgyun lta bus gdan 'dzem pa chen po la bzhugs pa'i rgyal bA sr-is dang bcas pa thams cad kyi thugs kar dbul
422b6(rgyud 'grel): bor bgyi'o// // na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+haM satwA nAM ai AHgan+d+he b+hu dza maM g+hA sa mu tra swa ra/ Nas ma ye hUM/ gang yang phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi zhal
423a1(rgyud 'grel): zas kyi bye brag rnam par dag pa'i kha dog dang dri phun sum tshogs pa dga' bani stobs 'phel zhing don yod pa'i ro brgya dang ldan pa la bza' ba dku bca' ba dang / bsngag pa dang / myang ba dang
423a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jib pa dang / khyad par 'phags pa'i gtung ba'i rnam pa rnams kyang gdan 'dzom pa chen po la bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i zhal dang phyag tu dbul bar bgyi'o//
423a3(rgyud 'grel): namaHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sAtwA nAM oM AHnai bai t+ya pA dzA me g+ha sa mu tra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi rol mo'i bye brag mngon paru 'dus ma byas pa'i sgra
423a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs dang / dza dang / rje cheni dang / pi wang dang / gling bu dang / 'khar NA dang / dung dang / dung dkar dang / pheg rdzob pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs ltar snyan cing yid 'phrog pa'i rol mo'i rnam pa gdan 'jam
423a5(rgyud 'grel): po chen po la bzhugs pa'i rgyul ba sras+dza dang bzlas pa thams cad kyi snyan gyi dbang po la dbul bar bgyi'o// / na meHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha po d+hi satwA naM oM AHshab+ha pU dza me g+ha sa mu t+yA
423a6(rgyud 'grel): s+pha ra Na sa ma ye swA hA/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ni rab tu mkho ba'i rkyen du gyur pa la dbu rgyan dang rkeng rgyan la sogs pa rab tu mdzes pa'i rgyan du gyur pa dang / song ge dang / glang gi
423b1(rgyud 'grel): che dang / nyi zla dang / gser dngul dang / mu tig la sogs pas spras pa'i gzi brjid 'bar ba dang mtho zhing mdzes pa'i khri la sogs pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyalnga mtshan dang / ba dun dang / bla re dang / rnga yab dang lnga lci
423b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / phreng rgyud dang / nor bu la sogs pa dgos pa'i yo byad dang / blo rten dang / sku yol dang / na bza' dang / mtho ba'i stan dang / mal che dang / ngo mtshar ba'i rag tu bde ba'i rkyen rtsi la sogs pa yang gdon
423b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzem pa chen po la bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams kyi sku la dbul bar bgyi'o// na maHsarba bud+d+ha pro d+hi satwA nAM oM AHu pa ka ra pU dza me g+ha s+ya mu g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/
423b4(rgyud 'grel): gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khyams na lha dang mi rnams kyi phun sum tshugs pa'i rkyen du gyur pa la khrus gyi rdzing bu dang / bdud rtsi'i sman dang / mo rmos lo tog dang / dpag bya sa ma shing chen
423b5(rgyud 'grel): dang bum+b+ha pa bzung ba dang / gter+ya chen po dang / ruli gr-i dang / mIg tsi dang / 'dod 'jo'i pA dang / rin po che dang / rkang byug la stsogs pa grub pa'i rdzas dang / skyes bu chen po'i sngon du 'gro ba'i rtsibs stong dang /
423b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i 'khor lo dang / dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i nor bu rin po che dang / yid 'phrog pa'i btsun mo dang / mdzod khengs blon po dang / shu gas 'gro'i rta dang / dpa' brtan glang po dang / brtul phod dmag mi la
424a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i rin po che rnam pa bdun dang / gdugs bzangs gser yu can dang / dung dkar dang / chu skyes dang / gser nya dang / bum mchog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dpal be dang / rab tu 'bar ba'i
424a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo la sogs pa skyes bu mchog rnams lnga bkra shis pa'i rdza su 'gyur pa rnams kyang gdun 'dzom pa chen po la bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa la nyer spyod du dbul
424a3(rgyud 'grel): bar bgyi'o// / nA maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM sid+d+ha sa pa tA rat+nA aSh+Ta mi ga la pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ gang yung phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cung na l+yA dang mi
424a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi khyad par 'phags pa'i bye brag la mad pA'i rdzas la rim par bshams pa 'am bdug pos gzung ba 'am/ bdag pos yongasu ma bzung ba'i khyad par dang blos sprul pA'i ting 'dzin gyi mchod
424a5(rgyud 'grel): pa kun du bzang po'i mchod sprin gyi rgyu mtsho brasam+bu gyis mi khyab pa dus dang dus min du b+hu ba dang / mdor na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgyal bu sras dang bcas pa'i skyo so'i mnga' thang las
424a6(rgyud 'grel): grub pa ma lus pa rnams kyang dad pa'i blo yis zhing gi rdul snyed du sprul nas dbul bar bya'o// de yang dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlab dang / tshogs gnyis yongasu rdzogs pa'i mthu dang rig pa'i
424b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mo 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig/ na maHsar+b+ba bud d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ sarba ta thA ga te smA rA hi maM ga ga na khaM sa man+ta te swA hA// 'dis mchod pa byi sprin chen pos btibs lngar 'gyur ba'o//

431a3(rgyud 'grel): mthu dang / gsang ba'i cho ga shes pa dang / de kho na nyid mthong ste/ nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa ma lus par spangs pa'i ye shes chen po thob par gyur cig/ che ge mo la sogs pa'i mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa rnaMs

431a5(rgyud 'grel): bcom pa dang / bde legs thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa yang shog cig/ snyigs ma'i dusu nyon mongs pa la bab pa na/ bdagu gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas/ 'jig rten du 'dul ba'i mthu thob ste/ 'gro ba mya lus pa
431a6(rgyud 'grel): bde ba la 'god par gyur ci // gdul bya'i dbang gis gang nas gang du skye bar byed na yang / snying gi pad+mo la rjes btsun ma sgrol ma bzhugs nas thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / sgom pa lhur byas te/ gzhan don rgya chen po la 'jug
431b1(rgyud 'grel): par gyur cig/ bde ba dang legs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs chen po bskyed pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i bdag gi lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi bya ba ma lus pa kun yang chos bzhin du dge ba dang / zhi ba dang
431b2(rgyud 'grel): nges par gyur cig/ nam du yang chags sdang dang / 'khrug pa dang yid mi bde ba mi 'byung zhing dkar po'i ston thams cad kyang 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig/ rtag tu yang dag pa'i ye shes la gnas twa rtson pa dang / bshad
431b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mthu rtsal dang / spobs pa dang / ris dang / ston dang / long spyod dang / don dang / tshig dang / shes rab la sogs pa gzhan don la 'jug cing zhugs pa'i phrin las rgya chen po thob par gyur cig/ deng nas brtsams
431b4(rgyud 'grel): te dus thams cad du nor bdun gyi ston ldan pa'i mi'i lusu stobs chen pos 'gro ba ma lus pa dge ba la dgod par byas nas sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 'god par gyur cig/ mdor na de bzhin gshegs
431b5(rgyud 'grel): pa sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan gyi rgya mtsho zab cing rgya tsho ba dang / tshad med pa'i phrin las ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang / sku gsum gyi rnam par 'phrul ba la sems dga' zhing spro bas nyin mtshan du
431b6(rgyud 'grel): lus kyi ba spu langs te dbugs phyung nas bstod dbyangs du mas bstod par gyur cig/ mchog gi rig skyes nas byams pa dang ldan pa dang / lus bzang ba dang / shes rab rno ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i grogs dang 'gro ba dang /
432a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa la sogs pa goms shing de la 'bras bu mi 'dod pa dang / gsong por byed cing sangs rgyas la gus pas snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod par shog/ rig sngags 'di lan brgyad bzlas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la snyan pa'i
432a2(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs kyis ma lus pa la bstod par 'gyuro// // na maHsarba bud d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ sarba tra ku su mi tA b+hi dz+nyA ra shI nI na mo stu te swA hA/ de ltaro sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md bstod cing gus pas dbang du gsol nas dpung gnyen tho
432a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyir skabs gsum skyob pa dang / bcas pa la rab tu gus pas skyabasu mchi'o// de yang rnam par dag pa'i ye shes zung du 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin sku gsum lhun gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya mtshon pa'i lha tshogs grags pa 'jig rten gsuM
432a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi mgon po sangs thams cad la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu mchi'o// smra bas mo brjod med pa gsung gi rang bzhin dus gsum gyi rgyal ba thang skyed par byed pa'i yum mtshan nyid so so'i ye shes ma lus par ston pa dam chos mdo sde rnams la
432a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu mchi'o// 'khor ba'i rgyal mtshor mig zum nas stor ba'i 'gro ba'i skyabs dang gnyen mdzad cing phrin las bzhi yis thugs rtse gcig par don mdzad pa'i gtso bo theg pa chen po'i dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasu mchi'o/
432a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes lan gsum du'o// de ltar skyabs gsum bla ma dang bcas pa la dbang por gzhag/ rten du gzung skyabasu gsol nas stobs dang grogs zhus pas/ de bzhin du gzigs te che ge mo la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams srong pa'i rgya
432b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tsho'i rba rlabs drag pos rang dbang med par g.yengs te/ mgon med par bying ba rnams la deng nas gzung nas byang chub la thug gi bar du tha na med pa gsum la skyabasu mchis pas/ sems can gling med rnams kyi gling du gyur cig/ gnas med pa
432b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi gnasu gyur cing / skyabs med rnams kyi skyabasu gyur ci la/ skyob pa med pa rnams kyi skyob par gyur cigo/ mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du gyur cig/ dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen du gyur cig/ ji srid sen thams cad yongasu mya
432b3(rgyud 'grel): ngan las ma 'das kyi bar ngo ji srid du bdag kyang yong su mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing sems can thams cad la lam bde ba dang / 'jug pa rab tu bde ba'i sgo nas phan pa dang / bde ba rgya chen po nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa tsam gyis gang zhing yongasu
432b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par gyur cig/ skyab su 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'odi la brten nas sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang la 'god par gyur cig/ gzhan yang sems can tha~Mng bla na med pa yang dag par

432b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang yang mi 'bral bar gyur cig/ theg pa chen po'i chos mtha' dag la dga' ba de kha na ma tho ba med pas long spyod par gyur cig/ bsod nams dang yis kyi tshod kyi bdag nyid pha
433a1(rgyud 'grel): rol tu phyin pa drug gi sgrub pa la yang dag par gnas par gyur cig/ de ltar lus shing skyabasu mchi bas bdag nyid bslab pa gsum gyis lus yongasu rdzogs par byas nas/ gzungs dang ti nge 'dzin lnga soTapa sangs kyi

433a3(rgyud 'grel): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthus yongasu rdzoT shong / sprinas byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob tsang thabs mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sbyong ba dang / seMn yongasu smin par byed par gyur cig/ mthar mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob nas

433a5(rgyud 'grel): nas che ge mo la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba mi lus pa'i mun pa bsal nas/ lam mchog tu gyur pa bskyed pa'i phyir dang / glo bur gyi nyon mongs pas gdungs pa'i skye bo mtha' ngag bsgral bar bya ba'i don du gsol ba ni/ mgon po gang zhig
433a6(rgyud 'grel): gis gang zag pa med pa'i bdud rtsi'i mchog brnyes kyang sen gyi las dang skal ba'i dbang gis thu cung zad stor zhugs pa rnams la dam pa chos kyi bdud rtsi dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba gsung bar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bsku lo zhwa lan gsum//
433b1(rgyud 'grel): gang yang 'jig rten gyi sgron ma dam pa de dag ring du mi gnas par zhi bar gshegs par bzhed pa de dag la yang ji srid sems can gyi khams yod pa de srid du nyi ma dang / zla ba lta bu'i tshul gyis sems can gyi khams la rab tu gsal bar bzhugasu
433b2(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba ste/ bdud bzhi bcom pa'i sman pa'i mchog chen po khyod la gus pas rab tu bzhugs pa gsol ba 'debaso lan gsum du bya'o// 'jig rten ma rig pa la sogs pas rab tu ldongs pa rnams la dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin

433b6(rgyud 'grel): snyoms par 'jug par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad la dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rab tu ston pa dang / byang chub kyi phyo/ kyi dge ba ji snyed pa tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ ting 'dzin gyi phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ shes rab kyi
434a1(rgyud 'grel): phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bde ba dang ldan pa de dag kyang nges par 'byung ba'i don du ston par gyur cig/ gang yang dag par bsgrub pa la chos gang du bri ba'o//

434a4(rgyud 'grel): pas 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa dang / 'khor thams cad kyis lus sems tshim par byed pa dang / 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dad pa bskyed pa dang / snying rje chen po la sbyor ba dang / de kho na nyid mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / gzhan
434a5(rgyud 'grel): ma yin pa nyi dang / mi 'gyur ba nyid nga/ mi 'khrugs pa nyi dang / 'byung ba med pa nyi dang / 'jigs pa med pa nyi dang / rtsod pa med pa nyid ston par gyur cig/ rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i chos kyi gsung dri ma med pa de bzhin nyi dang mnyam zhing / chos kyi
434a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi ngos mnyam pa des 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa rnams la thogs pa med cing khyab par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du med brjod med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing /
434b1(rgyud 'grel): snying rje chen pos zin pa'i sems can rnams la nges par 'byung ba'i lam yang dag par ston par gyur cig/ na mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa bzhin du rgyal sras dang bcas pa'i mkhyen pa dang / brtse bya mu med pas che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba
434b2(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas mu med la brtse bas bu lta bur dgongs nas/ 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dri ma med pa thos nas/ mngon par yid ches/ rab tu rtog pa dri ma med pa thos nas/ mngon par yid ches/ rab tu rtog

437b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / tshe dang / dngos grub dang / brad legs la sogs pa yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig/ nam 'chi ba'i dus su rang gi legs par spyad pa'i las la goms pa lhur byas nas
437b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dkar ba'i chos dga' bde thun mong mA yin pa thob par gyur cig/ dga' bde des rlung rgyud rnyog pa dang bral nas/ rang gi yi dam gyi lha rje btsun ma sgrol ma mngon sum du mthong bar gyur cig/ mthong
437b3(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang de'i gdams pa dri ma med pa bdud rtsi'i mchog la spyod pa dang / lus sems che ma par gyur cig/ shi ma thag tu skye ba gzhan gyos par mchod par g.yulo brgyan pa'i zhing khams su pad+ma'i
437b4(rgyud 'grel): sdong po la rdzus te skyes nas sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa sgrol nas dpal mgon du gyur cig/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig/ de nas rin po che la sogs
437b5(rgyud 'grel): bA'i snod shin tu mdzes pa'i nang 'bras la sogs pa'i kha zas sna tshogs pa la me tog dang 'bras bu lA stsogs pas brgyan pa la na gnyis par byas/ sku gsung thugs kyi snying po lan bdun bsngags nas/
437b6(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab pa la pad+ma kha phye ba'i phyag rgya byas la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs ma lus pa la dbul ba'i sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas te/ kha dog dang / dri ri phun sum
438a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bya la dmigs par bya'o// oM na mo bud+d+ha b+ho d+hi satwA nAM a pra ti hA ta shA san+taM he he b+ha gA ba ti ma hA satwa bud+d+ha A ba lo ki te i daM ba laM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na a mr-i ta kha kha khA hi/ khA hi tiSh+Tha taSh+Ta hUM hUM phaT
438a2(rgyud 'grel): phaT sAhA/ de nas 'byung po thamas+t+ra cad lta dbul ba ni/ AM k+ShI ra~M mu khyA s+yAHd+har+m+ma tAM Ad+h+ye n+yA nAM ban+d+ha tAti oM AHd+h+waM swA hA/ oM a mr-i ta kha kha khA hi ShAn+ti/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ gidz+ra ya

438a4(rgyud 'grel): dadang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa rnams la dbul bar bya/ gnyis pa ni phyogs skyong ba la sogs pa rnams la phul la phrin las gsol ba ni/ deng rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams la smra
438a5(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs kyi 'khrul pa mi mnga' ba ltar che ge mo la sogs pa mnga' ris kyi 'bangs su mchis po rnams la lus drug yid gsum gyi 'khrul pa spang ba'i phyir brtse byas gzigs par mdzod/ rgyal ba sras dang btso
438a6(rgyud 'grel): pa la rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba med pa ltar che ge mo la sogs pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa la ca co med pa'i chos ston par gyur cig/ rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la rmongs pa dang bsnyel ba med pos/ bsam gtan
438b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la thogs pa med pa ltar che ge mo la sogs pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa la brjed ngas par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ rjesu gzung du gsolo// rgyal ba
438b2(rgyud 'grel): sras dang bcas pa rnams la 'chag pa 'am/ bzhengs pa 'am/ bzhugs pa 'am/ chos gsungs pa la sogs pa gang la yang bas su gtan dang ldan pa ltar/ tshig mo la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad
438b3(rgyud 'grel): la ting 'dzin gyi skye du ma la 'jug pa'i byin gyis brlabasu gzigs par mdzod cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa la tha dad pa med pa'i thugs chos kyi dbyings dbyer med cing mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis
438b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir/ che ge mo la sogs pa'i 'gro ba rnams lnga khong khro ba med pa dang / log par nges pa'o sems med pa dang / tha dod pa'i 'du shes spangs pa'i phyir rje su 'dul bar
438b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzod cig/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gti mug med pa'i phyir ye shes dang ldan pa dang / rnam par ltung ba med pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten lus 'das pa dong // 'phags
438b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ma yin pas nges par mi 'byung ba che phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms 'phags pa'i nges par 'byung ba dang / rang gi ngang gos grub pas gnyen po'i rjes su ma song ba dang / ma
439a1(rgyud 'grel): brtags pa dang / mu bsgoms pa med pa'i phyir/ che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams la mthon dman med pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa med pa'i btang snyoms phun sum
439a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par yang mdzod cig/ rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa ste/ de yang byams pa la 'dun pa dang / snying rje dang / chos dang / sems
439a3(rgyud 'grel): can 'dul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzud pa la nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa ltar che ge mo la sogs pa'i mtha' yas pa'i sems can 'gro ba ma
439a4(rgyud 'grel): lhas pa rnams kyang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdud 'dzin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs bya'i ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i rang bzhin gyi sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes thams cad
439a5(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ye shes kyi spyan gyis gzigs su gsol lo// de bzhin gishegs pa sras dang / bcas pa rnams ni/ sems can thams cad yal b.rA mi
439a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dor ba dang / chos nyen pa nyid du gzigs pas/ gang la yang brnyas pa med pa dang / lus dang sems yang dag par sbyangs pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa ste/ de ltar mnga' ris kyi
439b1(rgyud 'grel): gdul bya rnams kyang brtson 'grus yang dag par rab tu sbyor bas sems can thams cad 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ sna tshogs pas/ brtson 'grus nyams pa med par
439b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba tso gnang / thub pa chen po rnams la mngon por rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma thag tu 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can gyi rgyud la rnam par bltas kyang phyis brjed pa dang / sems
439b3(rgyud 'grel): can gyi dbang po la 'jug pa dang / phung po gsum du rnam par gzhag pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa la 'jug pa dang spyod pa la rnam par lta bas/ dran pa nyams pa
439b4(rgyud 'grel): med pa dang che ge mo la sogs pa'i 'gro ba rnams la yang dran par bya ba dang / bsam par bya ba dang / brtag par bya ba dang mi brjed pa'i/ gzungs kyi mthu
439b5(rgyud 'grel): b+h+yob pA'i phrin las grub par mdzod cig/ deng rgyal ba skyes dang / bcas po de bzhin nyid gang+gA dang / mnyam pa nyid da ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pas mtha' dang / dbus
439b6(rgyud 'grel): mi dmigs pa lta sems can thams cad de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnyed par mkhyen pas gzigs shig/ gnan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang sems can gzhan dang /
440a1(rgyud 'grel): zag gzhan la rmongs chos go bar byed pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa la mkhas pa dang / tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba dang / reg gcig bskul pa
440a2(rgyud 'grel): brgya stong gi brla du ston+da pAr shes pa dang / dri ba ji lta ba bzhin du the tshom gcod pa dang / thams cad du thogs pa med pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi khams dang spyod pa shes pa dang / chos kyi phu
440a3(rgyud 'grel): po brgyad khri bzhi stob ci rigs par ston par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa rnams kyi thugs kyis dgongs nas che ge mo la sogs pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams la chags pa dang /
440a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral ba'i rnam par grol ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par mats+tshed cig/ gzhan yang bdag cag la sogs bya'i mnga' ris rnams kyang ming dang gzu
440a5(rgyud 'grel): dang longs spyod dang / spyod lam dang rigs la sogs pa gang gis sems can ma lus pa 'dul por byed pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin du brtse bas yongs su khyab par mdzod cig/ che ge mo la sogs pa'i 'gro
440a6(rgyud 'grel): ba ma lus po rnams kyang shin tu nges pa'i tshig dang ldan te// 'bras bu rgya chen po sten pa'i chos 'chang po dang ldan par gyur cig/ ngag rnam par dag pas kun nos shes par byed pa/ gya gyu med pa/ mi rtsub pa/
440b1(rgyud 'grel): mnyen shing yid du 'ong pa/ mi 'chab pa/ mi 'tshe ba/ shin tu snyan pa'i dbyangs rab tu gsalnga ba/ des pA/ 'jam pa/ phan pa/ dga' ba bskyed pa/ mdzes pa/ thogs pa med pa/ lus tshim par byed pa/ 'dod
440b2(rgyud 'grel): chags la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa'i rang bzhin du gyur cig/ rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis che ge mo la sogs pa'i 'gro ba mo lus pa rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud yongs su dag pas dmigs pa las

440b4(rgyud 'grel): lus pa rnams kyi bar du gcod pa thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ro/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su 'grub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa drar zhing rgya sngo par gyuraro cig/ dam pa'i chos mi nub pa'i rgyal ma chen
440b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcur tshugs shig/ dkyil 'khor chen po la 'jug pa rnams kyi phyi dang nang gi bar du gcod pa thams cad sol zhig/ lom+ba dang sgrub pa'i mI ma tsun pa'i rkyen thong phyir phyogs par mdzod cig/ 'jig rten pa la
440b6(rgyud 'grel): bide ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nor dang phyugs dang / bang mdzod 'phel bar mdzod cig/ gnas dang bdag dang rna lhor bsrung ba la brtson par mdzod cig/ song+yas rnaMs kyi bka' drin dran pa dang / byang chub sanga' rnaMs kyi gsung nyan pa dang / sgrub pa po'i da
441a1(rgyud 'grel): la gnas par mdzad cig/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlab kyi de bzhin du phrin las rgyas par mdzod cig/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin du gyur ci/
441a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa rnams la rdzas ma tshogs pa dang / cho ga lhag pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa thams cad bshags par bya'o// ci 'dod pa'i dngos grub zhus la 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la mi
441a3(rgyud 'grel): tog gi phreng ba dbul// cho ga 'di ni rab gnas dang / sbyin sreg dang / dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i bya ba la slob dpon dang / slob mar bcas pa'i rgyud yongasu dag par byed pa'o// dgod pa'i dbang gis mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor mngon par
441a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba 'am/ bya ba ni sngon du mtshan gyis bstod pa'i dngos gzhi stong phrag brgyad sgrog par bya'o// cho ga dngos la zhugs pa na yan lag gi khyad par ro re la yang tse nus pa'i phyag bya'o// shin tu rgyas par bshad zin to// // mdor bsdus
441a5(rgyud 'grel): pa la yang dag pa rnams dang / phyag la sogs pa bya ba dang / sdom gyi tshig le'ur byas pa/ phyogs rnams gtsang zhing mnyen pa dang // kun du dri dang ldan gyur pa// bde ba can gyi zhing khams ltar// gzhi byin gyi brlab par bgyi'o// phyi nang ma bsgribs
441a6(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba dang // rin chen rnams las grub pa yi// thub pa dbang po sras bcas kyi// gzhal yas khang du byin brlab po// bla ma dkyil 'khor lha tshogs dang // phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas sras// bka' sdong phyogs slong ma lus pa//
441b1(rgyud 'grel): de ring spyan 'dren gshegasu gsol/ gtsang zhing dri zhim bsil ba yi// dri chab bdud rtsi'i rgyun lta bus/ rgyal ba sras bcas ma lus pa// chu gsum gyis ni mnyes par bgyi'o// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i bla ma lha// rin chen gsum gyi na mkha'/
441b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ til gyis gang bu ltar dmigs nas// sgo gsum gus pas phyag 'tshalo// me tog la sogs nyer spyod dang // rgyal srid bdun dang grub pa'i rdzas// mchod sprin nam mkha' gang dmigs te// 'gro ba bsgral phyir dbul bar bgyi'o// bdag dang sems can
441b3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' mnyam gyis// thog med dus nas da lta'i bar// ma lus sdig pa ci bgyis pa// shin tu 'gyod pas bshags par bgyi'o// mngon thos nges legs rgyur gyur pa'i// skye bo'i dge ba gang bgyis pa// lhag par spro bar yi ra ngo // sgo gsum bsdam
441b4(rgyud 'grel): shing mi dge bcom// che du bya bas gzhan don brtson// lam bde tshigs chung 'jug pa zag/ sdom pa gsum la gnas par bgyi// btang ba dka' ba'i lus 'di ni// mgon dang bde bshags sgras bcas la// bran g.yog nyid du dbul lags kyis// de
441b5(rgyud 'grel): nas khyed kyi 'bar su mchis// rgyal srid bu dang chung ma dang // 'bru dang rta glang bran du bcas// sa gzhi gser sogs rin po che/ gus pas thugs mchog rnams la mchod// sbyin dang tshul khrims sgom pa dang // thos pas tshogs gnyis ci bsags
441b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ dus gsum bsdus pa'i dag pa gang // thub pa chos kyi spyan la dbul// sgeg 'dzum ldem zhing brjid pa dang // rngam zhing khros pas khro bo'i gzugs// sras bcas sku yi dkyil 'khor la// dad pas mig mi 'dzum par blta'o// sangs rgyas byang chub
442a1(rgyud 'grel): ma lus pa'i// tshe dang yon tan mthu stobs dang // sku gsum mdzad pa ma lus la// dbyangs snyan ngag gi bstod par bgyi'o// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dang // yoM dam dkyil 'khor lha tshogs te// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun
442a2(rgyud 'grel): la// rtag tu gus pas skyabasu mchi// rgyal bas byang chub mchog brnyes nas// cung zad snyoms par zhugs pa la// tshangs pa lta bu gus pa yis// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul// byang chub mdzad pa mthar phyin nas// bde gshegs mya ngan 'das
442a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhes pa// ji srid 'khor ba mtha' kho ba yod pa// sems can don du bzhugs par gsol// ji ltar sngon gyi skyob pa yis// byang chub sems ni bskyed pa ltar// de bzhin bdag kyang sems can phyir// byang chub chen po sems bskyedado// rgyal sras 'jig
442a4(rgyud 'grel): rten skyong rnam la// sku gsum grub dang rigs pa 'dzin// las tshogs 'phrin las rnam dbye sogs// las btsal de yaM ni grub par mdzod// 'dir no nyes pa gang byas pa// gang yang lus can skyabs gyur pa// mtshal bu rnams bshigs bam bgyi// gtso bo
442a5(rgyud 'grel): tsa nas bka' gnang btsal// 'bras bu mchog dang thun mong ste// ma nor tshig don shes rab dang // spobs pa mthu rtsal phun tshogs pa'i// dngos grub de dag gnang bar rigs// dus gsum bsags pa'i dge pa ni// tshogs gnyis bdud rtsi lta bu 'dis//
442a6(rgyud 'grel): sku gsum 'bras bu grub gyur nas// gzhan don 'bad med 'byung bar shog/ de ltar bya ba ma lus pa mthar byin nas dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa 'am// dkyil 'khor gsheg su gsol bar bya'o// yi ge brgya pa ci nus la bzlas par bya'o// phongs pa
442b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams mgu ba dang / gzhi bdag la gautor ma sbyin par bya'o// lha thams cad la mchod pa lha grangs dang mnyam par byas pas mchod pa'o// dkyil 'khor la 'jug dri med cho ga 'dis// 'gro rnams mu sal nas dkyil 'khor du// ma
442b2(rgyud 'grel): lus zhugs naswA bde ba chen rtags te// bde ba tsan gyi zhing du myur bgro shog/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ dngos grub brnyas pa'i slob dpon chen po b+ha ba b+ha dras mdzad pa rdzogaso//
442b3(rgyud 'grel): ma hA pad+ma ta shrI bi ma la kIrti'i zhal snga nas dang / lots+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa zhang grub pa dpal bzang pos bal po'i gro khyer nas yam bu'i nub phyogs nyi ma'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa'o// /
442b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skadadu/ tsin+d+ra ma Ni tA re sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ sgrol ma yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshalo// yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya bas/ tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang // gzhan yang
442b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa sgri ba byed pa// sgrol ma la btung sgrub thabs bri/ ston du gsungs pa'i rim pas rang gi sems nyid tAM gser bco ma'i ma'i kha dog lta bur blta ste/ 'od zer spos bsdus nas yongasu gyur pa l-Is rin po che tAM gyis mtshan pa
442b6(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ de la yang spro bsdu byas te gyur pa las bdag nyid sgril ma gser gtso ma'i mdog lta bu la zhal gcig ma phyag gnyis pa pad+ma dang nyi ma la zhabs sgeg pa'i gar stebs kyis bzhugs po/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis rgyun can phyag
443a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyi rin po che brla'i thang kar bzung ba/ dpag bsam gyis shing la rgyabarten pa'i yal ga phyag g.yon gyi gzung ba/ de'i thugs kar rin po che hU~M gis mtshan pa bsam/ phyag mtshan par sa bon las 'od 'phros pas
443a2(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad kyi dbul ba'i sdug bsngal bsal te tshur 'dus pas rang gi sku gsal btab cing slar thugs kang nas 'od 'phros pas ye shes pa gzhug pa dang / dbang bskur bya ste/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rgyas gdab bo// snga ma
443a3(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'od spro zhing bsdu bas sku gsal btab cing mi skyo ba'i bar du bsgom/ skyo bar gyur na bzlas par bya ste rang gi sa bon dang sngags las 'phros pa'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyud bskul tAM/ 'bru dang rin po che la sogs
443a4(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad kyi char 'bab par bsam zhing ngag tu oM tI re tut+tA re tu ro tsin+ta ma Ni d+ha b+hI bid+d+ha swA hA/ de nas skyon ye shes pa gshegs te dam tshig pa mi dmigs par bya/ dge ba bsngol// sgrol ma yid bzhin nor bu'i sgrub thaH/
443a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon b+ha ba b+ha Tas mdzad pa rdzogaso// rgya gar skad du/ ta ra DoM bi bo d+hi/ bod skad du/ sgrol ma'i khrus kyi cho ga/ rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshalo// khrus kyi cho ga la gsum tAM/ sbyor ba dang / dang
443a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhi dang / rjes so// dang po ni gnas yid dang mthun par phyag dar la sogs pa byas te/ bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan par rdzas gzhan dang mthun par bsags te shil med du mi ring bar mchod pa rnams sta gon bya'o// dngos gzhi ni sngon du
443b1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'i rim pas stong pa'i ngang las sems dpe nyid tAM dkar por blta'o// de las 'od 'phros bsdus nas bdag nyid sgrol ma mdog dkar mo pad+ma dang zla ba rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis mnyam gzhag gi
443b2(rgyud 'grel): steng na bdud rtsi'i bum pa rnams bsnams pa/ rin po che sna tshogs pa kyi rgyan dang ldan pa 'od 'phro ba dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas lha'i 'od bu rgyan can du bskyed par bya'o// bum pa yang mi dmigs pa las phyi bum pa las nang rin po che'i gzhal
443b3(rgyud 'grel): yis khang chu bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho'i dbusu pad+ma'i pa Ta'i stong po la rang 'dra'i dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed// de'i mdun na las kyi khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dmar sar bzhengs pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i thal mo sbyar ba'i dbus na rin po che'i
443b4(rgyud 'grel): bum pa bdud rtsi 'bab pa bsnams pa/ zhi ma khro gtso bo la bltas pa bsam mo// de dag la ye shrIs pa gzhug dbang bskur rgyas btag de nas rdo rje gzungs thag dang bcas pa bum pa'i steng du gzhag rang dang bum pa'i lha gnyis ka'i thug
443b5(rgyud 'grel): kar zla ba la sa bon dang bzlas pa'i sngags bsam ste/ rang gi gzungs thag gzung nas ngag tu/ oM tA ra tut+tA ri tu re a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sarba pA paM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes brjod pas sngags gzungs thag la 'khril
443b6(rgyud 'grel): nas bum pa'i lha gnyis po'i thugs kar phog daM las 'od 'phros de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs bskal/ ye shes kyi bdud rtsi spyan drangs lha gnyis po'i bum pa la phig bdud rtsi lung 'og gi bdud rtsi dang dbyer me du bas mo// de ltar
444a1(rgyud 'grel): gso sbyong la gnas pa dras ni chos brgyad nas pha rol gyi tshes brgyad gnyis kyi bar ram/ grangs ni 'bum gsum rtags ni chu khol ba la sogs pa dang lha'i zhal mthong ba'o// rjes la ye shes seng
444a2(rgyud 'grel): pa gshegs te dam tshig bA rang la bsdus nas rang lce rang rgyal gyis rang gzhan chu ngas bkrus nas/ sdig pa la sogs te mi thun pa bsam thams cad zhi bar 'gyuro// sa phyogs kun tu gtor na yams na zhi bar 'gyur ro// phywa
444a3(rgyud 'grel): la gtor nA phyugs nad zhi bar 'gyuraro// me la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa la gtar ma thams cad spro ngo // sgrol ma'i khrus kyi cho ga slob dpon b+ha ba b+ha Tas mdzad pa rdzog so// / rgya gar skA rA/ br-i sha ta bid+d+hi/ bod skad du
444a4(rgyud 'grel): gso sbyong gi cho ga/ rje btsun ma la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das ma'i sku gzugs mdun du bzhugs la sems bskyed bya// po ta la nas spyan drangs pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma dang sku gzugs gnyisu med par bsam/ yan
444a5(rgyud 'grel): lag skyong lnga khrus byas la// bcom ldan 'das ma 'khor dang bcas pa'i zhabs la gtugs pa'i phyag bya// dngos sam yid kyis mchod pa dbul/ bstod pa gang yang rung ba tshar gsum bsgrags// sku gsung thugs mnyes par
444a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyir// rtse ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bgrang // sdig pa bshags pa dang la sogs pa'i yan lag gzhan yang byas na la/ lus tsog tsog por 'dug la me tog dang bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar ro// cho ga 'di lan gsum brjod pas pha
444b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyong ra rdza gi blangs par 'gyur te/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs bdag la gsol pa dgongs
444b2(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma bdag la dgongasu gsol/ ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / sa chen po dang lam la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dang
444b3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyisku sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir dang / bde bar bya ba'i phyir dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rna grol ba'i phung po dang
444b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gso sbyong nges pa bya ste/ yang dag par blangs pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya bas kyang / dus de nas gzung nas gdugs rtse shar gyi
444b5(rgyud 'grel): bar du sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir dang / bde bar bya ba'i phyir dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shas rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol
444b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gso sbyong nges par bya ste/ yang dag par blangs par bgyi'o// de nas srog gcod mi bya zhing / gzhan gyi nor yang blang mi bya// 'khrig pa'i chos kyang mi spyad// brdzun gyi
445a1(rgyud 'grel): tshig kyang mi smra'o// skyon mi mang po nyams bsten pas// chang ni yongasu spang bar bya// khri stan chen po mi bya zhing // de bzhin dus ma yin pa'i zas/ dri dang phreng ba dang ni rgyun// gar dang glu sogs spang ba bya// ji ltar
445a2(rgyud 'grel): dag bcom rtag tsa ne// srog gcod la so gos mi byed bA/ de ltar srog gcod la sogs spang // bla myed byung rgyu ba thob par shog/ sdug bsngal mang bklags sems can rnams// srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog/ ces brjed/ lci bI'i
445a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dbus su bcom ldan 'das ma la mchod cing snang bar gnas pas bsgrub pa dang bstod pa la sogs pa byas na mtshoms med pa lnga'i las byas pa yang nges par byang bar 'gyuraro// sku dngosu mthong ba la sogs pa'i
445a4(rgyud 'grel): yon tan mtha' med pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// dus ni yar ngo'i ches brgyad yino// nga/ gsum dang dus cung zad thung ba la sogs pa ci rig pas kyang btub// gso sbyong rang gi blang ba'i cho ga rdzogaso// // sgrol ma'i dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob
445a5(rgyud 'grel): dpon b+ha ra b+ha Tas mdzad pa'o// ma hA bitAM ta shr-I rot+na ra kI cha dang / lots+tsha ba zhong grur pa dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ tA ra maN+Da la bi d+hi/ bod skad du// sgrol ma'i maN+Dal gyi cho ga/ rje bdun sgrol ma la byug 'adz+ra g+ha s+yA/
445a6(rgyud 'grel): yongasu dag pa dang / sgrib bzang par 'gyur ba deng / dngos grub myur du thob par 'dod pas maN+Dal gyi cho ga le brtson pa bya'o// spaT pas yan lag lnga bkyas te 'byongs su cung zad b+hu Da la ngag tu oM AHsarba ta thA ga ta oM b+haiShe ka sa mo ya shI ye hU~M na
445b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod nas rang gi snying spyi bor b+hu DA pas rang gi lha dang spyi gtsugi dbang rta Da dran par bya'o// de nas me tog la lag pa bkab ste/ ngag tu o na mo b+ha ga bA te puSh+pa ke tu rA dz+nyA yA ta thA ga ta ya ar+ha te sam+bak+saM b+hud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM buSh+pe puSh+pe ma hA buSh+pe su puSh+pa puSh+Tad+d+ha ga buSh+paH
445b2(rgyud 'grel): kIr+N+Na swA hA zhes brjod bra me tog byin gyis brlo'o// de nas chu chung zad blangs te ngag tu oM rak+Sha rak+Sha~M hU~M hUM phaT ces pas gnas dang bdag bsrung bar bya'o// de nas oM aHbadz+ra b+hU me hU~M 'dis maN+Dal bsrung bar bya'o// oM oMHbadz+ra raM khe hUM 'dis maN+Da la byug par bya'o// lag pa de'i rgyab
445b3(rgyud 'grel): tu mr-i ti ge bzung ste maN+Dal gyi dbusu gzhag pas bsrung bar bya'o// de nas cung zad gis me tigi dong bcas pI lag bla rang gi gnas gsuM bya nos brlab/ de nas me tog gcig bzung ste/ oM sarba big+h+nAM saur ya hUM swA hA/ zhes pa maN+Dal la bskor zhing bor bas bge Da dang bral bar bya'o// de nas
445b4(rgyud 'grel): skad cig la maN+Dal mi da mi Da ba las rin po che'i gzhal yas khang du bas pa'i nang du me tog bzung ste/ oM tsaN+Da arka ma Ni d+hu swA hA/ zhes me tog maN+Dal gyi dbusu gzhag pas skad cig la sgrol ma lha bcu ma tsadz+wal sauDa ba bskyed par bya'o// de rnams la oM A hUM zhwa mog bu
445b5(rgyud 'grel): te gtor bas ye shes pa dang du byas par bsgo/ de nas zhabs bskyil dang / zhal bsil dang / bsang chu gsuM ni oM pr-ing sad kA ra br-i tId+d+hi li dang / oM any+dza mo na dang / oM b+hiHswA hA zhes pas rIm b+ha stir dbu gde nas phyag bya'o// de nas lag pa gnyis kyi me tog brgya ste/ oM twAM re dut+tA re swA
445b6(rgyud 'grel): swAhA zhes pas gtso'i dbu la dgu le/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe sAh+ma shar du'o// oM rat+na tA re bu'i swA hA/ lho ru'o// oM pad+ma tI buSh+pa swA hA/ nub du'o// oM karma tA re puSh+pe swA hA/ byang du'o// oM puSh+pe ta re buSh+Ti swA hA shar lhoro// oM d+hu pa tA ra puSh+pe swA hA/ lho nub tu'o// oM dI pA tA re puSh+pe hUM hUM swA hA/ byang du'i// oM gan+d+ha
446a1(rgyud 'grel): oM gan+d+he tA re puSh+pe sA hA byang shar du'o// oM A ku sha tA re puSh+pe swA hA shwar sgor ro// oM pA sha tA re puSh+pe swA hA lho sgor ro// oM s+pho Ta tA re puSh+pe swA hA nub sgor ro// oM g+haN+Da tA re puSh+pa swA hA byang sgor ro// lha mo bco lngar
446a2(rgyud 'grel): byed na/ oM uSh+NI Sha tA re puSh+pe swA hA shar sgo'i de'i rgyab tu'o// oM sum+b+ha tA re puSh+pe swA hA nub sgo'i rgyab tu'o// de bzhin du lha'i rigs gzhan yang shes par bya'o// de nas gong ma ltar rang rang gi sngags kyis bdug spos shangs la dri thug
446a3(rgyud 'grel): kor mar me spyan la lha bshong ljags la rol mo snyan la dbu'o// gzhan yang nye bar mkho ba dang spyad pa'i dgos pa dbul bar bya ste/ bkur stis mchod pa la bstod pa ci rigs par bsgrags par bya'o// de nas sdig pa bshags
446a4(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pa'i yan lag gzhan rnams kyang byas la 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab pa ste/ lhag chang skong ba la yi ge brgya pa ci rigs par brjod do// de nas lha de rnams kyi ye shes pa gshegs te/ dam tshig
446a5(rgyud 'grel): pa rang la bsdus dge ba bsngo bar bya'o// 'di ni bya ba thams cad dang 'brel bar shes par bya'o// sgrol ma'i maN+Dal gyi cho ga snyan dngags mkhan po snying rje che bas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho//
447a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ tA ra a g+na pra b+hA nA ma/ bod skad du/ sgrol ma mchog thob pa zhes bya ba rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tsha lo// sngon du gsungs pa'i rim pas stong pa nyid kyi bar bsgoms te
447a2(rgyud 'grel): skad cig la rang sgrol mar bsgoms pa'i thugs kar tAM on+d+ra mA la'i mdog lci bu blta bar bya'o// lus skyilo krung la chags pa drang por srang ste mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya lnga sogs tAM lus gnad lnga dang ldan pas
447a3(rgyud 'grel): rlung rgyu ba spangs te lte ba las me rab tu sbar nas/ spyi gtsug nas thig la phab ste tA la phog/ tAM las byang chub kyi sems zhun tshul du lus thams cad la khyab pas bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin skyes par bsam zhong srog
447a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsil lnga 'bad na zhig bdun gyi dngos su skye bar 'gyur te/ byung sems 'dzag nA gdams ngag dran par bya/ de nas twA las 'di smras te snod bcud thams cad rung la bsdus rang yang trAM la bsngos twe tAM yang rim gyis
447a5(rgyud 'grel): mi dmigs par byas la yod pa dang ming po'i rtog pa sbyangs la/ stong pa nyid kyi bde bya la rgyas gdab bo// rtog pa la shes pa 'phro na sde m+b+ha ltar bde bya bsgom/ byung ba shas cheni phyi ma lIr steng bar bsgom/
447a6(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa gzhan 'brel pa spangs te zla ba drug tu bsgoms na mchog thob par 'gyur ro// sgrol ma mchog sgrub pa zhes bya ba/ dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon bsod snyoms pas mdzad pa rdzogaso//
447b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ aSh+Ta b+hA ya tra Na d+hA ra sA d+ha no// bod skad du/ 'jogs pa brgyad las skyob pa'o sgrol mya'i sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal// dang po kho nan tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsku
447b2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ skyabasu 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang / lam la gnas par khas 'chi ba dang / yongasu bsngo ba ste bsod nams kyi tshogs gus go// de nas chos thams cad bdag med par lhag par mos la/
447b3(rgyud 'grel): oM swa b+hA wa shud+d+ha sarba d+harma suM b+hA bA shud+d+ho haM dang / oM shU n+yA tA dz+nyA nA badz+ra swa b+hA bya At+ma ko haM zhes brjod pas stong pa nyid du bsgoms pas ye shes kyi tshogs bsag go// stong pa nyid kyi ngang las na mkha'i dbyings de nyid
447b4(rgyud 'grel): dru pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus smra rlung gi sems nyid dz+haiM g+hi rnam pa yongs gyur pa las byung ba'i sgrol ma sku mjug ljang gu zhal gcig ma phyag ban+d+ha mA// phyag g.yas pa rnams kyis bgreng 'phreng dang mchog
447b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / rin po che 'dzin pa dang / g.yon pa rnams kyis ut+pal dang / bum pa dang / skyabs sbyin gyi phyag rgyu dang / bo ti 'dzin pa rab tu zhi zhing lang tshe rgyas pa'i lus shin tu mdzes pa/ rin po che'i
447b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyan thams cad kyis mngon par spras shing smad g.yogs kha dog sna tshogs can du bsgom par bya'o// de nas oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wa ti pra sA daM da yaM ku ru/ pU dza gr-ih+Na a tra sin+d+hu hi to b+ha wa zhes pa'i sngags kyis bcom
448a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das ma spyan drangs pa mdun na gnas pa la mngon par mdzad de/ oMSh+Ta kA wA t+yA s+yA ma ya shA R+Sha sad+d+h+ya r+m+mA mU tAd+hA a r+than+d+ra nA mak+Shar+m+ma s+yAt+ma/ zlos byA Sh+To sngags kyis gsol ba
448a2(rgyud 'grel): pas bdag nyid la nye bar zhugs pas snying gar bdag ci 'dra bar ye shes sems dpa' dang / de'i yang thugs kar tAM gyi rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' gnas pA ro blta zhing de nyid kyi tshe 'dzegs pa brgyad las skyob
448a3(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa'i sgrol ma rnams mngon par 'phros pa ni g.yas phyogs su seng ge'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol me seng ge'i gdong pa can mche ba rnam par gtsigs shing lce glog ltar 'gyu ba/ spyan ser mo//
448a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis pa/ mdog dmar po/ skra ser po/ thugs kar mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa sems can rnams seng ge'i 'jigs pa lus sgrol bar bsgom par bya'o//
448a5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das ma'i g.yon phyogs su glang po che'i 'jigs pA las skyob pa'i sgrol mo glang po che'i'o gdong pa can zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ shangs mtho shing mche ba gtsigs pa/ gsus pa 'byung ba/
448a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mngag can mthe bong mngon par brkyang po'i phyag gnyis kyis bsdigs por mdzad pa'i phyag rgya can/ sems can rnams glang po che'i 'jigs pa las sgrol bar mdzad par bsgom par bya'o// g.yas phyogs kyi
448b1(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu me'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol ma dang dmar mo 'bar ba'i gdong pa can/ zhal bdun ma/ ljags bdun ma/ skra gyen du 'bar ba/ phyag gnyis ma/ phyag gnyis kyis pad+ma'i phyag rgya mdzad cing rgyan thams cad kyis
448b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ sems can rnams mo'i 'jigs pa las sgrol bar bsgom par bya'o// g.yon phyogs kyi 'og gi char/ sbrul gyi 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma kha dog nag po// sprul
448b3(rgyud 'grel): mgo'i gdengs ka bcu dang ldan zhing skra grol ba brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i lus/ phyag gnyis kyis mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phye ga rgya mdzad cing / sems can rnams sbrul gyi 'jigs pa las sgrol ba
448b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya'o// g.yas phyogs kyis 'og gi char choms rkun gyi 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis mo/ sku mdog ljang gu/ zhal khro gnyer ba sdus pa/ skra gyen du brdzes pa
448b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas pa ral gri 'phyar zhing g.yon pas sdigs mdzub mdzad pa/ rgyan thams cadA kyis brgyan bri'i lus bzhengs pa sems can rnams choms rkun gyi 'jigs pa las sgrol bad+ma bsgom par bya'o//
448b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon phyogs kyi 'og gi tshor lcags sgrog gi 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis mo// sku mdog dmar mo// g.yas pa dang g.yon pas lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa/ rgyan thoms
449a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis brgyan pa'i lus bzhengs pa/ sems can rnams lcags sgrog gi 'jigs pa las sgrol ba bsgom par bya'o// g.yas phyogs kyi 'og gi chang chu'i 'jigs pa las sgrol ba'i sgrol ma zhal
449a2(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag gnyis ma sku mdog dkar mo g.yas lcags sgrog dang g.yon pas sdigs mdzub mdzad pa zhi ba'i sku bzhengs pa sems can rnams chu'o 'jigs pa las sgrol ba bsgom par bya'o// g.yon phyogs kyi 'og
449a3(rgyud 'grel): gi char sha za'i 'jigs pa las sgrol pa zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ kun da dang zla ba'i mdog can rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i lus phyag g.yas pa dang / g.yon pa
449a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog sbyin dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya mdzad cing sems can rnams sha za'i 'jigs pa las sgrol ba bsgom par bya'o// yang snying gu'i tAM gyi 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lha spyan drangs pa la
449a5(rgyud 'grel): mngon par mchod nas gsol ba btab pas sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang skur nas thams cadadu don yod grub pas phyag dbu rgyan por bsgom par bya'o// sngags kyi tshigra 'di dag yin te/ oM t+pa re tut+tA re tu rI oM sarba b+hA ya sha ma
449a6(rgyud 'grel): naM sarba durga ti tA re Ni tu re swA hA// gtso mo'i sngag so// oM sau ha bi da ni ma hA Sh+Ti/ bi dz+yo dzo hr-i piM ga la/ ne tre/ gardza gardza ya tra bo tut+tA re tsu raM swA hA/ seng ge'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i sngagaso// oM da~M ra de ba da ni e ka riSh+Ti mahA na sa
449b1(rgyud 'grel): la mo da ri kar+d+ha kar+N+Na tA sa ya trA sa ya/ sho Sha ya shwo Sha yA/ d+hA re tut+tA r+ye tu re swAh+ma/ glAd+b+ha po r+g+ha'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol mu'i sngag so// oM shi khi ba da na ma hA us+thA mu khI dzA lA ni sa pa ta dza hi/ sa ba ta mu khaM wA shA na ra/
449b2(rgyud 'grel): tA re tuN+DA re tu re snA hA/ me'i 'jigs pa las skyobs pa'i sgrol ma'i sngags so// au pA Ni ma hA pha Ni kr-iSh+Ta bra da nai tr-i e kA pa shA dzi hA/ kA re Na tsa la ya/ tsi la ya/ ma hI d+hi Sha b+huk+Sha Ni/ tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ sbrul gyi 'jigs pa
449b3(rgyud 'grel): las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i sngagaso// oM kharga hA s+t+ri b+h+r-i ku ri mu khi ur+N+Na keSh+Ta ma hA nA dI kr-iSh+Ta any+dzi nA wan+ne tshon+da tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ ut+ta ra ya/ uSh+ka ra ya/ tA re t+yat+ta re tu re swA hA/ tshom rkun gyi 'jigs bA lis skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i
449b4(rgyud 'grel): sngag so// oM rak+ta war+Ne pA sha AM ku sha ha ti ma hA ra waM/ ma hA ba la sa ra sau ra khi sa ra bi si ra/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ kartA kad+d+he ma hI dur+g+ha na/ mA tsa ya/ tA re tut+tA ra tu re swAh+ne/ lcags sgrog gi 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i stag so// oM dza
449b5(rgyud 'grel): le dza le ma hA dzo la/ tA rA ya tA ra ya/ ut+tA ra ya/ shr-i la la hA sti/ ma hA dzA wa I k+ShA pAM ri ma hA kA ru Ne ke tA re tut+tA rI tu raM swA hA/ chu'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i sngagaso// oM ma hA gam+b+hIr+ye mo hA k+Shu ru Ne ke b+ha ga wAM sa le/ pAr
449b6(rgyud 'grel): a b+ha ya hasti/ ma hA ku nan+da da we li pra histA da ra da ni/ ma hA ku nin+du da wa laM/ pra ha si hi ba de ne/ mihI wasta pra br-i ta sharI ra d+ha nA/ waM s+tha ti tA ra ya tA ra ya/ ma hA ba yaM/ tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ shi za'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol
450a1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i sngags// gang gis tshe bzlas pas yid skyo ba gyur pa de'i tshe ye shes pa mdun du phyung ba la mchod nas gshegs su gsol la/ rang nyid dam tshig pa'i nga rgyal gyis gnas par bya'o// 'jigs pa
450a2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/ sleb dpon thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / kha tshe'i paN+Di ta ta thA ga ta b+ha dra dang / dge sbyong 'phags pas rgya'i yul cong du'i mkhar
450a3(rgyud 'grel): du bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI si tA tA ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs/ dpal sgrol ma dkar mo la phyag 'tshalo// 'chi ba'i skyon gyis gos min la/ zla ba drug gi mthar thug
450a4(rgyud 'grel): parat+nasgrol ma'i thugs kyi 'khor la ni// bsgrims bsgoms dngos grub thams cad rnying // ngag gi dbang phyug gis byas pa'i// 'chi ba sgrub kun bsdus pas// sgrol ma dkar mo phyung 'di ni// bsgoms pas 'jigs pa spong bar byed/
450a5(rgyud 'grel): byizhi pa'i sde tshan gnyisde pA A/ 'od zer rnam 'phro na mkha' ni// pad+ma dkar dang zla gdan la// bdun bltas gsum la skyobs 'gro brjod// yud tsam stong pa nyid bsgoms nas// so so skye bo'i 'khrul bcom ste// rdo rje smon lam mthu tha~Md
450a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis// byang chub sems kyi yi ge bsgom// pad+ma dkar po'i dbus gnas pa// zla ba'i gzugs kyi gdan steng du// rdo rje skyil krung dang bcas shing // 'dod sbyin ut+pal 'dzin pa mo// ston zla'i 'od ltar dkar ba'i mdog/ rgyab tu zla ba yang dag bsten
450b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs// bcu drug lo lon sku mnga' ba'i// rdzogs sang+yas rgyas rnams de yi sras// yum gyur 'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin ma// de yi snying dbus 'khor lo'i 'od// dkar mdangs 'phags ma sgrol ma
450b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// brgyad kyi rtsibs can brgyad rnams kyi// yi ges yongs su gang ba nyid// oM ha yi ge'i dbus gnas pa// bsgrub bya'i ming ldan lte bar ro// zla ba drug tu nges brtan par// mi bde med pa'i sems yin pas// rtsa gcig sems
450b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsgom bya zhing // yi ge bcu pa'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM yi ge thog mar byin byas nas// phyis ni tA re rab tu sbyar// tut+ta re 'dis tu ra phya si// swA hA mtha' yin las kun la'o// tshungs dbang khyab 'jug zla nyi dang // drag po phyogs
450b4(rgyud 'grel): skyong 'dod pa'i lhas// ba spu'i rtse yang bskyod mi nus// 'chi ba las rgyal gral rnams bzhin// gaunyer ma skra dkar skal ngan dnganang dang dbul po nyams par byed// seng ge la sogs 'jigs chen brgyad// sngag baspu l-i tshogs
450b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams sel bar byeng // bza' dang btung ba gos dang ni// khang bzang rin chen ldan mi slob// ral gri mig sman rkang byug dang // bum pa bzang sogs dngos grub 'gyur// snyan da dgas rtsod dang mi brjod dang // shes rabA gcig tu dri ma med/
450b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa gzhan yong grub byed pa// 'khor lo 'di las rab tu 'byung // sgrol ma dkar mo bsgrub pa'i thabs// 'chi dang nad rnams 'joms byang pa// phyung ba'i dge ba gang thob nges// 'gro kun sgrol ma'i bdag nyid shog/
451a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma dkar po 'chi ba slu ba'i sgrub thabs// slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i paN+Di ta chen po
451a2(rgyud 'grel): shAk+Sha shrI b+ha dru dang // sgra sbyar gyi lots+tsha ba gnubs byAms pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ NA ra tsin+d+ra ma ni sA d+ha nAM nA ma/ bod skad du/ sgrol ma yod bzhin nor bu'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba//
451a3(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyeg 'tshal lo// yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya bas// tshe di nga longs spyod spel ba dang // gzhan yang 'did pa sgrub byed pa/ sgrol ma la btud sgrub thabs bri// sngon du gsungs po'i rim pas rang gi
451a4(rgyud 'grel): sems nyid tI gser ba tsau ma'i kha dog lta bur bltas te// 'od zer spros bsdus yongasu gyur nas rin po tshA trAM gyis mtshan par bAsam/ de la yang spro ba dang bA sdu ba byas pa las bdag nyid sgrol ma gser btso
451a5(rgyud 'grel): ma'i mdog lte bur zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma pad+ma dang nyi ma la zhabs lde mi pA'i stangs kyis bzhugs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyun can// phyag g.yas rin po che baR+Ya'i thad kar bzung ba dpag bsam gyi shing
451a6(rgyud 'grel): la rgyab gtang ba'i yal ga phyag g.yon gyis gzung ba'i thugs kar rin po che tAM gyis mtshan pa bsam/ phyag mtsha ni dang sa bon las 'od 'phres pas sems can thams cad kyis dbul ba'i sdug bsngal
451b1(rgyud 'grel): sal te tshur rang gi sku bsal btab slar thugs ka nas 'od 'phro sa ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang dbang bskur ba byas te/ rin 'byung gis rgyas gdab pa snga ma ltar 'od spro zhing bsdu bas gsalnga gdab/
451b2(rgyud 'grel): mi skyo ba'i bar du bsgom mo// skyo bar gyur na bzlas pa bya ste/ rang gi sa byin dang sngags las 'od 'phros pa'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pra thams cad kyi rgyud bskul te rin po che la sogs pa 'dod pa'i don
451b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi tshar 'bab par bsam zhing drag tu/ oM tA ri tut+tA re tu ro tsin+ta ma Ni d+hA b+hU swA hA/ de las skyon ye shes pa gshegs te dam tshig pa mi dmigs par dge bar bsngo'o// sgrol ma yid bzhin nor
451b4(rgyud 'grel): bu'i sgrub thabs/ de dngos grub mnyes pa'i slob dpon b+ha ba b+ha Ta sAM mdzad pa rdzo gAs// / paN+Di tra chen po rat+na rak+Sha ta dang // lots+tsha ba zhang grub pa dpal bzang po sna bsgyur ba'o//
451b5(rgyud 'grel): lha mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshalo// sngar bstan pa'i cho ga'i/ bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor du sa bon lnga pa'i sde tshan gyi dang po la/ dang po'i gnyis pas mnan pa/ zla tshes phyed pa'i thig las brgyan pa'o// de las
451b6(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i sgrol ma bsgom par bya'o// ljang gu phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas mchog sbyin/ g.yon ut+pa la 'dzin pa'o// pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par gsam mo// lago ba gnyis thal me
452a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis kyis gung mo'i sen mo bkab la/ srin lag nang du bcug ste mtheb mos mnan bya na/ ut+pal kha bye ba'i phyag rgya'o// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thab so//
452a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ tA ra sa d+ha no nA ma/ bod skad du/ sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ rje btsun sgrol mA la phyag 'tshalo// de la dang por 'di sgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor byas/ dben pa'i gnasu stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ mchod pa'i
452a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa tshad myong ba bshams shing / gtor ma gcig kyang bshams la/ oM AHhUM zhes byin gyis brlabs/ oM A kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Ad+ya nu ta pan na tr-id oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ zhes brjod la btang ngo // de nas rang nyid
452a4(rgyud 'grel): sgrol mar mos pa byas la/ de'i snying gar pad+ma 'dab ma sna tshogasu yod pa/ dbus kyi lte ba la oM las zla ba la tAM ljang gu/ de'i 'od kyis rang bzhin gyi gnas nas rdo rje'i sgrol ma spyan drangs la/ mdun gyi na mkha' la spyan drangs/

452a6(rgyud 'grel): nos slar gshegasu gsol// sems can gyi don bya snyam pa'i byams pa dang / 'khor ba nas sems can rang rang gi sdug bsngal yod pa la snying rje bsgom/ de rnams sdug bsngal las thar nas sangs rgyas kyi bar la
452b1(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba bsgom/ de yang sems can de dag kun gdong nas ston pa dang rang bzhin med par btang snyoms bsgom// de nas oM sh+yA mya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes mi rtogs pa gcig bsgom/ de nas rtog pa 'am bying ma
452b2(rgyud 'grel): sto pa mi rtog pa'i da lAm+bak+Sh+ma baM las+yai sna tshigs pad+mA de'i lci ba la a khas zla ba de'i steng du tr-i ljang gu daM las ut+sA la/ de ltar ut+pa la tAM gyis mchin pa yongasu gyur pa las bdag sgrol ma sku mdog ljang gu pad+ma dang zla
452b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gdan la phyed krung gis skyil mo krung ngu bzhugs pa// zhabs g.yaso brkyang ba/ phyag g.yas mchog sprin gyi phyag rgya/ g.yon ut+pa li snyan gyi thad kar bzung gi/ dbu rgyan dang snyun cha dang mgul rgyun dang / phyig
452b4(rgyud 'grel): gdub dang / dpung rgyan dang / zhabs gdub dang / rin po ches brgyanA pa/ bag tsom g.yasu 'gying ba/ 'od zer ste lcong dang bcas par bsgoms la/ thugs ka'i tAM las 'od zer 'phros ye shes kyi sgrol ma spyan drangs
452b5(rgyud 'grel): la mdun du bzhugs pa la sngar bstan pa'i mchod pa rnams yid kyis phul/ de nas bdag la bzhug/ yang tI gyi 'od zer phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spyan drangs/ mdun gyi
452b6(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' la bzhugasu gsol la/ sngar gyi mchod pa yid kyis phul la/ de rnams bdag la dbang stsol gcig par bsgomo// de yang bum pa lnga bcud dang bcas pa lha mo lngas dbang bskur nas bum pa'i chung mar blugs
453a1(rgyud 'grel): pas sgrib pa byung / yur 'khyil pas spyi bor don yod grub pa bzhugs par bsam/ de nas mi rtog pa cung zad bsgom/ shes pa 'phro ba 'am bying bya na lha'i mchog rims kyis bsamya/ de nas
453a2(rgyud 'grel): stong pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la/ dbus gyi zla ba la oM/ shorar+ya gyi 'dab maM lA tA lho'i 'dab ma la r+ye/ nub kyi 'dab ma la tuta/ byung gi 'dab ma la tAM/ byung shar dur+ye/ shar lhor to/ lho nub tu re/ nub byang du swA hA// bkod la/
453a3(rgyud 'grel): ri mi pras bzlas so// lag pA ut+pa lnga'i phreng ba bgrang ngo // brgya'am stong bzlas la 'phro gnod tsam na/ ye shes pa mdun gyi na mkha' la batron 'o// dag thal mo sbyor gang gi dge ba rdzo ba 'dis bdag mngon par rdzogs phyir sangs rgyas
453a4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ sems can thams cad gyi ngo ni byed par gyur cig/ bdag sangs rgyas me thob par la/ theg pa chen po'i chos spyod cing / sems can gyi don byed par gyur cig ces brjod la/ gshegasu gsol lo// sgrol ma'i sgra'o
453a5(rgyud 'grel): thubs d+hA byang chub sems dpa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa dz+re gla so// / paN+Di ta ta thA ga ta rak+Shi tA dang / bod kyo lots+tsha ba ba ri rin chen grags pas bsgyur ba'o// / rje btsun sgrol mA la phyag 'tsha lo// de li dang
453a6(rgyud 'grel): bopor sngags pas gdong bkru ba la sogs pa byas te/ yid dang mthun par bsam gtan gyi gnas gtsang zhing dri zhim po gcal du bkram par stan gtsang ma bde bar skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/ 'byung po thams cad prI/

453b2(rgyud 'grel): snying grwar chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin skye ba med pA ra ston par byed pa ston ka'i zla bre wAr dkar ba 'od zer dkar po 'phro bas rang gi lus gsal bar byed pa shin tu 'phro ba bA sams la/ de yo
453b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'i 'od zer dkar po'i thig le gong dag pa lta bu da rim gyis 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugasu bsam zhing / de'i steng du yi ge tAM 'od zer gyi tshogs 'phro ba'i rin po che'i sgol me kAr
453b4(rgyud 'grel): dkar ba rnam par bsam mo// de nas yi ge tAM de 'od zer shin tu dkar ba'i tshogs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gsal bar byas pa sngon du 'go bas lha mo skyil ma la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang
453b5(rgyud 'grel): sims dpa' dang bla ma rnams bskul te/ sgyeng drangs pa mdun gyis na mkha'i phyogs la rnam+b+ha par bsam par bya'o// de'i steng du yid kyi rang bzhin gyi mchud par bya ba yin la/ de la mchod pa'i cho ga'o rim po ni 'du
453b6(rgyud 'grel): te/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod la yi ge tAM las byung ba'i me tog gi mchod pa'i tshigs kyis mchod par bya'o// de nas oM badz+ra d+hU pe hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod la yi ge tAM de nyid las yang dag par
454a1(rgyud 'grel): spro ba'i bdag po'i mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu oM badz+ra dwI pe hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod lnga yi ge trAM de nyid las rin po che'i sgrol ma spyos la mchod par bya'o// na
454a2(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra gan+d+he hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod la yi ge tAM de nyid la byung ba'i mchod pa'i sprin yang dag par spros pas mchod par bya'o// de nas oM badz+ra nai b+hed+ya hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod la yi ge tAM de nyid las rin+da po che sna
454a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs su brtsig pa'i lha'i zhal zas ro mchog dang ldan pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par spros pas mchod par bya'o// de nas AM sa rba bi shau Sh+Ta pA dza me g+ha pra sa ra sa mu dra AHhUM zhes pa'i snga gris
454a4(rgyud 'grel): brjod la yaM ge tAM de nyid las rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dang / bla re le sogs pa dang / 'khor los sgyur bal rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod par bya'o// de ltar mchod par byas na de dag gi spyan stu
454a5(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams la rje su yi rang ba dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang / bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba dang / gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba byas la/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang
454a6(rgyud 'grel): btang snyoms te tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms nas byang chub kyi sems brtan por bya'o// de nas oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmAHswa b+hA shud+d+ho ha~M zhes bya ba'i sngags lan gsum brjod l-i/ 'gre ba thams cad rmi lam dang sgyu ma
454b1(rgyud 'grel): dang smig rgyu lta bur stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du dmigs par bya'o// de nas yi ge a yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsam/ de'i steng du yi ge tAM dkar po 'od zer dkar po 'khrugs par bsam de yongasu gyur pa la
454b2(rgyud 'grel): ut+pa la sngon po de'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na yi ga tAM dkar po bsam/ de las 'od zer dkar po phyogs bcur 'phros pa des sems can thams cad sbyangs nas lha mo sgrol ma'i skur gyur pa 'od zer de nyid
454b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis bkug pa/ ut+pal dang yaM ge tAM la bstim pas/ pad+ma dkar pi dbus gnas pa'i/ zla ba'i gzugs kyi gdun stong du// rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas ni// mchog sbyin pa dang ut+pa la bsnams// ston ka'i zla ba'i mdangs
454b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba'i// zla ba la ni rgyab brten ma// rgyan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogas+ya// bcu drug la lon lus dang ldan// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de 'dra'i sras// kun gyi yum gyur 'dod sku 'changa'aphags ma sgrol ma de'i snying gar
