454b6(rgyud 'grel): zla drug brtan zhing nges pas ni/ rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis bsgom// yi ge bcu po'i sngags 'di ni// skyo bar mo gyur sems kyis bzlas// dang por aM ni gzhag na su// de'i 'og tA re rab tu sbyor// de 'og tA re tut+tA
455a1(rgyud 'grel): re/ swA hA mtha' can las kun byed// thugs ka'i 'khor lo de las 'od zer dkar po 'phros pas dam tshig sems dpa' 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis grub pa bskul nas spyan drangs
455a2(rgyud 'grel): pa mdun gyi na mkha' la rnam par bsams la// snga ma bzhin du yang dag par mchod de// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste/ thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi rgyab tu sbyar la mthe bong
455a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis nang du bkug pa ni/ ut+pa la'i phyag rgya'o// de'i dbus su yi ge tAM dkar po bsams te/ de las 'od zer dkur po 'phros pa ngas ye shes sems dpa' la bskor bar byas la// de nas dzaMHhUM baM hodz+dzazhes bya ba'i yi
455a4(rgyud 'grel): ge bzhis spyan drangs nas dam tshig sems dpa' bdag nyidra la gzhug pa dang / bcing pa dang / dgyes pa byas la/ A~M d+har+m+ma d+hA tu dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko hi/ zhes nga rgyal bya'o// de'i rjes la 'khor lo yi ger bcas pa las
455a5(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer spro ba byas la// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga mdun gyi namakha' la rnam par bsams la// dbang bskur ba'i tshigasu bcad pa 'dis don du gnyer bar bya ste/ byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la/ ji ltar mchog chen
455a6(rgyud 'grel): gsol mdzod pa// bdag la bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir// na mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ska las 'byung ba'i lo tsa na dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang // tA ra rin po che'i bum pa
455b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi bdud rtsis gang ba phyag na bsnams pas/ rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur bya// khams gsum po yis phyag byas pa// gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung / sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya// zhes bya ba
455b2(rgyud 'grel): 'don cing dbang bskur bar bsam mo// dbang bskur ba rdzo gis ma thag rin po che cod pan gyi stang du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa sku mdog dkar pi zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ ti 'dzin gyi phyag
455b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya can bsnam mo// lus dang ngag dang ying+ga gsum byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir/ spyi bor yi ge oM dkar po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa dang // lkog mar yi ge AHdmar po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
455b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // snying gu ra yI ge hUM nag po zla ba'i dkyilha 'khor la gnas pa rnam par bkod do// yi ge bcu po las 'od zer dkar po spros pas 'gro ba kun sbyang nas su bsgrub skur bkug+sa ste/ 'khor lo dang yi ge la bstim ste/
455b5(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar bsgom zhing bzlas brjod bya'o// ji srid mi skyo ba'i bar du bsgom pa dung bzlas par byas nas de las ldang bar 'dod na chos gra nyams pa bskong bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje snyoms dpa'i snying po yi ge brgya pa zhes
455b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba bzlas nas ye shes sems dpa' yang dag par mochod de bsod nams yongs su bsngos la gshegasu gsolo// de la ye shes sems dpa' gshegasu gsol ba'i tshigasu bcad pa ni// oM khyed kyis
456a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can don kun mdzad// rjesu 'thun pa'i dngos grub stso lnga// sangs rgyus yul du gshegs nas ni// slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol// muHzhes bya ba 'di yin no// de la bzlas pa'i
456a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ de la rdo rje snyams dpa'i snying po yo ge brgya pa'i sngagasi nau/ aM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra satwa twe no pa tiSh+TaM dr-i D+ho maM b+hA ba/ su toSh+To b+ha pra/ su bau b+hA ba/ a nu rok+to
456a3(rgyud 'grel): mAM b+ha ba/ sarba sit+ti me pr-i ya tsA/ sirbi karma su tsaM maM/ tsit+taM shr-i yaHku ru hUM/ ha ho ha ha ho/ b+ha ga b+hAn sarba tA thA g+he ta/ badz+ra ma me muny+tsaM badz+ri b+ha ba mahA sa ma ya s+yAt+sa AHzhes bya byi'i 'di yin nu// bsod nams 'di
456a4(rgyud 'grel): yis 'gro ba kun// rje btsun sgrol ma 'dra bar shog/ bdag kyang ting 'dzin 'di bsgrubs nas// 'gro ba'i don du sangs rgyas shig/ rje bcu ni sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs// slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad
456a5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis
456a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// dge
457a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma sgrol ma bsgom pa'i cho ga bzhugaso//
457b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya grar skad du/ Ar+ya tA ra de bi b+ha bA na bi d+hista ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma bsgom pa'i cho ga rgyas pa/ lha mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshalo// don med bdag la gnod pa'i srid pa'i
457b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba rnams spangs te/ rang bzhin brtun pas rnam par dben pa'i sa phyogs song nas ni/ gnas der bdag gi bsam gtan khang pa shin tu yad 'thad pa// shar du sgo rjod yang na nub tu bkra shis sgo ldan pa// legs
457b3(rgyud 'grel): gas dri yang dum bu bzhi pas mdzes par byas pa ste// shin tu mnyam zhing logs dang steng 'og thams cad legs byugs shing // rab 'jam gzugs brnyan 'char ba lta bur 'tshor ba'i rdzas zlums byugs//
457b4(rgyud 'grel): de rjes dri zhim ldan pa'i tshon rnams ljang gus khyab par byugs// 'di ni steng logs sa gzhi byi dor rgyud rnams las bsngags pa'o// 'og gi cha ni rab tu 'thas par brdungs pa kho na la/ sa la mi lhung ba'i lci ba
457b5(rgyud 'grel): dri bzangs rnams dang ni// bsres pas yang yang byugs pas gzugs brnyan 'char ba lta bur 'a gyur// de la dri zhim me tog rnams kyis kun tu gtor nus ni// ji ltar 'byor pa'i bla re la sogs rgyun rnams
457b6(rgyud 'grel): bri bar bya// de 'dra'i dbus sam shar gyi rtsig ngos cha la srad bu yis// bris sku yid 'ong mthong bar dga' bar 'gyur ba spyad par bya// de mdun me tog la sogs mchod pa 'byor tshad dgod par bya// de bzhin de
458a1(rgyud 'grel): dbus stan bzang rab tu 'jam zhing bde ba ni/ bris sku la bltas legs par bting bas yang dang mthun par gzhag/ de yi sgo glags rab tu 'byar bas rlung dang srog chags ni/ shin tu phra ba
458a2(rgyud 'grel): 'ang 'jug par mi nus 'di 'drar rab 'grag bya// de logs kyi skar khung sgo dang bcas pa rtod pa ste/ che ba min zhing steng nas rjod dang dma' bar tu smad// 'di na bsam gtan kheng pa mchod rten lta bur 'gro rnams kyis
458a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod par bya ba lha mo'i bzhugs gnas lha tshogs 'du ba'i sa'o// de bzhin de la sgo bltas pa yi khang pa gnyis pa ni// srid du khru rnams bcu bdun zheng du de'i phyed yod pa zhig/ sngags pa'i 'chag sa kho nar brtag
458a4(rgyud 'grel): cing byi dor snga ma bzhin// der ni 'ju sa'i thag gu chang bar gzung ba 'tsham pa la// regu na bde ba'i sbu gu rnams dang ldan par gdags par bya/ 'ogro tu 'byor pas stan nam rtsa rnams snyoms par dgram par bya//
458a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni khang pa dum bu gnyis pa 'chags bkra shis pa'o// / de gnyis su sgro bting khang po phyogs snyoms yang 'ong bya// snga ma lto bur b+hi dir byas shing don dang ldan pa yi// khrus kyi khang pa sgo dang bcas
458a6(rgyud 'grel): ba dum bu gsum pa'o// // der yang de la sgo bltas pa yi khang pa dum bu ni// bzhi pa brtsigs te der yang bkra shis sgro mchog gdong bar bya// khang pa der ni bdag gi yo byad rnams dang mtshon cha'i tshogs/
458b1(rgyud 'grel): mi zad pa dang sngags g.yog blo gros ldan pa mkhas pas gzhag/ zas kyi bya ba rnams ni khang pa der bya der yang ni// byi dor ldan par brtag cing rtag tu nyi zla ldan par bcang // de ltar dum bu bzhi pa'i khang pa kun nas gru
458b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi par// bsgrubs nas rim pa mang por brtsegs pas shin tu mtho ba la// rdo lab lhag par snang ba yis dang phye ra mtho sogs kyis// rgyal po choms rkun la sogs 'tsho ba phyir phyogs 'gyur bar bya// skye bo
458b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam mang brten pas sdug bsngal kho na 'byung 'gyur gyi// bde ba 'byung bar thub pas ma gsungs de phyir mkhas mchog gi/ sngags g.yog dang ni sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gnyis las ma gtogs pa// skye bo 'ga' yang
458b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jug dang phrad dang sbyin pa 'du 'dzi spangs// snying rjes mtshon tshwa'i tshogs rnams legs par bshams shing gzhag par bya// de bzhin sgo shin tu dam bcad rgya dang bcas par gzhag 'di ni gnas kyi rab tu dbye ba'o// /
458b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas der sngags pas mchod pa'i don phyir me tog dag dang ni// spos dang til mar dri zhim rnams dang de bzhin rol mo yaM// nyer spyad rnams dang bgrang phreng yid du 'ong ba'i rnga yab dang // me long sen mo'i bzo dang
458b6(rgyud 'grel): spu gri thal gri dang // mchod dang gtor ma'i don du sha dang nye dang sha 'bru rnams dang // bza' ba rnams dang sman rnams thams cad logs par gzhag par bya// mdor na gnas dar gzhan gyi ngor lta mi 'gyur long spyod
459a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams// mthun par gzhag bya 'on kyang chang gi sbyor ba ring du spang // 'byung ba'i gdon dang sngags grub 'dod pas gzhan nas blang bar bya// dngos grub don du bkug pa ma yin bud med rnams
459a2(rgyud 'grel): dang ni// dkyil 'khor ma mthong mi rnams mthu yis rgya grags nyid nas bzlog/ sngags g.yog dang ni sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor che mchog tu// dbang bskur thob cing snying rje dang ldan brtson 'grus can//
459a3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dang ldan dpa' zhing 'jigs bral khro med nga rgyal bral// blo brtan dang ba gnas shing bdag la dga' 'dzin gus par bcas// bsgom dang dge la brtson pa 'di 'dra gnyis ni rtag par gzhag/ 'di ni rdzas dang g.yog/
459a4(rgyud 'grel): gri rab tu dbye ba'o// blo lhun gyis ni sngar bshad sbran pa rdo rje skyil gung gis// legs par bcas te bdag la myur du bskul ba'i bsam pa bskyed// bdag ni shin tu ring nas rang gi rnam par bslus pa ste// sngon chad don
459a5(rgyud 'grel): med spangs nas ting 'dzin bsgrubs ni 'di 'dra ba'i// srid mtshor 'khyams pa'i mi 'gyur bde mtha' gcig pu ny-id gang yin// 'gro ba'i skyabasu bdag 'gyur 'di la 'khrul pa yod ma yin// de ni bdag gis rang
459a6(rgyud 'grel): la bslus pa spangs te brtson pa yis// dam pa'i gnas 'dir nges par lha mo'i mchog gyur sgrol ma gang // phongs pa la byams ma 'dra de nyid nges por mthong bar bya// bdag ni bstod pas dag par mi bye skrod pa gzhan mang
459b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas// smad pas mi dgar mi bya bstod pa'ang gzhan mang gnas pa'i phyir// de bzhin 'jig rten chos brgyad ma lus bdag nyid mnan par bya// lus kyis ji ltar bzod pas skad cig tsam yang dman pa yi// bya ba rnams la
459b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas par mi bya ji srid bdag gos ni// lha mo mthong gyur de srid mnyam dang bsam dang 'dus par 'gro/ de bzhin tshong dang dmag dang las kyi mtha' rnams spang bar bya// yang dag gdams ngag bdag gis lha mo mchog las blang
459b3(rgyud 'grel): bar byas gzhan gyis nyer bstan mun pa'i mnga' 'dras bdag la ci zhig dgos// ji srid lha mo mthong bar ma gyur ji srid gnas 'di nus// 'gro bar mi bya de phyir 'di la lha rnams mkhyen par mdzod// de nas sngags g.yog dang
459b4(rgyud 'grel): ni sgrub pa'i grogs mchog blo can gnyis// sngags pas bros te 'od 'dra'i bsgo ba gsal bar brjod par bya// bdag gi 'dod pa yongs su ma rdzogs bar du gnas 'di las// 'gro bar mi bya lha rnams dpang btsugs khyod
459b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'di shes byos// de sring bdug gI yid dang mthun pa'i bya ba khyed kyis byos// dngos grub cha las khyed la 'ged 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// de gnyis kyis ni thal mo sbyar bsde legs par smras pa gzung // lha rnams
459b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang du gnas pos bdag cag khyod kyis 'dod bzhin bgying // dngos grub che la bdag cag dran par mdzo da la spang mi bya// de skad brjod de ji ltar 'dod pas rang gi bya ba brtsa mo// 'di ni sgrub pa po dang g.yog dang dam bca'
460a1(rgyud 'grel): ba yi rab tu dbye ba'o// de na sngags pas stan bde nyid la 'dug bzhin rab rgyas pa'i// gtor ma mdun du gzhag te de bzhin mchod pa rnams kyang ngo // de nas rang snying paM bskyed pad+ma'i dbus su zla
460a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba'i// yi ge oM las byung ba'i zla ba rnams bsam de steng du// gsal bya'i bcu drug pa nyid dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pas brgyan// zla ba'i dum bu'i steng na mkha' mnan cing mdog ljang gu/ stong phrag du mo'i snang ba ldan
460a3(rgyud 'grel): bsam de las byung ba'i 'od// mtshon cha'i dbyibs can 'phros pas bla ma dang ni rgyal sras bcasau// sgrol ma bkug ste mdun bzhugs de dag mchod pa gnyis kyis mchod// yan lag bdun ldan bya bas bsgrubs nas slar
460a4(rgyud 'grel): yang gshegs par bya// de mthar chos kun stong zhing bdag med lta bas gsang sngags ni// theg chen mngon par rtogs byed lan gsum par du bzla bar bya// slar yang mkha' la sa bon mchog bsam de las byung ba'i 'od//
460a5(rgyud 'grel): sgrol mar gyur pas 'gro rnams dag byas slar 'dus zhugs pa yi// yi ge yongs gyur ut+pal ljang gu snying pos sa bon ldan// skad cig nyid gyur sa bon las byung lha mo ma lus bsdus// rang gi gAn su thim gyur de
460a6(rgyud 'grel): legs byung lha mo ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ljang gu spyan sangs rgyan kun 'dzin// phyag g.yas mchog sbyin g.yon pas yu ba dang bcas ut+pal 'dzin// bcu drug lo lo ni rab sgeg gzi ldan pad+ma zla ba'i
460b1(rgyud 'grel): gdan// cung zad 'dzum bcas sgrub pa po la mngon dgyes thugs rje can// ma lus bud med rgyan dang cha lugs 'dzin pa 'di 'dra bsam// slar yang sa bon las byung ye shes lha mo spyan drangs te/ 'chad 'gyur phyag rgya'i steng
460b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas zla ba'i sa bon las byung ba'i// mchod pas legs mchod mtshang man ngag ji bzhin rang la bstim par bya// sku gsung thugs la gnas pa'i lha rnams byin gyis brlab// de bzhin blo ldan bu yis gyur pas
460b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur don gnyer bya// rtsod pa mi mnga' dam tshig rdo rje spyi bor byung // de ltar tshe gas legs bsgrubs rung pad+ma zla ba la// rnam bzhugs lha mo'i thugs kar sen zlum mnyam pa'i zla ba ni// rjes mthun pad+ma laM gnas
460b4(rgyud 'grel): lha nyid mthe bong tshon dang tshungs// zla steng bcu yi ges yongs bskor dbus ni sngar bshad nyid// ljang gu'i 'od zer dang bcu sti mgo rnams gyen phyogs gusal bsams te// dbus ma dang mi bcu po'i bdag nyid 'ong
460b5(rgyud 'grel): zer dang bcas byung // snying ga nas byung phyung phyi rol lha mo nyid gyur 'gro rnams kyi// sdug bsngal zhi byas mthun gyur sgo de nyid nas bsdu ba bya// 'di ni spro bsdu'i ting 'dzin nyon mongs g.yul las rgyal byed pa'o//
460b6(rgyud 'grel): de 'dra ting 'dzin mang du byas pas sngags pa'i yid skyo na// snying ga'i rnam 'phrul la dmigs gzhan sems rab tu spangs nas ni// dang por rnam par snang mdzad de rjes gsal bya'i bcu drug pa// 'og tu dbyangs
461a1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge gnyis pas legs par bsten pa ste// de rjes nyi ma'i steng du e yis mtshan cing gnas pa'o// de nas gsal bya'i bcu drug pa nyid u yis bcings pa la// phyed cha'i rta yis ma bsten pa'o
461a2(rgyud 'grel): de rjes sngar bzhin las// slar yang bcu drug pa ni us bcings ma buM e dang ldan// slar yang uSh+ma'i gsum mthar gnas pa'i gnyis par ldan// de nyid dbyangs yig gnyis pas brgyan byos rje su uSh+mA yi// bzhi pa pa
461a3(rgyud 'grel): ro gnyis pas sgras byas 'di 'dri'i gsang sngags ni// shin tu gsal min de bzhin ma yin sgra che dang // shin tu chung min sems gzhan rnam par g.yengs pa spangs pa yis// brgya rtsa brgyad las lhag pa 'am de
461a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nor bur gzung ste bzlas// gang tshe de yis bzlas pas skyon sa bon las byung ba'i// 'od zer tshogs kyis 'gro rnams bkug te man ngag ji lta bar// sngags 'dis 'byung po rnams la gtor ma sbyin bya phyag rgya ni
461a5(rgyud 'grel): lag gnyis thal sbyar mdzub mo dul gyis gung mi 'khyud byos te// mthe bong gnyis kyis snying por byas pa 'di yis gsang sngags mchog/ bzlas dang gtor ma sbyin dang bstim sogs phal cher sbyar bar bya// oM a
461a6(rgyud 'grel): ro mu khaM sar+b+ba d+harmA NAM A~Md+ya nut+pan+do trota oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ gtor ma phul nas yi ge brgya pa lan gsuM brjod na ni// bzod par gsol zhing yongs bsngo mngon 'dod dngos grub gsol btab nas// de nyid gsum mthar muH
461b1(rgyud 'grel): yis bskul bas lha rnams bzhud par bya// de nus ye shes sems dpa' mdum du rab gsal legs mchod nas// yi ge brgya pa rang gi phyag rgya 'dzin pas legs bzlas te/ bzod mdzod bdag blo 'khrul bswa ting
461b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin mchog las nyams pa dang / mchod dang gtor ma dman zhing sngags dang phyag rgya 'khrul pa dang // brtson pa dman zhing sems ni dam pa ma lagaso gang skyes pa// thams cad khyed kyis bzod mdzod grub par byin gyis bcu
461b3(rgyud 'grel): du gsol// de bzhin khyod 'drar bdag gyur 'gro rnams srid mtsho las sgrol shog/ myur du khyod kyis bdag la byams pa'i zhal bzang bstan du gsol// bdag la myur du thugs mchog rab tu brtse bar mdzad pa'i rigs//
461b4(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i lha mo khyod kyis bdag la myur du dbang bskur dang / dam pa'i gdams ngag bston pas yang dag lam bstan rigs pa nyid// de rjes mchod dang bstong pa'i dam pa rab tu gus pas gdon// de nas rang sngags
461b5(rgyud 'grel): swAhA gnas su muHsbyar ba yis gshegs// bdagro nyid lha mo'i nga rgyal ldan pas ci bder gnas par bya// 'di 'dra thun mtshams bzhir ni rab mnyam gzhag pa'i sngags pa yis// nyin cig bzhin du 'bad bla
461b6(rgyud 'grel): bsams na do yas nges par ni// zla drug de bzhin lo gcig nyid dang gsum gyi nang du ni// lha mo mtho 'i gyur 'di la the tshom mi bya gzhan du na// cho ga nyams pas bskal ba skar ma mnyam pas mthong mo 'gyur/
462a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni sgrub pa'i thabs kyis rnam par dbye ba'o// // shin tu khro bar 'dod cing 'dod chags che dang lhag par ni// gnyid 'byung ba dang de bzhin rab tu mi dga' ngu bar 'dod// bsam gtan kha
462a2(rgyud 'grel): pa spangs te gzhan du 'gro bar 'dod pa dang // bsam gtan gnas suM mi bzang sgra 'byung de bzhin sgo dag las// 'jigs pa'i sgra 'byung cho nges 'debs pa'i sgra dag thos pa dang // nang na gnas pa'i mang nas phyis phyir
462a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bod pa dang ni rgong // skyugs pa dang ni glu len sgra drang saM gol dab cing 'khun// shin tu mi bzang dri zhim pa'i dang ldang skyi bung zhes// 'jigs dang gzugs mi sdug pa mthong dang brdeg dang 'phul bar byed// rtag tu rmil mo sdug
462a4(rgyud 'grel): bsngal mthong dang 'dre yis gnon pa dang // shin tu dga' zhing mkha' la 'phur snyam byed dang rgyu mang rgod// glo bur du rno gzhan gyi sems shes 'dra smra rna bas thos// 'jigs par byed pa' 'ong zor khang par rab tu 'byung
462a5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang // dman pa'i man ngag ston pa'i rang lha'i gzugs ni mthong ba dang // mngon du stong nas shin tu gnon cing mthong bar byed pa ste// mdor na gang gis bzlas dang bsam gtan ngag gis bar chad byed// de bzhon blo
462a6(rgyud 'grel): ni lnga las nyams par byed pa de ni bgegs// yin phyir bla ma'i man ngag kho nas bzlog par bya ba ste// bla ma'i man ngag med par bsgrub la brtson pa de ni 'dir// srog dang dngos gru gnyi ga gdon chen rnams kyi 'phrog
462b1(rgyud 'grel): pAr 'gyur// bla ma'i man ngag can la bgegs rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing // 'byung yang blo can de ni zlog par bya ba tshogs dang bral// 'di ni bgegs kyis mtshan ma dang de rab tu bzlog pa'i rab tu dbye ba'o// /
462b2(rgyud 'grel): shin tu dri zhim dang ldan yid ni ngage lnga mngon dga' dang // lus ni rab yung gnyid no myo 'gyur khams rnams snyoms pa dang // shin tu sgra snyam pa dang rol mo'i sgra rnams grag pa dang // me tog char 'obab til mar bral
462b3(rgyud 'grel): bar mar mA 'bar ba dang // rmi lam na ni 'phags rnams mthong dang dge slong bram ze mthong // rtag tu dge ba'i rmi lam mthong dang chags dang khro dang bral// yid ni dga' bar byed pa'i 'od chen khang par 'byung ba ste/
462b4(rgyud 'grel): mdor na yid ni gang zhing lnga las dga' gyur bzlas pa dang // sgom pa dag la rab tu mi spyod 'drar ni mtshan ma bzang // 'di ni bzlas dang bsgom pa ji tsam gsal ba de nyid mchog/ 'di ni mtshan ma bzang po'i rab tu
462b5(rgyud 'grel): dbye ba'o// sman mchog bza' ma legs pa nges par dug tu 'gyur bya ltar// dngos grub len mi mkhas pa rnams kyis dngos grub phyir phyogs pa 'am// yang na srog gi bar chad dag tu'ang 'gyur bus de yi phyir// ma
462b6(rgyud 'grel): bas dngos grub blang ba 'khrul pa med par shes par bya// rgya mtshor rin chen len pa rnams la 'tshe ba rnams mang 'byung // de bzhini dngos grub rim chen len pa rnams la 'phrog pa mang // 'di ni gdon tshon dngos
463a1(rgyud 'grel): grub 'phrog brtson rab tu mang po ste// dngos grub rnams ni grub pa pas kyang bsrung ba rab tu dga'// de bas blo ldan 'jigs pa ma lus ring du spangs pa yis// mi bzang mtshan mngan pa thams cad
463a2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gcig par bya// 'jigs par mi bya khro dang chags pa rnam par spang bar bya// mtshan bzang rnams kyang sgyu ma 'dra bar blta bya rab rib bzhin// mtshan pa'i klung gos nges par mi g.yo mnyam par gzhag par bya// de tshe
463a3(rgyud 'grel): sa la lha mo yang dag zhal ston 'gyur ba ste// thun mong ma yin bde ba 'byung 'gyur gus pas mchod cing po stong // 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol gdab yang dag gang mas ngag don du 'gyur// ji srid gsung ba mi mnga'
463a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bad pas rab tu bsgrub par bya// gang tshe gsung ba mnga' ba 'bad pas rab tu bsgrub par bya// gang tshe gsung ba mnga' ba de tshe gzhan la ltos dang bral// de ni lha mo'i sras yin bsam gyis mi khyab dbang dang ldan// rgyal
463a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sres po sgrib pa kun tu dang bral ba dpal ldan yin// de yis dngos grub drang ni mtshon ma gnyis ka ji srid du// / gnang bar ma gyur de srong gzhan lha zur tsam smra mi bya// skad cig de nyid la ni dngos grub ring 'gyur/
463a6(rgyud 'grel): dran par bya// grub par gyur nas sdigs g.yog dang ni sgrub pa'i grogs la// dngos grub cha la ser sna bral bse sbyin pas phan gang gis bya// pha ma dang ni bla ma la yid de ngos grub rdzas ngag las// chos mchog skal
463b1(rgyud 'grel): ba bgos par rgyud rnams las ni rnam par bshad // mdor na dngos grub dag ni ji ltar bgo ba blo ldan gyis// rgyud rnams nyid las ji ltar bshad pa'i rjes 'brangs shes par bya// 'di ni dngos grub blang ba dang / bgo ba'i
463b2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu dbye ba'o// gang dag dkyil 'khor mchog tu dbang bskurar+ya ma thob skye ba dang // sbom dang dam tshig mi srung bla ma'i bka' las 'das pa dang // bla ma la ni mi gus yid kyi so bla ma la ni 'phya// / de bzhin sngon du bla ma
463b3(rgyud 'grel): dag ya gus shing lkog na smod// blo ni the tshom dri bas khyab cing brtson 'grus zhan pa dang // blo gros mi brtan nyin gcig bzhin du lha rnams gzhan 'dzin dang // sdang zhing bud med bsnyen bkur bdog gir byed dang de bzhin du
463b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed ma byas gnyis la dga' ba dang // shin tu blun zhing chags dang sdang ba drag ldan de bzhin du// sdug bsngal dag la bzod pa bskyed par mi nus sems stobs chung // cung zad slong tshig
463b5(rgyud 'grel): thos ma rab tu mi dgra' de bzhin du// cung zad bstod pas rab dga' rnyed pa la ni brkam pa dang // cung zad sngags kyis mthu snyems rma lam tsam gyis dregus pa dang // glegs bam 'dzin cing man ngag yod ces mi rnams la
463b6(rgyud 'grel): smra dang // phrag dag dri mas sbags shing man ngag med pa la ser snas bcings// stong nyid ston pa'i chos la sdang zhing dngos por 'dzin la dam// nyan thos spyod pa la no mngon zhen sngags tshul sun par byed// bdag gi phyogs
464a1(rgyud 'grel): la mngon zhen gzhan phyogs dgu la rnam par ldag// sbrulasags zhon zhing lcag gis gsung glo rdebs byed// chang 'thung ba dang 'jig rten gtam la dga' zhing zas pa banas// 'dus par 'gro
464a2(rgyud 'grel): dang dmag dang 'thab mo'i bya ba rnams la dga'// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du kha 'dzin phra mas 'chas byed// rang gis dpyad pas sngagaso tshul zab mo rnams la sdebs sbyor byed// bla ma'i lung thob med par sngags rnams 'am
464a3(rgyud 'grel): par kun du rtsom// bsnyen po kun dman zhing bla ma rnams la myur du man ngag 'dong // 'di 'dra ri ma yas gdo ga'i bye ma mnyam par rab bsgrubs kyang // dngos grub mi 'byung de dog phung po rnam par nyams par 'gyur// 'di ni
464a4(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa po yi skyon gyi rab tu dbye ba'o// gang gis sngar bshing skyon spangs de ni dngos grub snang yin te// de la blo mas man ngag ma lus sbyin pas phan gdags bya// des ni dngos grub ma lus myur du 'grub par 'gyur
464a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'osade ni sh+lo n+da rgyal ba'i myu gu rig 'dzin rnams kyi grogs// 'khor bar gnas kyang pad+ma bzhin du dri mas nyams mi 'gyur// 'di ni dngos grub snod kyi rab tu dbye ba yi// gang tshe sgrol mo'i rnal 'byor pa ni na
464a6(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur pa ni/ phyi nang 'chi bi'i mtshan ma ngag ni legs par brtag par bya// 'chi ba'i mtshan ma byung gyur sgrol 'byung las gsungs pa yi// phyi nang sgribs 'chi bdag srung phyir rab tu brtson par bya// 'chi ba'i mtshas
464b1(rgyud 'grel): mA snang yin de tshe sman mchog dag la ni// rtsa ba'i gsang sngags nang zhi ba dang spel ba btab nas ni// bza' dang lus byug bya zhing lha mo sku mdog rnam dkar bas// bdud rtsis yongs bkang rin chen bum pas spyi bor dbang bskur b+ha
464b2(rgyud 'grel): shin tu bde bas lus khyab nang rnams rab tu zhi bar bsam// sman pa'i spyad rnams sbyang bar mi bya'on kyang sngags mchod dang // dbang sgyur ba ni nang rnams rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mchog/ 'di ni 'chi ba'i dus las slu buM dang
464b3(rgyud 'grel): nad gso ba'i rnam par dbye ba'o// // de nas sbyin sreg tshogs zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang no// gsing dang dgug par 'dod na rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa yi// cho gas sbyin sreg rab tu brtsam bya 'di ni rtog
464b4(rgyud 'grel): par sla// char bcad pa drang dbab dang de bzhin 'tsho ba thams cad ni// zhi bar bya ba rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa sngags pas dpyad// 'di ni las thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i rnam par dbye ba'o// // de ltar sgrol
464b5(rgyud 'grel): ma la gus rnal 'byor pa'o// bsgom pa'i cho ga rnam byar+ya rgyas bshad pas// 'gro rnams sring mtsho las brga la sgrol ma yi// go 'phang la ni myur du gnas par shog/ 'phags ma lho mo sgrol ma bsgom pa'i cha
464b6(rgyud 'grel): ga rgyas pa slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogaso// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dul ba'i lha dang // bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus
465a1(rgyud 'grel): te gtan la phab pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshalo// rnal 'byor pa'i dbang phyug bsam gtan gyi khang par zhugs te// stan ba bya la 'dug cing // snying rjes chen po
465a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba thams cad gdon par bya'o zhes dam bcas nas// lha mo sgrol ma bsgom par bya'o// de yang rim pa 'di ltar byo ste// rnal 'byor pa rang gi snying gar a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge trAM bsam la//
465a3(rgyud 'grel): de las 'od zer lcags kyu 'dra ba spros pas/ lha mo dang rang gi bla ma dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mdun gyi nam mkha' la gsal bar bltas te// de la phyag 'tshal ba dang // sdig pa bshags pa dang /
465a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum lnga skyabs su 'gro ba dang // dge ba'i rtsa bi bsngo ba dang // lus dbul ba dang / smon lam gdabA pa rnams byA s+yA la// di nas don dam par bdag dang lha la sogs pa rnyeng bzhin med cing gdod myu nas mA skyes par
465a5(rgyud 'grel): bsam zhing // de brten par bya ba'i phyir oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra sA b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes pas stong pa nyid du bsgom mo// de nas paM la swa pad+me 'dang ma brgyad po'i dbus su rang gi sems nyid ston gyi ston lAmA gyi dab gI
465a6(rgyud 'grel): yi ge tAM las lha mo sgrol mo bskyed par bya ste// de yid sku mngag ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma phyag g.yas pa mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgyas gnas pa// g.yon pas ut+pal bsnams pa/ don yod grub pa'i
465b1(rgyud 'grel): dgu rgyan can/ sgrol krung phyed pas bzhugs pa// dza srid mI skye ba'i bar du bsgoms la// skyo na bzlas pa la 'jug par bya'o// oM t+tA re tut+tA re tu re swAt+ma/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi phreng ba rang gis snying ga nas phyung ste// yang
465b2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi zhal du zhugs yang rang gi snying gnas 'byung ba'i rim pa// sngags kyi kha dog dkur po ngal bus 'khorala'ikhar bor bsam zhing bzlas par bya'o// bzlasA paus kyang skyon mchod pa dang gtor ma btang ste smon lam
465b3(rgyud 'grel): btab la// lha mo'i nga rgyal gyis spyong lam thams cad la gnas par bya'o// nyal ba'i tshe stong pa nyid du zhugs te nyal bar bya'o// yang langs po'i tshe skad cig tsam gyis ldang bar bya'o// 'jigasu pa brgyad las skyob pa
465b4(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon mkhas pa dpal mar mr-i mdzud ye shes kyis mdzad pa dz+ro gas so// / rgyu gar swa puM swair+YA tAr stoH/ bod skad po 'phaDa ma sgrol ma la bstod pa/ rje btsun ma sgrole ma la phyag 'tshalo// lha dang lha min cod
465b5(rgyud 'grel): ban gyis// zhabs kyi pad+ma la btud de// phongs pa kun las sgro la mdzad cing // sgrol ma la nI phyag 'tsha lo// rabaM 'bar dra bas khyab pa yi// mnar med me yis gdungs pa lA// thugs rjes bdud rtsi'i char 'bebasna ma//
465b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma la yang phyag 'tsha lo// 'gro drug gnasu yun rings su// yang dang yang du 'khor ba yi// pu la dag la bde chen gyi// bde ba mchog gi ngal so mdzad// gzhin don mdzad po'i lha mo khyod// dran pa tsam gyis
466a1(rgyud 'grel): phongs spe lA ma// thugs rje brtse ldan khyod kyis ni// srid bi'i 'tshang ba las grol mdzad// dus rnams rtag tu sems can la// bu bzhin sgrom sna ba'i lha mo khyod// 'gro ba'i lo tog thaMng
466a2(rgyud 'grel): la// char rgyun 'bebs la phyag 'tshal// nyi sa zla ba ji bzhin du// 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi// mun po'i gdung po sil mdzod ma// sna mo mchog la phyag 'tshal-i lho// pad+ma thA ba su t+pa la// de bzhin dri med
466a3(rgyud 'grel): gdan stengs su// sku mdog sngo ljang 'gying bag cin// ut+pa pa laM bsnams la phyag 'tshalo// bskal pa grangs med gsum du tshogs bsags shing // bar du gcod pa'i sgrib pa kun spangs nas// bsdu dngos bzhi yi
466a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro rnams sted mdzad ma/ thugs rje dang can mA la phyag 'tshalo/ sku yi skyon sbyangs maN+Dan dang dpe byad ldan+tu/ g+hasmAd kyi snron+d+ha sbyangs kA lA pIng ka'i dbyungs// thugs kyi skyon sbyangs shes byA myatha' dag mkhyen//
466a5(rgyud 'grel): bkre shrIs dpal 'bar ma la phyag 'tshalo// ji ltar nor bu chu drangs ltar// lA m+bo khyod kyi rtag par ro// 'gro ba'i sems rnyog sel mdzad cing // 'gro don brten lwa phyag 'chi lo// glang gi khyod kyis mtshan
466a6(rgyud 'grel): gzung cing // bstod dang sgrub pa byis pa rnams// rtag tu 'bras bu yod par mdzad// mi bsnyel khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rje btsun ma sgrol ma la bstod pa// dI paM ka ra shrA dz+nyo nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
466b1(rgyud 'grel): N+ya gad+hA m+b+hi mkhyen pa de nyid dang // khyod k+Sha l+r-id+b+ha ba tshul khrims rtul byas bsgyur ba'o// / rgyu gar skad du/ Ar+yA b+hU s+yA d+hA na/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs// 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag/
466b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo// 'jig rten gsum mgon yum gyur sbyin yangs ma// sgrol ma'i zhabs kyi pad+mar rab btud nas// yIn ring bla ma bsten las gang 'ongs pa'o// sgrub thabs cho ga bsdus pa bshad par bya// yid 'ong gnas ni/
466b3(rgyud 'grel): la la ru/ me tog dri zhim gcal bkram te// spos kyi nyams dgar byas nas ni// de dbus stan bzang bde ba lo// srid pa'i bde ba yongs spangs pa'i// rnal 'byor can gyi nyer ba 'dug nas// snying ga'i sa bon las byung
466b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ 'od zer tshogs kyi bla mya dang // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// spyan drangs de dag mdun nyid du// mchod pas yang dag rab mchod nas// dkon mchog gsum sogs rjes dran bya// oM swa b+hA ba nI
466b5(rgyud 'grel): sar+b+ba d+hamas+t+ra b+hA ba shrad+d+ho hU~M/ oM shUn+d+ha tadz+nyA na badz+ra swadz+nyo ba At+ma ko haM/ de nas brtan pa dang g.yo ba thams cad stong pa nyid du rnam par bas mo// de nus paM lus byung ba'i pad+ma chen po'i dbus su rab tu rdzogs pa'i b+hU
466b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la yi gau tAM ljang gu bsams te/ de yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa// g.yon pa uta pa la 'dzin pa// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa//
467a1(rgyud 'grel): lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu// gzi brjid bzod par dka' ba dang ldan pa// zhal cung zad 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ sgra'i tshogs lhag par bcings shing zla ba'i 'od can// rdo rje skyil mo
467a2(rgyud 'grel): krung gis zla ba'i dkyorI mnan/ spyan pad+ma gzhon nu'i 'dab ma lta bu// cung zad 'dzum pa mdun nyid du gzigs pa'i 'phags ma sgrol ma nu ma'i dkyil 'khor mkhreng ba dang ldan pa rnam par bsam mo// de
467a3(rgyud 'grel): nas rang gi snying gi'i trAM las 'od zer byung ba rnams kyis ye shrIs sems dpa' bkug ste// yang dag par mchod nas uta pA la'i phyag rgyas rang gi lus la bstim par bya'o// de nus gnas ji lta ba rnams
467a4(rgyud 'grel): su rnam par snang mdzad lnga sogs pa rnams bsam zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang bskur ba don du gnyer te// bdag gi dbu rgyan lo gsung rdo rjes rgyas gdab par bya'o// de'i 'og tu rang gi snying gar
467a5(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge tAM lA sogs pa rnam par bkod de// spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim pas bsgom par bya'o// gang gi tshe skyo ba na/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA zhes byo ba'i sngags bzlaso// de nas gang gi tshe ldang bar
467a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa na rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros te/ des son tha~Md drangs la slar yang 'od zer spros pas de dag snying gar zhugs par lta zhing // de nyid kyis de rig thams cad lha mo'i skur gyur
467b1(rgyud 'grel): par lhug par mos par bya'o// de nas slar yang sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin rnams kyis gtor ma'i snod yongs su bkang la// oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Ad+h+ya nu t+ya ban d+hU twAt+ta oM AHts+tsha
467b2(rgyud 'grel): phaT s+t+waMhUM zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs la phul la// de nas ye shes sems dpa' mdun du bzhugs pa la dmigs pasi yi ge brgya pa yongasu bzlas nas legs par mchod de// mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos
467b3(rgyud 'grel): grub gsol btab la// oM tA rI tut+tA re tu re muHzhes pas gshegasu gsol lo// rim pa 'dis thun mtshams bzhir bsgoms nas sbyar bar 'grub par 'gyur ro// da ni srung ba'i sbyor ba cung zad bshad par bya ste//
467b4(rgyud 'grel): sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rtsa ba'i sngags 'bum phrag bcu bzlas shing sgrol ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas bzlas pa'i cho ga snga ma lta bu nyid las khyad par du bsgrub bya'i ming sngags kyi dbus
467b5(rgyud 'grel): ni gnas par bsam la bzlas pa ji srid 'dod kyi bar du bya'o// de nas sa bon gyi yi gre las 'od zer byung bas bsgrub bya'i lus thams cad khyab par bltas te// des lus rab tu tshim par gyur cing nye bar 'tshe ba
467b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang bral bar mos par bya'o// 'di ni zhi ba'i bsrung ba'o// de nas phyir bzlog pa'i bsrung ba bshad pa// cho ga'i sdo ma dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi snying gar tAM ljang gu 'od zer gyi phreng ba 'khrugs par
468a1(rgyud 'grel): bsams la// de las byung bu'i 'od zer gyi tshogs 'bar byas gdug pa'i lus gcer bu skra grol bar 'dar zhing skyabs dang bral ba'i snying gar zhugs pas rengs pa dang dman pa dang //
468a2(rgyud 'grel): rmongs pa dang / bcings par rnam par bsam mo// gang gi tshe de lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis skyo na sa bon gyi yi ge la dmigs pas gsang sngags bzlas pa bya ste/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sadz+dza
468a3(rgyud 'grel): ya/ mah+ma kA ru Ni kA ya// tad+ya thAHau tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA sarba duSh+Tama?/ pra duny+dzan/ maM kr-i ta dze b+ha ya/ staM b+ha ya/ ma hA ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+TAn staM b+h+r-i ni tA re swA hA/ sung ba 'di dag kyang thun mtsham
468a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhir bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du lAm du 'gro bas tAM bu nge 'dzin dang bcas pas mdud pa bor nas sngags dran pa ldan par byini nI chom rkun pa dang // stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / sbrul dang / nags kyi ba men dang
468a5(rgyud 'grel): chu la spyod pa rnams kyis brdzi bar mi nus te/ gang gi tshe 'jigs pa dang bral ba na mdun pa slar dgrol bar bya'o// de ltar yun rings bla ma bsten las gang thob pa'i// sgrub thabs cho ga 'di ni legs bkod
468a6(rgyud 'grel): pas/ sbrel ma zhes grags sras bcas bzhugs pa'i gnas// gru 'dzin dpal du 'gro rnams myur 'gro shog/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa'o//
468b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+ha ka ra barma dang // bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge sbyong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ tso ga ban+d+ha/ bod skad du/ chom rkun bcing ba/
468b2(rgyud 'grel): btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshalo// lam du 'gro ba mchom rkun mi 'ongs par bya ba'i phyir them pa nas gom pa bdun gzhal ba'i su nas lag pa g.yas pas sa spar ba gang blangs la// de nas rang skad cog gis rje bcu/
468b3(rgyud 'grel): mar bskyed la// skyobs 'grol dang sems bskyed tshul bzhin byas la// log pa g.yas pa'i sa de lam las ri bab tsam du bskyed// lhag pa g.yon du praM las rgya mtsho chen por bskyed la// dmigs pas de ring bdag
468b4(rgyud 'grel): la gnod pa byed po'i chom rkunu thams cad mdun du bkug ste// mi'i tshig gis bur ma mchod par sngags 'di brgya rtswa brgyad bzlas te// oM tA re tut+tA rI trai re Asma oM pa ka ra sarba tsA ra ban+d+ha swA hUM/ zhes bya'o// mdun gyi
468b5(rgyud 'grel): chom rkun pa thams cad rgya mtsho chen por thugasuM la~M/ g.yas kyis de g.yon du spros la ri rab kyis minan par bas mo// de naswa sa dI thu ba g.yen par bcings te 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i gnas dgril bar bya'o// 'gro ba'i
468b6(rgyud 'grel): dus su bstod pa la sogs pa sgrogs shing 'gro'o// chom rkun bcing ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa rdzogaso// / ma hA paN+Di ta shrI rat+na rak+Shi ta dang // lo ts+tsha ba zhang grub pa dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
469a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA tA ra tsar+ya yak+Shi Ni ma drA sA d+hA naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rje su spyod pa'i gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags mra sgrol mA la phyag 'tshalo// oM dzau yak+Shi Ni bI ra tsa
469a2(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ me lha'i bu mo gnod sbyin mo'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ dur khrod kyi spangs leb la bris te/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa// gocer bu ras kyi gos bsnams pa// mgo skyes li bi// gzhon nu ma rgyan gyis mdzes pa// shing mya
469a3(rgyud 'grel): ngan med pa dang bcas pa la ga pa g.yon pas gzung ba// lag pa g.yas pas ras bsnams pa// spyan sa bon gyi grong khyer gyi 'bras bu la gzigs pa/ zhal cung zad dpangs mtho ba/ bzhad pa/ 'khrig pa la sred pa// 'ong
469a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba spang leb la bris la// dben pa'i gnasu rang gcig pur khrus bya zhing bkug pas thun mtshamasu mchod do// ba'i lci bausra maN+Dal byas la/ gtsang sgra tho ba dben par zas gtsang ba za zhing thun mtshams gsum du b+ha gar
469a5(rgyud 'grel): sor mo bcug lA dro'i mdun du stong phyug brgyad bzlas na nyi ma mdun n+ya 'byon no// byon nas tsan dAn dkar po dang // me tog dri zhim blos spras pa'i mchod yon dbulo// khro mo ci bgyi zhes smra bar 'gyu ro// de nas sgrub pa pos
469a6(rgyud 'grel): smras pa/ kho bo'i sring mo 'am mor mdzod cig/ de nas gzung ste sring mo 'amo mar 'gyu ro// bdag nyid dang bcas pa'i skye bo bcu drug gis zas gos sbyor bar 'gyuraro// lus kyi khur gyis dpal gyi ri bi te yang khrid bde byed//
469b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa ste/ gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal mthong nas chos nyan cing byang chub kyi sems ma rmongs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin thob bo// gal te 'dod na smar dzam+bu'i gling nas 'ongs shing de dang rol par 'gyu ro// gal
469b2(rgyud 'grel): pe ki ma bdun gyis la grub na de'i tshe bdun phrag gnyis pa la tshangs pa bsad kyang 'grub bo// de nas slar ma grub na khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags bzlas te/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hUM phaT/ oM dzAM yak+Shi Ni bi re dzA swA hA/
469b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod sbyin mo'i sngags rang du bcug nas bzlas na// de nas gal te des kyang ma grub na skems pa 'am 'chi bar 'gyuraro// sngon gyi bsnyen pa gang pa dar gnas pa 'am 'dam phrag gsum bzla so// larigs ma sgrol mi
469b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i glu ning sbyin mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogaso// / rgya gar gyi mkhama'i byi ro tsa na'i zhal sta nus dang / bod kyi lits+tsha byA daR+Sha ma blo gros kyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar ska du/ sra gA d+hA rAs
469b5(rgyud 'grel): d+hA naM saustu ti/ bod skad du/ me tog phyeng 'dzin gyi sgrub pa bstod pa dang bcas pA/ bcom ldan 'dus mAM sgrol ma la phyag 'tshalo// mau shes pa rnams 'jo mas pa'i phyir// bcom ldan sgon+da maM phreng 'dzin gyi/
469b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa thabs kyi rime pa 'di// de nyid 'dod pa rgyun du bya// yid 'phrog gtsang ma'i gan su 'dug/ dngos saM sdigs kyi rnal 'byor bkru/ mthun rkyen mchod pa'i rdzas rnams ni// dngos sam yid kyis brten par bya//
470a1(rgyud 'grel): shar du kha bltas rnal 'byor pas// gzhan phran sems kyis lha mo bsgom// 'dam dkar zla gnas bzhengs pa yi// dpag med yon tan rgyan gyis spras// ston kA'i dbang po lta bur dkar// rang
470a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gsar du shar bus brgyan// ut+pa pal 'dab ltar spyan mdzes shing // dpral bar sin d+hu ra yis bkus// rna ba mgul rgyan phyag gdub dang // dro shal rked pa rgung pa la// g.yer ga sil rab tu mdzes// dgyes
470a3(rgyud 'grel): pi'i sku can rab tu mdzes// nu mar mu tig+na dro shalA ldan// sham thabs za 'og rgyan gyis be rgyan// smin mas ut+pal mdangs 'phrogs pa// rin chen gyis spras cod pan ni// 'dzam bu'i gser gyi stang na bcings
470a4(rgyud 'grel): ral ba ra 'od dpag med pas bA rgyun// 'di nyid yid 'ong mdzes pa ste// mthong dang brjod dang dran pa yis// khams gsum sems can thams cad kyi// snying gi sdig pa thams cad 'joms// gang zhig bcom
470a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das mA ru// skad cig pa yi rnal 'byor gyis// bcom ldan 'das ma'i nga rgya lA du// rgyun tu bskyed par bya ba'o// mchod pa'i cho ga thams cad la// sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs par bya// las kun byed
470a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags kyis ni// rnal 'byor pas ni bya ba'o// rtag tu 'am ni thun gsum du// 'dir ni gtsang mo'i khrus bya'o// tshangs par spyod pa gzung bar bya// gos ni thun gyi dus su spro// mi dag bcu po 'joms//
470b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya// mi dge'i lngas ni thams cad la// yid ni sbyar bar mi bya'o// de bzhin sgrub pa po yis ni// bcom ldan 'das maR+Sha rang nyid ni// dngosu ma byas bAr du bsgom// de la sngon du byed pa yis// man ngag dam pa bshad par
470b2(rgyud 'grel): byed srog 'dzin ma rig ling tog ni// 'joms par byed pa kho nra'o// 'di ltar AM li'i sbyor ba yis// gnyis med chu yi dkyil 'khor la// sgyu ma'i sa bon 'dzag pa yi// rgyun dang bcas pa blta bar bya// dag par mi byed/
470b3(rgyud 'grel): dr-i 'og tu/ dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i rang bzhin la// khi nA nyid kyi sa bon ni// nyi ma phyed pa'i 'od dang mtshungs// sgron ma'i rnam pa thams cad kyi// mi shes sreg par mdzad pa ste// phyogs bcu po yang sbyong bar mdzad//
470b4(rgyud 'grel): steng gi sa bon 'dzag pa tsan// bdud rtsi'i rgyun tu yid kyis ni// yun rang dus su bsgom pa'o// de las skye bar gyur pa na// lce ni chu skyes 'dab ma la// bla ma'i man ngag bsam par bya// dri nas sngags kyi phreng ba ni// rdza mkhan/
470b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo lta bur bsko// nor bu sngags kyi sto bsra kyis ni// de bAny+tsin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang // bdud rtsi gzhan yang yon tanaM stobs// rdza bra khronA par gzhug par bya// rgyun+da mi chad pa'i bsam gtana? du// rnal
