477b6(rgyud 'grel): gangar ldan byas bstod// phyag mchod la sogs rgyud kun gyis// mnyes bya gsol bya bstim par bya// gnas la gnas dang lus la bsku// snying dkyil 'khor lo phyag rgyas gdab/ shel dang bai DU rA ga dang // gser
478a1(rgyud 'grel): bzang las grub gzhal yas khang // gru bzhi sgra bzhi d+ha babs mdzes// sna tshogs rgyan rnams kun gyis spras// de dbus rdo rje lA mo ni// pad+ma b+hU rdo rje skyil krung mnan// brgyad gnyis na chod yod 'ong ma//
478a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum mtshungs med pa'o// da stu ldem skrag zhal 'dzum phyug/ bzhi ldan ralA gri ut+pa la dang // rgyud mangs pi wang skyeng mdzad brtson// nyi shar gangs rI ltar dkor wA// thugs dkar rab dkar shes rab kyi// snying
478a3(rgyud 'grel): bro dkar mdzes hU~MHyig gi/ 'od tshogs rab 'byams dkar skye bso// bum nang sgron me 'bar ba bzhin// sprin meng mkha' dkyil zla skar ltar// rnam dag 'khor lo 'od mdzad gzi// rim pas dbus nas mthar snang bya
478a4(rgyud 'grel): nyi zer gyis phye pid 'dab tshul// rtsa ba'i 'bru 'di snying 'dab kyi// dbus zhugs bzhi gnyis kha phye nas// gnyis gnyis nga re bcu drug brgyas// de spros ge sar ze 'bru phye// 'dab rgyas yi ge 'od 'bar bas// slar yang
478a5(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i bsili dngar blung // dAkAR+Sha 'jam snum mnyen mkhregs dang srab// yid 'od dri maso ma gos pa'o// zil dang R+Sha sning gi mun sel la// snying 'dab snying blo s+dza skAr+ya yang d+ha'i// TI la dang rgyus byed yang tshur 'od/
478a6(rgyud 'grel): rab spros phyi nang kun dag byed// ji srid ma yengs mi skyo bar// bdag gzhan mkha' khyab kun bkang la// sdig bdug yid kyi mun pa rnams// nyi mas mun bsal ji bzhin no// rtsa ba'i yi ge mchog gtsog la// g.yeng
478b1(rgyud 'grel): med 'bum phrag bco lnga bzlas// dngos dang rmi lam badz+ra gzugs kyis// lngas gsum phyi rol mthong bar 'gyur// de 'og pad+ma 'khor lo sgyur// dbyangs yig ral gri phyed mtshan par// skad cig rnam pas bsgyur zhing bskor//
478b2(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags 'bu bcu bzlas par bya// oM badz+ra de wI pi tsu pi tsu pradz+nyA badz+rA dz+nyA hUM// rang stong mun sel brtan pA dang // gzhan yid mun sel gtso yo ba yi// 'bum phrag gsum ni rtse gcig bzlas// skyugs pa'abo ngag gi dbang phyu
478b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// nang skye zla rgyas pa wa sangs// gsung ba sgron ma 'bar ba mthong // brdzu gsum gzugs sgra yid shes te// mtshon bya'i 'khor lo rtags gzhan yin// de nas sbyin sreg sbyin song bas// brgya rtsa brgyad mchod/
478b4(rgyud 'grel): blo gros spel// de yAMs tshar bcad rjes bzung bas// lnga phrag gnyis 'grub the tshomya med// rtsod drang dgra 'dul dug gzhi la dang // 'chi ba dag bzlog pa dang po ste// blo gros sngogs rig snyan dang gsu dang // klog dung sngags
478b5(rgyud 'grel): 'grub gnyis pa yin// yang na thob ma gnyis rtse mos// lhag ma bzhi bzhi lha mo gzhan// 'khor yini lnga gnyis dkyil 'khor mdzes// de bzhin gnyis gtso gzhan brgyad 'khor// rdo rje lha mo la gnas lce// 'khon
478b6(rgyud 'grel): la dbyangs ldan ral gri bskor// pha rol srog dang lce bskum nas// gsal byeng mgrin bkang brtsod las rgyal// mtshan mkhan thod pa dgra bo'i gzugs// mar ya ldan lo 'bum bzlas// gri mtshon gyis gtubs ro ras
479a1(rgyud 'grel): dkris// 'dre gnas sar mnan nges par 'chi// lhag pa'i lhas brgyan lha mo nyid// khro mo zhal brgyad phrag stong can// lcags kyu zhags pa ra? pa gri yis// bkug cing snun na shin tu 'joms// dam tshig
479a2(rgyud 'grel): lha mos yis kyi// lha drangs bum par bdud rtsi bsgrub// smani mtshams pad+ma hU~M thig le// rgyun 'dzag dug gzhi la dbyung bar bya// snying dkyil srokra yi ga rin chen sgron// rdo rje 'bar ba'i me 'dra gsal// a phreng ka phreng spel bskor
479a3(rgyud 'grel): gzis// gur phub rgyu 'bebs 'chi med 'gyur// ji skad sngar bshad lha mo nyid// de bzhin lha mo lnga lnga dgu/ sde gsum bdag gzhan snying la bsgom// blo gros rab 'phel gdon mi za// dpal mo mgrin par rgyu skyes dbus
479a4(rgyud 'grel): drung dkur g.yas 'khyil sbubs ltar bo// nga ro bcu drug gsang ba stod sgrogs// de myurA tsha dris dbyings dag thob 'gyur// gnong zhing rab gtsang bde snying dbus// 'ja' ris dpal be'u zer gsal bas// klog phreng rgyun 'dra
479a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i lce// rnam bskyod snyan dri dwags mkhan 'drar 'gyur// 'am skyes ri bo rdo rje yi// sbyor bas lce rtser tshangs yig bskyed// lha mo'i lcags skyes rdo rje ltung // de blung ka la ping ka mtshungs// b+h+rUM bi tsun ljags bde
479a6(rgyud 'grel): zla stang du// dbyangs gsal rdo rje ral gris mtshan// bro gar 'gyu klagos ye shes bkug/ ngo rgyun sus 'thungs sngags 'grub 'gyur// thun mtshams gcing zhing rab dkar zas// mngar gsil sna tshogaso btung bar byas
479b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bru gsum rang sngags byin brlabs la// bdud rtsi'i sbyor bas gtor ma sbyin// oM AHbadz+ra pri ti de wI sa pa ri wA ra A mr-i te ba l-i ta khA hri khyA hi/ ma mu sarba sid+d+hi hUM phaT swA hA/ 'jam dbyangs lha mo dbyangs swAnu ma// rab mdzes tshangs
479b2(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs blo bzang ma// mtshungs med snying dbus mgrin skyong ma// 'dod dgur bsgyur la phyag 'tshalo// bde ldan ngag gi dbang phyug ma// mi 'tshe mi slu tshe 'dzin mi// bag yod yid 'ong nor ster ma// tshangs spyod tshungs rigs ma
479b3(rgyud 'grel): khyod 'dud// dpal ldan dbyangs can brtag pa'i do nyid rgya mtsho mkha' dang po gter ltar zab cing rgya che sbas pa las// rdo rje lha mo ri dbang phung po sangs rgyas khang bzangs lnga phrag gnyis sgrub nyos tshogs dri ma kun
479b4(rgyud 'grel): byos la 'ad// zla zer bsil bas ku mu da ltar phyed de ya~M laM las dge 'od rin tshwa ni 'byar ba'i sgron ma thus gang thob des// me lus lus can rdo rje lha mo'i dbyangs snyan myur thob tshangs che ni nga ros sa gsum rnam par
479b5(rgyud 'grel): rol par shog/ dpal rdo rje dbyangs spyan mo'o sgrub thabs snyan ngags mkhan chen slob dpon zla ba gzhon nus mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rnam par bshad pa'i paN+Di tA mkhas po chen po
479b6(rgyud 'grel): bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA na dang // lo tsa be dge slong byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gor skad du/ shri ba su d+ha ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal nor rgyun ma'i bsgrub thabs// dkon mchog gsum
480a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshalo// phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol// dbul ba kun las sgrol mdzad cing // chos min sel ba mdzad pa mo// phun tshogs yang dag bstsal
480a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad ma// nor rgyun ma la rtog phyag 'tshalo// sbyin dang sbyin pa po ste gsum pa stong ba nyid kyi rang bzhin du dag pa chosna rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyi dag pa nga nyid do// stong nyid yas rdo rje'i rang bzhin pa nyid// de las ldangs
480a3(rgyud 'grel): nas rang gi snying khar pa ma yig gis pad+ma dang de'i steng du// a yig gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng de'i steng du tsu mu gi gis bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun mar bsgom par bya ste// phyag gnyis ma/ rin po che'i cod
480a4(rgyud 'grel): pun can// sku mdog gser mo zhal cig ma/ rol bya'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa// phyag mchog sbyin dang / bum pa bzang po ca no// oM shrI ba su d+ha ro haM/ AM yig gi zla ba'i dkyil 'khorA te// oM yig gis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro
480a5(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra pad+ma ho sto haM/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ gsumo/ oM badz+ra pa me Ta kle tha kr-i hUM swA hA/ gsumo// oM badz+ra yak+She hUM/ gsumo// oM badz+ra puSh+pe hU~M swA hA/ badz+ra d+hU pa hUM badz+rA dI pe hUM/ badz+ra gan d+he hUM/ badz+ra nai wi t+yA hUM/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra hUM// badz+ra b+hU me hUM/ badz+ra ya/
480a6(rgyud 'grel): k+She hUM/ ba suM d+ha re swA hA/ de nas rang go snying khar gnas pa'i tsu gi yi ge'i 'o da zer steng phyogasu yang dag par bkangs nas 'og ma ni gyis srid par gnas pa'i thog ma med pa nas grub pa'i thog ma med pa nas grub po'i bac+doMs ma
480b1(rgyud 'grel): no rgyun m+b+ha spyan drangs par bya ste// oM thI ka rid+ha ni ka ri d+ha n+ya ka ri a gan+d+haM ats+tsha pri swA hA/ gsu mo// u ke b+hu ke wad+bA NIprA wad+hAn+ti/ niSh+mA dAn+ti ba su d+hA ra b+hAn+na rU k+ShA ye b+hU d+yA pra tir+m+ma swA t+ma/ b+ho k+Sha naM pra tits+tsha s+yA hA/ A tsa ma NAM pra tits+tsha stAh+na/
480b2(rgyud 'grel): a rge pra ti ts+tsha swA hA/ dzAHhUM baM hoHrang rang gi gdan la bzhugs par bsams nas me tog dgod par bya'o// oM AHhUM swA hA/ oM shri ba su b+h+r-i rI swA hA/ oM ba su d+ha ra bi su br-iSh+Ti pi ta ya paM suM d+ha re swA hA/ dzU ts+tsha ba su d+hi ri s+yAH/
480b3(rgyud 'grel): lak+Shi ma b+h+rUM ta l-i na be sa ni ya swA hA/ badz+ra d+ha ra sA ga ra Ni go ShA hA ya swA hA/ Ar+ya a pA lo ki te shwa ra ya swA hA/ badz+ra pA Ni yak+She se nA d+ho ba tA ya swA hA/ i la di wAM ye swA hA/ dzaM b+ha la dzaM len drA ya swA hA/ tsi bi kuN+Da Te le ne swA hA/ ke li
480b4(rgyud 'grel): mA l-i nI swA hA/ mu khen dra ya swA hA/ tsi rin tra ya swA hA/ gu ba tang wI ye swA hA/ su gu ba ta de wI ye swA hA/ sha ra sA ti de l-I ye swA hA/ tsa ne tra ka ne tra do phreM ye swA hA/ ma Ni b+ha tri ye swA hA/ pur Na b+ha dra ya swA hA/ d+hA na d+ha ye swA hA/ bi shrI NA ya/ ba
480b5(rgyud 'grel): su Na nA ga rA dzA ya swA hA/ in tra ya swA hA/ ya mA yA swA hA/ ba ru Na ya swAhA/ ku be rA ya swA hA/ e ga na ye swA hA/ ni ri t+ye sI hA/ ba ya byad swA hA/ oM shA nA d+ho pa ta ya swA hA/ ai tiSh+TAM mA ma sarba satwa no san+ni s+yA n+ya hrir N+ye su ba ra NI ni d+ha nA
480b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ do ha maM de de pa yi swA hA/ ba su d+ha ri swA hA/ puSh+pa/ ba suMm d+ha ri swA hA/ d+hu bi ba su d+he swAh+na/ dI paM/ ba su ma ti pri yai swA hA/ g+ha ni d+hi ba su d+ha r-I Ni li swA hA/ nAM ba dA/ badz+ra pAl+li swAhA/ badz+re ba ye swAhA/ badz+ra dang sha na be lI ya swA hU~M/ badz+dziNA~M/
481a1(rgyud 'grel): pu ye swAhA/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ badz+ra swA hA saM gra hA ta badz+ra rang na ma nud tA ra badz+ra kar ma ka ro ti b+ha ba/ badz+ra d+ha ra ma kA ya Na/ badz+rA l+la s+ye hUM/ badz+ra mA la traM/ badz+ra gi sti hri/ badz+ra ne t+ye A/ badz+rI puSh+pe hUM/ badz+re d+hU pe traM khadz+ra
481a2(rgyud 'grel): A le ke tri badz+ra gan d+he u na ma te hU~M/ na ma mI hUM/ nu maM na ma hUM swA hA/ rtog par gsungs pa zhes pa la sogs pas bstod do// dbang med bdug gis mi dge bgyis pa dang // yang ni bgyid rtsa la rje su yid rang gang // de dag tham
481a3(rgyud 'grel): cad byang chub mchog gi ni// spyan sngar da ltar so sor bshags par bgyi// bde gshegs sras kyi tshogs gnyis zas dang // rgya chen 'gro bya ma lus pa yi don// sbrul byed dang de las gzhan pa la// rtag tu bdag ni rje su yi
481a4(rgyud 'grel): rang ngo // byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' dang gtang snyems te byams pa ni bu gcig pa ltar gnyen gshin pa'i rnam pa can gyi mtshan nyid do// snying rje ni sdug bsngal lam sdug bsngal gyi las yang dag par 'don par
481a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa nyid do// dga' ba ni sna tshogs kyi dge ba drang de rnams kyi longs spyod dang rab tu dbang phyug rnams la sems mgu par nyid do// gtang snyoms na rnyed pa dang mu rnyed phye dang grags pa dang ma grags pa dang bstod pa
481a6(rgyud 'grel): dang smad pa dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal zhes pa 'jig rten chos brgyad la sogs pa las phyir phyogs pa nyid do// oM swa b+ha ba shud d+ha sarba d+harmA swa b+ha ba shud d+ho hi/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba ad ma ko haM/ de nas
481b1(rgyud 'grel): sngon gyi smon lam gyis nus pas yaM gis rlung gi dkyil 'khor kha dog sngon po gzhu dang 'dra bas g.yogs pa'i ba dan gyis mtshan par byas pa yaM yigs gis brlabs pa'o// de'i steng du raM yig gis me'i dkyil 'khor zur
481b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa 'bar bAr mtshan par byas par mi yig gis byin gyi rlabs pa'o// bAmra yig gis chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po kha drog dkar po bum pas mtshan pas ba yig gis byin gyis rlabs par bya'o// lam yig gis sri
481b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa kha dog sor po rdo rje sna mtshan pa'i lam yig gis byin gyis bslabs pa'o// sumra yig gis ri rab gru bzhi pa ri po che bzhi'i rang bzhin rtse mo brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa/ hUM yi gu gris
481b4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje'i lta ba la gnas pa'i b+h+yo yig gis khang pa brtsegs pa bsgom par bya ste/ gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi bya rta babs bzhi yis mdzes pa dra ba dang dra phyed pas spras pa/ nong bu dang / rdo rje phyad pa zla tshes dang rdo rje
481b5(rgyud 'grel): po che rnams kyis sgo dang sgo khyud kyi mtshams rnamasu smras pa// bum pa dang ka ba dang rdo rje chen po dang // phyogs can gyi mnga' ya ba can// dril bu drang po ngan gyis mdzes pa// dz+r-i yabra la sogs pas
481b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par brgyan pa'o// de'i nang du paM yig gis 'dab ma sna tshogs pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad dang ze'u 'bru dang gi sar dang ldan pa'o// de'i steng du A yig gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ de dbusu tsU gos yi ges bum pa bzang
482a1(rgyud 'grel): bo'o// bum pa bzang po yongasu gyur pa was bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun la sku mdog ser mo zhal cig na// phyag drug ma rin po che'i cod pan can// rol pa'i stobs kyis bzhugs pa/ g.yas
482a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag dang pos gter ston pa/ phyag gnyis pas rin po che'i char 'bebs pa// phyag gsum pas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'chang rgya mtsho'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal ba/ g.yon pa'i phyag dang pos bum pa bzang po
482a3(rgyud 'grel): dradungs phyag gnyis bsu 'bras so bo'i snyem dang // phyag gsum pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'chang rgya mtsho'i dbyangs ni sku mdog se
482a4(rgyud 'grel): memo chos gos kyi gru 'dzin pa'o// 'phags pa spyan rasr-i gzigs dbang phyug ni sku mdog dmar po phyag nA rnga yab can no// gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje sku mdog ljang khu phyag na rnga yab can no// lha mo i la
482a5(rgyud 'grel): mdog ser mo rin po che'i snye ma 'dzin pa'o// chu'i dbang po dze ma b+ha la sku mdog sngon po ne'u lde dang / shring rtog bi dza pA R+Sha ka 'dzin pa'o// tsa bi kun Da li mdog dmar po lag na me tog can no// kA li mA la mi mdog
482a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar po lag na bdug spos can// sgo'o dbang po mdog ser mo lag na mar ma cano// spyod pa'i dbang po mdog dkar po lag na dri chab can// sbas ma mdog sngo bsangs lag na rnga yab can no// legs sbas ma
482b1(rgyud 'grel): mdog dmar mo lag na gdugs can no// dbyangs can ma mdog ser mo lug na rgyal mtshan ca no// zla mdzes ma mdog dkar mo lAg nA ba dan tsan+do// nor bu bzang po mdog dkar po ne'u la dang // shing tog bI dza pU ra ka 'dzin
482b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ gang ba bzang po mdog sngon po rin po tsho'i snye ma dang // bi dz+ra pU ra ka 'dzin pa'o// nor sbyin mdog dmar po bum pa bzang po dang bI dza pu ra ka 'dzin pa'o// rnam thos sras mdog ser po rin po myu gu dwang ba'i dza pu ra
482b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// klu'i rgyal po chu lha mdog dkar po sbrul zhags 'dzin pa'o// oM A hUM/ rang gi snying khar gnas pa'i hUM gyi yi ge'i 'od zer gyi steng yang dag par bkangs nus 'og mig gyi srid pa na bzhugs pa'i ye shes
482b4(rgyud 'grel): sems sA spyan drangs par bya zhing // sa ma ya se mya sa ma yaM ka ri mI hA sa ma ye swA hA/ lan gsum mo// zhabs bsil la sogs pas mchod cing // dzaHhUM baM hoHyis dam tshig sems dpa' dag ro gcig tu gyur par
482b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya'o// a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM sarba ta thA ga taM// dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni/ khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi// gnas la byung ba sbyin par bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/
482b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i 'dren pa'i cod pan te// rigs lnga las ni b+ha ba'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi cod pan che// ma hA mu ku Ta pra tits+tsha swA hA/ ti la ka bi byung / raNe swA hA/ ji ltar bsdams pa tsam gyis ni/ lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol lhar
483a1(rgyud 'grel): lU yi chu ni dag pa yis// de bzhin bdag gis bkru bgyi'o// oM AHA b+hi She kA sa ma ya shrI yI d+d+haM s+thAhA// sgrar yang zhabs bsil lha sogs pas mtshad do// slar me tog dgod cing sgeg mo brgyad kyi'o// badz+ras
483a2(rgyud 'grel): mnodA n+yAn ma ye shes kyi sgra tsan lA badrug phyag 'tshal// na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i yon tan yid kyi shing rta gsang 'i ma rdzogs sgrogs byu dang ldan ma la'o// 'di yi yon tAn+da g+hi gter dang gser dang rin+da pA che'i char dang sgrasA
483a3(rgyud 'grel): po'i nar 'phel dwa dang d+hi mAtsho'i ringan po N+DI'i phung blo dkyil 'khor pa dang bcas pa rlung gi lces sna rab tu ga'agrus par bya'o// oM d+hIm+b+ha s+yehUM/ sbru la nor bu bzung ba'o// dpral ba la gang ba bzung ba'o// kha la n+ya sbyin no//
483a4(rgyud 'grel): brla zung dag la rnam thos sra so// rkang pa gnyis la tsI bi kun Da li'o// gsang ba la kI li mA ri'o// snying khar zhal gyis dbang po'o// yan lag thams cad skyong pa'i dpung po'o// zhabs bsil la sogs pas mchod pa dpe
483a5(rgyud 'grel): me tog dgod pa dang sgeg mo brgya do// bsamu gyis mi khyab rdzas ni rtag tu 'phel che du dang / rin po dang du ma g+ha ser nI 'phel ched du// khang pa 'dir ni dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogas+yA pa/ dpal ldan nor rgyun ma la rtag
483a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal// bzlas pa dang gtor ma'o// oM ba su d+ha re sar b+he b+ha ya sha ru big shan ti ka re pra ShA sa re i ma g+ne hAg+ni hA o ma e ka ro mu khang sarba d+harma NaM ad+ya nung pan nad tring oM aHhUM/ a tse ma na br-i tits+tsha swA hA/
483b1(rgyud 'grel): me tog la sogs byas mchod par bya'o// rdzog s+ho// / 'phags ma nor rgyun ma la phyag 'tsha lo// gzugs bzang gzugs mdzes mchog ster ma// nor 'dzin byed ma nor rgyun ma// nor dpal dpal mdzad
483b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog gyur ma// 'dzin ma 'dzin 'jug 'dzin byed ma// skyabs gyur gus la gnyen gshin pa/ lha mo shes rab pha rol phyin// shes rab dpal dang blo 'phel ma// rigs 'dzin zhi ba phra mo ste// zhi ba kun 'gro rjes 'gro ma//
483b3(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma sgrol 'jug lha mo ste// rigs sbyin dbong phyug dbang phyug ma// brgyan ma 'byung bu'i yum gyur ma// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan byed ma// gdul dka' skrag mdzad 'jigs byed ma// drag mo drag po mchog tu
483b4(rgyud 'grel): mnon// lha mo sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin// char 'beb sa bzang po'i gzugs can ma// gter dang bak+ku shes thams cad drang // grags dang dpal dang snyan mdzad dge/ sreg ma gsod ma gtum mo ste// 'tshe byed ma mo thams
483b5(rgyud 'grel): tsad ma/ ga shin rje skrag mdzad drag nyid ma/ gzhon nu mA dang / sna tshogs gzugs// lha mo brtson 'grus phyi rol phyin// 'gro ba dga' dzad canA mA ste// dka' thub ma dang drug gzugs ma// rdzu 'phrul grub pa mchog
483b6(rgyud 'grel): ster ma/ skal bzang bsod nams skal pa ste// me thub thub pa pha rol gnon/ 'gro la gcig tu phan brtson ma// yul las dge byed dge ba mo// lha mo bzod pa'i pha rol phyin// tshul khrims bsam gtan sgom
484a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad ma// pad+ma can dang pad+ma 'dzin// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa me// dag pa'i gzugs can gzi brjid che// gser gyi mdog can 'od mdzad ma// yid bzhin nor bu 'dzin lha mo// shes rab
484a2(rgyud 'grel): glegs bam 'dzin pa mo// gter gyi phung por bzhugs mdzad ma// nor dang ldan tshad nor dga' ma// khams gsum dbang phyug chen mo ste/ lha yis rgyun gyis brgyad pa mo'o// sangs rgyas kun gyis yum gyur ma//
484a3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen khams kyi dbang phyug ma/ dngos po stong nyid bsgom lha mo// dngos dang dngos mad rnams spangs ma// gdul bar bya ba 'dul mdzad ma// sgrol ma nyon mongs gcod pa mo// bdud rnams thams cad 'joms//
484a4(rgyud 'grel): pa modas 'og tu bdun po bskyod mdzad ma// bram ze ma dang rigs byed yum// sbas ma phug tu gnas pa mo// dbyangs can ma dang spyan yangs ma// tshangs pa'i gnas pa ldan pa mo// de bzhin gshegs ma dgyes
484a5(rgyud 'grel): chen ma// rdo rje can ma rdo rje 'ching // las 'dzin 'jug tsong las 'dzin ma// sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogaso 'bar/ na gyi dkyil 'khor ldan pa mo// sems can kun gyi rtogs mdzad ma// byang chub yang
484a6(rgyud 'grel): dag thob mdzad ma// bsam gtan mos pa phun tshogs ma// gnyis med gnyis med bsgom mdzad me// don kun sgrub mdzad bzang mo ste// bud med gzugs can dkar mo mnon// sangs rgyas lam rnams ston mdzad ma
484b1(rgyud 'grel): ngag gi dbang mo ston ma che// srung mdzad 'dzin chad nor ster ma// bud med gzugs 'dzin grub pa mo// rdul 'byor dbang phyag rnal 'byor ma// yid 'phrog ma dang gzugs mdzes ma/ skal bzangs dga'
484b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ston pa mo// deng dpon ma dang brtse ldan ma// de bzhin gshegs kun bdeg nyid ma// lha mo chen mo khyod la 'dud// nor rgyun mo khyod la phyag 'tshal// mtshan ni brgyad lhag brgya pa 'di// gang zhig dus
484b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum klog byed ma// yid kyi shing rtas 'dod byas pa/ thams cad nges par thob par 'gyur// mtshams med pa dang cha 'thun grang // shin tu mi bzang las rnams ni// de rnams thams cad mAtshams mang
484b4(rgyud 'grel): po rjes su dran las zad par 'gyur// yod na tshul khrims phun sum tshogs// skye ba bdun ni dran pa dang // dga' dang tsha ga btsun gcags bzang ldan// mthong dga' bram ze rgyal rigs kyi// rigs ni
484b5(rgyud 'grel): phyug por skyes par 'gyur// mthar nas yi dbang thob nas// bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur// maung brgya rtsa brgyud klags pa yis// lha mo myur du 'gugs par 'gyur// 'phagaso ma nor rgyun ma'i mtshan
484b6(rgyud 'grel): brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas la gus rang bzhin g.yo sgyu med// sems na kun labyams shing stong par goms// rnam grol 'bras bur ldan la kun
485a1(rgyud 'grel): sgras chags/ byang chub sems sh+'us m+b+ha n+tu ban+d+han// shin du nags skyes gzugs mdzes pa// bla dgu ni sde ba skye bar 'du gshegs kyi// spyan dgas mkhan pa
485a2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam med rgyu che dang // tshe rI rig ste skyes bu blo gros gsal// mkhas shing blo gros mi sman na bcom ldan gyi// gsung rab la mkhas byede ldan spring rngan no// rab tu dngas 'gyur spyan dngags mkhan po dang // myur
485a3(rgyud 'grel): shes pa la gus pa nyid dang ni// bdag kyang skye bo dran zhing tshus khrims ldan// chos kyi bdag nyid nir ldan rab skye dang // bla med mkhas pa'i grogs dang ldan pa dang // spros ldan stobs spyan dga' zhing mang pos bkur
485a4(rgyud 'grel): rlu rnams sbyangs shing sems can la// su~M brtse zhing pos pa 'dzin pa de // bsam pa dag cing bzod pa ldan pa ste// de sringad 'jig rten pan zla 'byung ched du// sangs rgyas po com ldan gi 'phangs bzod gyur pa// hUM
485a5(rgyud 'grel): sring rtag tu yon tan 'di rnams ni// klan gyis brgyan pa bdag gis tho gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das sgyu 'phags ma nor rgyu ma la phyag 'tshalo// rtog par gsungs pa'i phyogs yi smye bgrags byas // 'dzin
485a6(rgyud 'grel): lnga tshigs tshig sa// ldeng phran thams da gang banying du mdzad sa mi/ 'jig rte gsus kyi ma sbyongs lus sa phyag la lo// rdzam khyod na man/ na chen kun rgyag
485b1(rgyud 'grel): dwe/ sems can dron mdzad nor dang 'bru rnams phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu// do shal cod pan ldan zhing nor dang 'bru rnams phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu// do shal na pan ldan zhing nor bu dpag bsam shing rnam kyis// 'ad+d+hen gsum gyi
485b2(rgyud 'grel): mgon mdzad nor 'dzin nor rgyun ma la 'dud// nang dang 'jigs pa'i 'chi ba'i skyon mang sgrol// dbul bi'i sdug bsngal rma yi 'tsho byed sman// skal bzang gzugs kyi ston rigs dang rus// thad sbyin mdzad khyod kyis zhabs la
485b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dud// gang gi yang dag bla mI'i cho gas yongasu klog byed na// phun tshogs yangs pa'i bad 'gro'i nye bar spyod pa ster byed pa// nor rgyun zhes pa'i ming can gzugs dri la ni dus rtag tu// mtha' dag sen phan par sems pas gus
485b4(rgyud 'grel): pas phyag 'tshalo// gang zhig yang dag dran l-i mi rnams long spyod yun ring du// rab tu 'phel zhing dbul dang nad dang sdig pasal mdzad cing // dpag bsam shing dang mtshungs pa nor rgyun ming can de lha ni// 'gro la pan/
485b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshod du gus pas spyi bos phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das mA nor rgyun ma'i sgrub thabs dang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyud pa drung smon lam dang bstod pa rnams rdzogasaso// / tshul 'di ni dbang lo sgrub
485b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas zhol phug tu// rgya dpe las bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan li phab pa'i yi ge pa dang bskul ba po ni dge ba'i bai shes gnyen rin chen mtha' can yino// sems can thaMd bde skying ldan par gyur cig/
486a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sid+d+ha ga ru Da ShA s+t+ra/ bod skad du/ mkha' lding grub pa'i bstun+da bcos/ dpal rdo rje mkha' lding la phyag 'tshalo// kha sbyar mchu b.rA sbrul nI bsdu mAs+t+ra pa yI// glade dAs kwa'i nor bu
486a2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' lding me long ste// gnyug ma'i gzugs mthong ngo me tshur skyes gyur ba'i// khro ba spangs pa de ni rgyal gyur cig/ mkha' lding bstan bcosra skyed mos 'o tshal nas ni// me trog rtsi yi sbrang rtsi de nyid ni// sems can
486a3(rgyud 'grel): don du sbreng rtsi byed pa yi// dbang ldan 'ang ku bdag gis 'dir de bAs+t+ra// gang zhig bstan pa'i sems kyis bla mA yis// rjes 'jug dag pa'i lam lwa yang dragra gnas// mi de phrinu las ma lus pa yI ni// dngos
486a4(rgyud 'grel): grub thams cad kyi nI snod du 'gyur// bzod dka'i dug la sde byung ba'i tshor ba yis// 'khrugs pa'i 'gro ba'i srog ni 'dzin byed cing // chos dang nor dang 'dod dang thar pa ni// bso nams byas pa'i 'gro ba de
486a5(rgyud 'grel): yis tho ga/ 'gro ba'i don phyir mkha' lding bstan bcos ni// dam pa'i skye bo de yis bsngags par byed// 'dod pa can ni nor gyis dga' ba ltar// sngags pas sbrul gdug mi bzad po yis so// de nas
486a6(rgyud 'grel): gdengs ka can dang rtsi te rnams// rA yi dkyil 'khor can dang 'dran gzugs sogs// rlung gi yon tan dus dang dus min dang // a ma rad ta sbyor rlung bus pa'o// mkha' lding gis bshad sman gyi
486b1(rgyud 'grel): nus pa dang // ji ltar dug 'joms pa yi rim pa dag/ gus pas des ni rtse gcig sems kyis nyon// gzhan dag kyang thos pa las byung ba'i// mtshon pas so// tI na in+d+ra nI la lta bu'i lus// 'dab rgya rgyas 'dras mtshan
486b2(rgyud 'grel): pA lhag ma can// nor rgyasA lus ni khwa dog dkar po la// mtshan pa pad+ma rgyas 'dra sngonA pau yin// shar thog nyi mA'i 'od zer lta bu l+ya// mgo la g.yung drung dung tshinra 'jog pa po// karge ta nri mun pa ltu bu yi// rI mo gsuM
486b3(rgyud 'grel): ni mgrin par yod pa yIn// pad+ma'i lusa? ni khwa dog ljang gu lA// ska tshogs lte bu'i thigu les gdengs ka mdzes// pad chen zla 'od bskus pra lta bu lu// mdung rtse gsum pa lta bu gadrengs ka yin// dung skyong ka naM
486b4(rgyud 'grel): yu ra'i me tog 'dra// mgrin par zla ba'i chu yis mtshan pa yin// rigs ldan g+hi ni spyi bo'i gdengs ka dag/ du bu lta bu'i zla ba phyed pa yin// dbyig pa yisa? ni brdeg pA mchog yin tre// klu rnams gzung nas
486b5(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa de ltar min// sdang baspu grags ni tshul bar byed pa na// sngags pa dgu ni glang gis thang bar byed// sa 'og gnas na yongs su gnas pa yi// dbang chen 'og gi klu rnams shin tu dkon+da// gdings ka
486b6(rgyud 'grel): nor bus mdzes par byas pa yi// khol po yang ni glog gi zer ma 'dra// lce gnyis gdengs can phuT ces 'jigs pa'i sgra// rin po che ni med par gyur pa ste// khol po yi yang khol po'i gnas ni//
487a1(rgyud 'grel): gus pa med pa'i lto 'phye dag yin no// a ku bA saM gnyis gnyis bram ze rgyal// me tog dang ni sa li'i dri yin no// de bzhin ta ma kA pa rje'u dang dmangs// mur dang ny+tsa'i dI ni bro ba yin//
487a2(rgyud 'grel): dug 'chang mche ba'i rtsa na ljags gnas pa// sbrang rtsi'i me tog phreng ba lta bu yin// de ni 'gro ba rnams kyi rmongs byed kyi// dug dwe yongs su 'dzag par gyur pas so// gadrengasa? ka can ni rang gi ngo bo'o// gan+da ta
487a3(rgyud 'grel): yA na'i yin par gyur na ni// mra go mjug lus la ri mo kyog po yod// gdengs kas dman no 'jig rten gan da ya// tsi ti zhes nI yongs su grags pa yin// de yis gzung na ga yo med skad cig
487a4(rgyud 'grel): gis// de ni 'gyur bI med pa'i rang bzhin yin// de nyid grub pa thobA pAs gal te na/ sad par byed na dran pa 'byung bar 'gyur// tsi ti'i rang bzhin no// thig btab lta bu'i ri mo ring po tsana?// ban da ya ru rnam
487a5(rgyud 'grel): par shes par byi// shing dang lcug 'khyilpA rtswas gtugs yod par ni// nges par shin tu leg so gan sA rA yil la// khwa skam+bi mig dmar zas dang stan mi 'dod// tsha drang 'khrulnga pa yI ni rje sa la rgyal/
487a6(rgyud 'grel): dkar dang dmararo dang nag dang ljang gu yi// ri mo meng pa yin no rwa yil la// gtso ma'i gser 'dra'i lus ldan de yis ni// 'gro ba rnams kyi srog ni 'phrog byed yin// rA yil gyis ni bzung na nges
487b1(rgyud 'grel): par myi/ rim gyis khyab par skrangs pa kho nar 'gyur// gser mdog lus de rgyu ba'i tshe na ni// 'bar ba'i me lce chad pasdu 'od ma bsreg/ 'od ma'i rang bzhin yang ni des sreg na// de yis gzung na ji lhur
487b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tsho bar 'gyur// rA yil la'i rang bzhin no// chu dang rlung me sa yi rang bzhin gyi// ko Ta rnams gang zhig mtshan pa ni// go med sa rnams su nI shes par bya// dug chen skangs 'bur yang drag bskyed pa
487b3(rgyud 'grel): po|chu yi dkyil 'khor tsAn ni dug 'dzin gyis// zin pa'i mtshan nyid lus ni 'dul ba yin// tsha dang 'dar dang skam dang skud pa ni// rlung gi lus can gyis ni skyed par byed// lus kun gyi ni spr-i yi
487b4(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba nas// sa bA gnag 'dra'i khrag gi thigs pa 'byung // me yis reg pas kun nas bskyed pa ni// thos dang gzugs dang mthong pra nyams pa yin// swa yi dkyil 'khor can gyis smras pa na//
487b5(rgyud 'grel): skungs dang tsha ba'i reg pa s+ye gdung s+yA pA yin// gnyid dung stan dag la ni sngang byar 'gyur// skyes bu sems la zug zer dag gis nyen// phung po la ni myur du snang 'gyur pa// dkyil 'khor can
487b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi stobs kyang snang // ring po yi ni ring por skrangs pa ste// nges pa nyid du mngo pos mang po'o// thal ba dang ni rus pa bshad pa 'am// gzhan yang lus las gang zhig byung ba yis// go med sa rnams
488a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni myur nyid du// 'gro ba rnams kyis lu sa ni nyams par byed// gang zhig stobs can yang ni la la dag/ mgo mjug du yang mes mtshan mes sra dang // yudrA tsam du ni
488a2(rgyud 'grel): 'chi ba de yis 'dzin// ngas ni 'gro bar 'chi bA the tshom med// 'dir nI mang du smras pa ci zhig dgroswa// des na snying po drang du blang bar bgyi// sngags dang smana? dang sbyor bA gang yin pa// ji srid dbugs
488a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyu'i bar du bya ba yin// dkyil 'khor can gyi rang bzhin no// gang zhig dran pa'i dug gis phye ba na// bram ze yin par gyur na de ni dkar// dmar po rgyal rigs ser po rje'u rigs yin// dmangs rigs nag po 'di
488a4(rgyud 'grel): dri rnamaso la'o// gang zhig bya rog rkang 'dra'i 'dud pa la// phye na Ti mo la byag po snang ba dang // mi mnyam thig las rnam par spras pa ni// nges par nag po brtsegasr-i pa dang nI tshungs// gzhan du bcud kyis
488a5(rgyud 'grel): len nI bsgrub pa lA// bram ze'am ni de bzhin rgyal rigs kyis// rje'u rigs kyi ni mdze nad gzhom pa la// gso pa la ni dra mengs rigasnga rung bar bya// 'dran pa'i mtshan nyid do// smad 'tshong sems
488a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis dor thabs kyis sems bzhin// bdag rgyun mi chad rnal 'byor yang dag 'grub// mkhas pas de bzhin rlung gi yon tan gyis// dus ni nges par shes pa kho na yin// srog chags rnams
488b1(rgyud 'grel): ni gang gis 'tsho ba dang // khyad can gang zhig nyams pas srog 'gro'o// dron dam zhing brtson de la sems dang ni// bdag dang mchog dang de nyid du mi 'dod// 'jug pa'i rang bzhin srog nAM kha pA yi// 'od la rten pas gsal
488b2(rgyud 'grel): por skyed par byed// bdag dang skyes bu'i rang bzhin de nyid ni// nyi ma'i zhing la brten nas sdud par byed// snying stobs rdul dang mun par babs pa na// dug rgyal dag dang the tshom myi dge yin// ston par byed de rlung gi dbye ba
488b3(rgyud 'grel): dag/ 'jug dang gnas dang dbyung ba nyid na'o// gtso bor chos sems pa na snying stobs te// ul-i la chags na de bzhin rdul la srog/ rmongs pa la zhes mun pas 'gog pa yin// gsal por chu nr-i shes par
488b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pra yis// 'byung ba na ni 'byung ba kho na ste// 'jug pa nu ni 'jug pa ston par byed// rang gi gnyug ma'i lus la de bzhin du// kun tu grong khyer gzhan la'ang de bzhin no// zla ba dang ni nyi ma'i zhing du rlung //
488b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyu bo'i phyogs su pho nya gnas nA nI// drug gis brtul ba de ni 'tsho bur 'gyur// de bzhin snying po'i khyim la 'chi bar 'gyur/ ma'o zhing lho rlung ni gnas pA me/ gsal khyer pheM nyas thung kAr bste sa
488b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // skyes bu rgyab nas 'dug ste yin na ni// nges par zla ba'i khyim la bzang por gzung // dug zhir 'gro dang bya ba gang la yang // zla ba'i srog gi zas 'khrig 'thab mo la// nyi ma'i srog ni mdzes
489a1(rgyud 'grel): so bi s+yA la// bab na rdul gyi char ni gzung bar bya// grub pa gzhan dag gsung ba gnyis kA yang // zhing du srog gi rlung ni legs par gnas// dbye ba rnam pa bzhir ni yod pa la//
489a2(rgyud 'grel): de la sems can ngo mtshar tsi yod pa// khyab dang steng 'og dbus su rU dang ni// yon tan zhi drang lha yi bdag po ni// don med 'khyam par 'thabA dang 'chi ba ni// dri khu ra de yis de rnams byed pa
489a3(rgyud 'grel): yin// skom dang bkres dang skyo ba dag dang ni// 'dod pa'i dgos pa snyoms pa rtse gsum gyi// 'gro ba rnams la rgyal ba'i dge bskyed pa// mi 'chi med na de byed yin mA yin// gzhan don byed na
489a4(rgyud 'grel): dka' ba med par nI// be+e dwer gnas byed bskyed yid ni tshim par byed// d+hI med dri zhimyA la ni mngon 'dod bzhin// gtsu bzang lha yi bdag po de yos byed// yI dgas mau dang ri 'dzin sgra drang ni// gan+d+ho sbyin
489a5(rgyud 'grel): sgo gang lag pa gnyis kyis sdom// don du mo thig le gang yin do dang ni// zla che rtse sprod dbus gnas mtshon par byung // nag dang li khri dung dang gser sbyangs mdog/ don gang smin pa da ni thob par
489a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// gang dag brjod pas dri khur rab dbye las// mnyan pa de dag rab tu thob par byed// mig dang kha sbyor ji lta bzhin du smra// dbugs 'jug 'byung ba kun nas ma nyams na// snying stobs la ni
489b1(rgyud 'grel): bab pa'i mtshan nyid de// rnam 'gyur med pas 'tsho bar 'gyur ba yin// mig gi sbubs ni cung zad phye ba dang // ma can cung zad s+yo yi phreng ba rnams// rmi lam bzhin du dug gIr+yas pa yis/ Sh+Ta yongs pas
489b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gags pa de ni rdul la yin// rma can gyi ni kha gdangs mig kyang bgrang // gsus pa 'jigs su rung ba spros pa dang // sen mo s+yo dang mi rnams mdog 'gyur pa// gsol poR+Sha ti mi yi mdog gis nyal//
489b3(rgyud 'grel): gang dag la ni log pas drangs tsam gyi// rtsa nas bud do mgo la skyes pa'i dgra 'byung po'i pha ni gang yin de stong la// de lnga the tshom yang ni dgos sam ci// 'thungs pa de yi mod la ldog byed de// sman
489b4(rgyud 'grel): dang chu ni mIng pra g+hang+ga yin le// srog de'i mdun+ta du rgyug byar byed pa ste// g.yo ge 'khor gyi ni skyes bu ji bzhin no// sa rtse'i bdud ci zhim po mA yIn dAng // rna ba'i sgra med mr-ig gi glog kyang med// skyes
489b5(rgyud 'grel): bu gang gi spyi bo'i du bA nI// mr-i mthong ba ni di nA sI bskyod pr-i yin// nyi mtshan mtshams kyi rtogs ni go bya ba/ ches por byas nas blor ba de yis ni// dkar nag dang ni gasngar gyi mdog can te//
489b6(rgyud 'grel): rman can gyi ni zla dang nyi mig go// zla dang nyi ma'i mig go snying por ni// go bu'i gzugs brnyan snang bar mi 'gyur zhing // so rtsi'i bdud rtsi dag ni mdzad na// phung po'i zhing las rlung de bskyong
490a1(rgyud 'grel): pa yin// sna nI rang gr-i gnas nas g.yos pa dang // mig ni mchi mas dkrugs dang shes pa g.yengs// kha yau rlung ni chu la bab pa dang // sna skad du ni smra ba gang yin pa'o// rlung
490a2(rgyud 'grel): gi yon tan gyi rab tu dbye ba'o// lus kyi cha ni gang lnga rma mthong ba// de 'dra de ru 'pho bar byed pa ste// mi bzang dus kyi dbang du byas pa yas// rna ba'i rgyab tu ri mo dma' ba snang // smas pa'i sa ru
490a3(rgyud 'grel): skus rgyu lA ltar mtho yis// dug gis zin pa de ni mi 'tsho'o// khrag ni sna tshogs mdog tu 'dzag byed cing // dwe ni bya rog rkang 'dra'i gzugs su stong // mgrin pa 'phong sde tshos gsang ba dang
490a4(rgyud 'grel): ni gnang // mIg dang snabya lag sor rnams kyi rtse// lte ba bshang lam phrag pa rked par ni// zin pa bstod nams kyis ni 'tsho ba yin// rma'i mtshan nyid do// gang gis khyim gyi tha snyad ma he dang //
490a5(rgyud 'grel): blong bu dang ni rnga mo zhon pa yi// pho nya ltasra ngan yin zhesu zhig s+yA// su la'ang de yis ltas ngan bskyed mA yin// ltas ngan bden par brjod pa 'di dag ste// yun rang shugs ni 'byin par byed pa dang // de
490a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin de ni rdul dag 'byung ba dang // po nyaM rigs gzhan dag ni yin pa dag phal cher sngags pa ma yin kho na ste// yan lag nyams dang thod pa can gyi gzugs// gos nag ngur smrig gyon pa nye bar na//
490b1(rgyud 'grel): 'i mgo la mar nag byugs pa 'am// yin na rdul gyi skabs la bab dran yin// rkang pa g.yas brkyang ba na 'tsho ba ste// phal char bud med la ni mtshon pa'o// rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang bas skyes pa drag/ srog ni 'gro ba
490b2(rgyud 'grel): yinu par mtshon pa yin// rjes kyi dbyangs med de dang sbyar ba'o// yi phan tshun sbyar dang dang po kadrI ma ny+dza yod tshig ni brjod pa na// rma can de ni the tshom med par 'chi// nyi mas rang gnas zhig bsregs nas no// 'od zer rnon pos sreg bzhin
490b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi gnas// de bzhin mdun na mo la dud par 'thul// lkog ma rnams ni dge ba'i rnam pa yin// dgos pa la na 'gro ba'i ched du nyams pa dang // nyams bzhin pa dang nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyogs// phyogs gsum
490b4(rgyud 'grel): ma yin phyogs gzhan rnams su 'grub// sbrid pa bya rog kA rA yi dang lce spyang gnyis// zangs dung la sogs sgra yi dus dang 'jom pa na// nyon mongs srog ni 'gro tshe phyogs nas sgrogs// dri khur rjes 'brangs rtog mkhas po
490b5(rgyud 'grel): ta yi// nyis ni bzang ngan dge dang mi dge dge/ dugo 'joms the tshom nyon mongs 'gro ba yi// bden pa 'di ni nges par mkhyen pa yin// pho nya'i mtshan nyid do// ma mo'i khyim mam pad+ma can gyi mtsho// shing 'dzeg/
490b6(rgyud 'grel): phug pa grog mkhar dag nas sam// khang rul dur khrod kyi ni lto 'phye rnams// chu 'am bzhi mdo yi ni gdug pa can// drag po'i gza' la lto 'phye'i dug gis ni// 'dzin na bzhi 'am bcu bzhi yin na 'jigs// de bzhin cha ni rab nyams
491a1(rgyud 'grel): gnam stong dang // tshes brgyad la ni bab par gyur na'o// ka ni ka dang ma g+ha a tra dang // kha ra Ni dang mA la bi sA kha/ sle sha 'phur gsum gal te tshes dang bzal// rgyu skar la zin nges par brlag par 'gyur// pad mkhris rlung na
491a2(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo mi dang ni// lto 'phye'i khams ni 'dra bar gyur pa ma// de ltar shes na chos mthun pa dang // chos 'thun pa yi dka' ba med la'ang yod// gnas dang tshes grangs dang gza' rgyu skar dang // chos mthun pa dang mthun pa'o// nyin mchin thun/
491a3(rgyud 'grel): byed dag la klu rnams ni// gza' yi dbang gyur dag ni long spyad de// nyin mo gang la de yi dus nyid// mtshan mo sgo ni rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur// 'byung po phyogs dus me dang ri bo dang // dus dang thar pa nyin mo'i dusu bsgreng // ro dus
491a4(rgyud 'grel): mIg+na dang thub pa dang ni mngal/ me dang zla ba mtshan mo dag tu shos// spen pa'i m+b+ha phyed snga ma b+h+ra ma yi// dang po 'das par+ya dgo smra pa'i sa yin te// ts+tshin mtshon 'pho ba'i mtshams ni gang yin pa// bcu drug po de rigs ldan dus
491a5(rgyud 'grel): yin// gnyug ma'i lusA la stu nan nyin zla ste// lag pa rna pA la regs skyes yon// sna la lug pas reg na gza' lago// mgrin pa la reg ste yi bla ma'o// dbugs ni drug tu 'byin na pa ba sangs// rgod pa na yang sen pe ru ni /
491a6(rgyud 'grel): sa la lta na sgra gcan nyid yi no// dus dang dgos pa'i dbye ba dang rags pa dang snying pa ste// dug zin gyi mtshon bye'o// nyi zlas sras gza' lag phur bu dang // pha ba sangs dang spen pas bskyed pa na// phyogs mig rgya mtsho
491b1(rgyud 'grel): dang bcu drug dang // sum bcu gnyis dang lnga bcu tham pa ste// 'gro bas rang dbang can gyi lto 'phye'o// the tshom med pa de yang shes pa ste// dgos pa dang ni bcas pa'i dug dag kyang // stong dang stong pa ma yin dbusu yang // srog rdul
491b2(rgyud 'grel): snying gi dbusu dal ba yis// rnam par gsal ba yis ni legs gnas na// gnas na gnas pas de ma thag tu ni// yun ring brgyal ba la yang mtshon par bya// gnyis pa'i phyogs rtsa bstan pa'o// spyi bo dag ni nag pa
491b3(rgyud 'grel): rlung yin te// mgrin pa lte bar mi'i 'bar bas dkrigs// de nas dbang chen ser po mkha' lding gi/ pus mo nas brtsams chu ni dkar po yin// brgya byin gyis ni bdud rtsi phrogs nos kyang // rdo rje'i mtshon chos dgra med dga'
491b4(rgyud 'grel): ba yis// mkha' lding dgra ni ring bar 'gyur ba dang // yid 'phrog thob pa de ni rgyal gyur cig/ gar gyi dpa' brjid gshog pas bskyod pa yI// rA gri rigs kyi ri rnams bskyod byed pa'o// mkha' lding du ni yongasu bsgom bya ste// ma
491b5(rgyud 'grel): s+yas ruk+ta rnams zhi budoni gluny+tsir bsgo/ rlung du bsnun pas sems ni phur bus 'a ba // 'gyur ba yis ni spel bar byed pa yin// sbyin gyis ni gus la rnyengs b+hI r+ya byed// rgyu zil 'byeb bris drug nI lpA g+h+ra paR+Sha ts+tsha /
491b6(rgyud 'grel): mkha' lding bye brag re re yis kyang ni// sil lo nges par bsgom pa dang ldan na// bu med de yis bu bzhin gnas na// ma lus dug no tshor gcod byed pa yin// a sti rbo mi brjod na du yod de// nA a sti gi raMs stong
492a1(rgyud 'grel): // kun na med// bsod nams yang dag bsags la mchog gi ni// de nyid 'di de bskye ba kho nar 'gyur// lta byed mig gsum 'bar bas bstan pa yi// dug mchog thal ba ru ni brlag nas kyang // la la dag la gal te 'di skad du/ mgrin sngon
492a2(rgyud 'grel): khyod brjod byin par gyur na ni// skyes bu de yi lus la ji srid ni// 'tsho ba'i bar du dug ni mi 'pho ste// ri bong mgo la rA ni skye ba dag/ nam du yang ni srid par 'gyur ram ci// gal te 'phrog byed khA na bkrag go myur bar ni// dga' ba'i mthar zhugs
492a3(rgyud 'grel): srog rlung 'gro bzhin pa// re shaM ga gsal bar 'gul bar gyur na ni// rmas pa de ni 'tsho bar shes par bya// 'byung ba'i rlung ni ning du rngubs nasu// 'phrog byed kyi ni kha drung ji bzhin blta// skye bo'i dgra yis dben pa'i gan su ni// sbas pa'i yul la yang ni shwe//
492a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// the tshom mam ni dge dang yi dge ba// 2 mi 'dra lhag dug gis brgyal pa la// phyis na pho nyi'i gos ni phrogs byed ni khru yi gcal ba la ni snang bar 'gyur// mkha' lding gshog tshogs gar dang ldan pa yi// klu gzugs de la rnam par
492a5(rgyud 'grel): gnon pa na// de ltar gang gson skad cig tsam gyis ni// gsal por smra ba dang ni bskyod par 'gyur// kha dang sna rlung rgyu ba bkag nas ni// skad cig tsam gyis de ni khyad par du// gdengs ka can gyis bzung nas brgyal ba ni// nges pa nyi du tshor ba
492a6(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas 'gyur// dug 'joms byed pa pad+ma rgyas par yang // srog gi rlung gis kyang ni byed pa ste// yang dag 'gegs pa'i 'gro ba'i snying po ni/ slob dpon gyis ni bsgom par byed pa yin// dug gi skyon ni med pa kho nar yang // gang dag gis ni/
492b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig gis// brgyal bar byas pa mkhas pas sen mtshamasu// sen mo yis ni sad par byed pa yin// dug zin gyis ni bsod nams sbyor ba yi// gang la thig le dkar po byung gyur na// de la gang dang gang ni brjod byas pa// de dang de ni
492b2(rgyud 'grel): sngagasu 'gyur ba yin// lus kyi yan lag dang ni dkar po la// gang gi sa gnas der me ni 'bar ba dog/ drag po yi ni rlung gis bskyod pa na// rmas pa de ma thag tu 'gyel bar 'gyur// lhag ma'i nor bu'i gdengs ka'i 'dab ma'i rtsar// sred med/
492b3(rgyud 'grel): bu bzhin rma can bde ba nyal// 'o ma'i mtsho yi bdud rtsi dkar po yis// bsgom pas dug ni 'joms 'gyur ba yin// gang gi lus ni dkar por sgyur byed pa'i// thig le dkar po drag ni lta byed na// stong pa de yi dug ni stong par ni// bsgom pa byas pa
492b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang ni shes par bya// 'phrog byed mig gi me ni 'bar ba dag/ rang gis bskyod pa gang gi snying la ni// rab tu 'bar bas rma ni snying pa la// yud tsa mo gyis ni de la rgyas pa bskyed// rigs ldan nor gyis 'byor dang ston can// dka' thub stong stob
492b5(rgyud 'grel): can dang rgan po dang // bud med meng la ni rab tu rgyas pa dang // bram ze dang ni byis pa bskyed mi bya// mkha' lding ser pos dug zin dag la ni// thig le yis ni gal te mnan pa dang // bum pa can gyi nyin zhag mang por yang // ri rab kyi ni mnan
492b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin g.yo ba med// dug gi zin pa nor rgyas dkar po yis// mjug mas mgul paro bcings te mi ltung ba// de yi mgo las gal te gzung nas ni// shang shang na mkha' na ni 'gro na yang // zla ba'i zhing du son pa'i nus pa ni// snying gi pad+ma
493a1(rgyud 'grel): phug nas pad kud 'dra'i// 'dzag pa gang la zag pa bltas nas ni// de yi lus la dug ni gang la ste// gang gi gnyug ma'i lus las nus pa ni// 'dzag pa yis ni rgyang ring gnas pa yi// ma lus dug kyang phig nas nges par ni//
493a2(rgyud 'grel): zhi bar byed pa de kho na yin pa'o// sbyor ba'o// 'ang ba ma dkar po rab rgyas rab 'dzag pa'i// kha ba'i 'di 'dra chu shel nor bu ra gzugs// mi bzang dug kyang dang po dbyangs kyis ni// bsgoms pas yang dang yang du 'joms par byed pa yin//
493a3(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yon du dbang phyug spyi bo'i rgyan// dbus gnas drug pa la ni thig les brgyan// dbyangs ni dug rnams sdud par byed pa ste// 'phrog byed dkar po'i khro tshur bcangs paso// sa 'og spyi bor zla bas dum bu ni// thig le dang bcas
493a4(rgyud 'grel): sgra ris spyin stong // u yig gi ni dbyangs la zhon pa ste// 'phrog byed dkar po dug mthar byed pa yin// spong ba dang ni gros dog 'phrog pa dang // dug bcings tshe long ston mo sa yi 'og/ ji ltar nges par bsgoms pas byed pa na// de
493a5(rgyud 'grel): lhur dgod pa yang ni shes par gyis// 'gro ba dug gis brgyal ba dag la yang // snying gar yang ni mgo med dkar po ste// gzhan dag kyang ni brgyal bar byed pa na// drag po'i rlung gis bskyod pa me 'bar bso// sa 'og gos gnas rlung
493a6(rgyud 'grel): gis drangs pa na// skad cig gis ni phyed tsam gyis kyang ni// myur du khros na 'phrog pa de la ni// bting bzhin 'brangs nas 'dod par byed pa yin// nyon mongs snying ga chud pa'i mi shig pa // bkug pa'i dug ki kong pa nan po ni// kun
493b1(rgyud 'grel): skar bcas gos ni bcings pa yis// nyin zhug mang por yang ni g.yo ba med// chos bzhi sprin nag lha yi bla ma dang // zla nyi pa ba sangs ni tshol shing ste// rtsis kyi ri mo glog ni 'gyu ba dang // gang por cho mor skar ma'i tshogasu ste// chos skur
493b2(rgyud 'grel): lag pa dbang phyug bzhin pa'i mig/ tshe lo mkhan po gnyis skyes mchog gi tshogs// dug zin dug las yongasu thar nas ni// chol res la ni lag nas yongasu 'dzin// de yis dug gi sa bzung ba'i skyes bu ni// rnam par dag pA
493b3(rgyud 'grel): da cig khyad par 'phags// gza' bzos pa'i lhag ma'i du su ni// chu snod bzung nas chu ni ster bar byed// gang zhig mthong dang thos dang gang zhig ni// nyamasu myong ba 'ang yul byas spyod pa ni// de kun sems kyis byed po gus par gyis
493b4(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'i dngos po dngos med 'byung ba yis// de bzhin du nI na ra yas smras pa// nus pa gang gis myur du thar skyed dang // des ni dug dang 'byung po 'joms byed de// zla ba dang ni nyi mar zhugs pa na'o// 'dus pa'i skye bo khaM yi sbu ba
493b5(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// nus pa ba mo ltang bu bab pa yis// rgod pa'i sgra yi dug dag myur du no// 'joms par byed de bsgom par byas paso// dug zin smra bas gal te yod pa na// rgyang ring na yang dug ni myur du sdud// snying gar ngango pa dkar po
493b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa ni// bdud rtsi'i snying po yongasu rgyas pa'o// bsten pa'i dug ni khur bu ste nga phrag kyang // rlung gis sngags pos dug med par ni byed// ngang pa'i bdud rtsi 'bab par gyur pa ni// zla ba'o zhing nas byung bas der 'gyur ro// lto ba
494a1(rgyud 'grel): spyi bo spyi gtsug go cha ni// mig dang lag pa lag sor sgra ldan pas// re re bor ba'i ring po tsheg drag kyang // drug po yang ni blang bar bya ba yin// nyi ma'i grangs kyi dbyangs ni sbyar bya ste// sa mchog srid pa dmigs pa med pas
494a2(rgyud 'grel): 'god// de ni drag po dang mnyam tshig btsan zhing // dug 'joms mi byed pa ni yod mA yin// sa mchog ral bskon pa gug rings dang // zla phyed thig lA yis ni mdzes par byas// mar gyi nying khus mdzes pa bsgom na ni// go na sa yi dug ni
494a3(rgyud 'grel): sel bAr byed// grang zhig 'bum phrag bdun ni bzlas pa yis// bi na ya yi bu bzhin sbrul du bzod// mi bzlog snyan dngags mkhan gyi rgyal por ni// dbyangs can gyi ni nus pa bsgom pa na'o// de nyid tsheg drag dang bcas 'char ka yaM// 'od
494a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis dkrigs pa'i skyes bu gang zhig gisra/ bsgo bar byed na dug dang mkha' 'gro ma// gdengs ka can yang khro zhing 'khrug par byed// snying la bsgoms pa yis ni 'gugs pa ste// dpral ba'i mthil du gnas pa dbang du sdud// yan lag
494a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog la btsud pa chang gi rgyun// dzu ba ti la 'bab pa kho nar 'gyur// kha yi sbubasu 'bab pas dkrigs pa yi// su ma rab tu 'bar byas dug brgyal ba// 'chi ba 'am ni 'tsho ba yang ni rung // bden par gsal po nyi du de yis smra//
494a6(rgyud 'grel): de nyid d+ha yi nang du chud gyur cing // pad+ma'i lte bar gnas pa bsgoms na ni// bdud rtsi'i zil pa 'bab pa'i tsheg drag bcas// dug 'joms pa yi sa bon nyid yin no// de nyid me yi nang du gzhag nas ni// nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od 'dras
494b1(rgyud 'grel): yade na gsal dkrigs// nges par dug sel rims dang 'byung po dang // dug gi khyad par yang ni sel bar byed// ka Sha sbyar ba dkar po thig ler bcas// ri dgas mtshan pa'i dbus chud pa ni// snying la chud par byas pas dug rnamaswa ni//
494b2(rgyud 'grel): myur du 'joms par byed pa kho na yin// dbyangs yig A ring yang dag ldan pa yi// yi ge de nyid mi yi seng ge'i steng // 'jigs dang sgra dang sdig dang dug dang ni// 'byung po nad dang dbul po brlag par byed// yi ge hUM phaT maM yi rang
494b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin can// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas dkrigs pas gsal byis pa// gang gis mgrin par bris pa yin na ni// de yis gsal por don grub byed par 'gyur// la yig mchog ni zlum por thig ler bcas// gos gnas bdud rtsi dkar po rgyun
494b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzag pa// dug gi zin la byeg tu bcug na ni// nges par dug gis 'joms par byed pa yin// dri khur nag po'i dbus chung tha yig ni// sngags 'dis dug zin la ni byin brlabs ni// skyod dang sgra dang gzer ba'i sgra dang ni// langs nas kun tu
494b5(rgyud 'grel): lta bar the tshom med// gsum pa nye bar bstan pa'o// dz+r-I krU ri Ni ku ru kul+le dang // be ru N+Da dang gser ri sa bon dag/ gang du dug gis brgyal ba byed pa yi// dbye ba der ni legs par mnyan par gyis// sang ngo bA ma g+ho rA de skyes bu// lnga pa
494b6(rgyud 'grel): de ru yA ni dbang ldan du// dkar ser gnag das na mkha' sor mor gnas// rgan lcug gung mo gsum la dz+nyo ka ri// yi ge rnam par spras pa dag yi no// bzhi pa lha ni Ni yig ces bya ba// ming med la na gnas pa nyid yo no// mkhar
495a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas d+ha dang wa sbyar thig ler bcas// dug zin ming yig dang por bar du ste// rgan po'i sngags dang sbyar ba dag gis ni// dbang ldan de ni mnyes na ma lus pa'i// dug ni de yi mod la zhi bar 'gyur// de yi skyes bu dang ni
495a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba ni// 'byung po'i gnod pa yod na mngon bsal 'gyur// 'jigs pa'i g+ho ri dang ni sbyar ba na// dgra sprul dman pa yang ni mod la bskyed// g.yon pa dman pas rengs pa phongs pa dang // dgra dang ngag dang dug dang dpung dag
495a3(rgyud 'grel): gi/ lugu g.yon zla ba'i dbus gnas tha yig chung// dz+haiM mnyes dkar po 'dzeg par byas nAs ni// tshe kun rdzogs pa de yis ni// dug dang lu ba rims 'bras mkha' 'gro ma// gdon dang 'byung po'i gnod dang che ba dang // nges
495a4(rgyud 'grel): par zhi byed yongasu bzlas pa'i chus// sngags pas 'gro ba rnam la de byed do// kha lo dz+nyAM yig lkog mA ra kI yi no// lte bar ri yig gra sang+ga Ni rkang gnyis d+h+waM// mda' drang nyung kar rma khya'i sgro sogs kyis// 'byung po la sroDa
495a5(rgyud 'grel): gnod pa 'joms byed de// dung sogs sgra la'ang ldan bdun bzlas pa so// bum bzlas sbyin sreg khri yis mchod sdong bsgrub// tsan tis oM yi kha la ku yin te// ru ni sgog mar ku nau nu preg tu// l+le ni gsang bAr rkang gnyis
495a6(rgyud 'grel): swA hA'o// stong bzlas skud par rnar brtag nagasu sbrul mi 'jigs// sa gar sogs bris khyi mo gzhag de mi 'ong // bi ri ma hA se ni tsa na ra dang // tsan tis 'bum bdun re res dbang kun 'grub// oM su waN+Da re khe kuk+ka ta bi gri ha ru paM
495b1(rgyud 'grel): sUhA// lag pang dkar 'a ba ban+d+had+ma dbus mi/ yi ge 'dren pa gzhan lha gnyis gnyis brtseg/ kha myo 'bab pas sman ma la bsangs ma/ ral bal 'dab ma rlung gas bskyod bzhin ljang // oM I ho m+b+ha s+ye b+h+re r+yAN+Da T+Te/ U I A b+h+rUM pr-iThA ri ya kar
495b2(rgyud 'grel): nAM D+h+we t+yait+ta mAn+tha Ak+Sh+No Sha/ hUM kA re gau Shan sr-i b+hA ba ra dzaM gA ma aM gU dza kit+tA ma hA ra hUM Ta swAhA/ lo baM k+Shi swAhA/ Shi sid+d+ha nA b+hU de bA ka ri Adz+nyA shrI shrI swar+N+Na shrI nI la ka NAM/ dzI bi pi la/ ri mi d+hI mi tr-i sa/ k+Shi paM k+Shi pi hi sa/ r+g+haM saM/ dzaHhaM sa rbA
495b3(rgyud 'grel): Sh+T+r-i/ dzi d+hU byA nA~M/ sa ya 9/ b+huM bru gnyis dang drug zin+da lha stsogs gau gso dang sngar bskyed bla ma'i man ngag bzhin// sdigs chab d+d+hi 'phro bo'i la me dwe ni// dug sil byed par yid la gning mi b+hU/ bi de steng bum bca'i sngags bdun bzlas
495b4(rgyud 'grel): shru paN+Dod// oM pa R+Sha swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang rig pa'i rgyal mo d+haho// swa rIs zla dkyil leg ma l+yA byA sam+b+ha pas kyang // dug sel bya rgod bshud pa mthong ba dang // skye blo'i sgyid stug bde ba'i sgra yi swA kyang // tsha gsum bi la'i sa ba
495b5(rgyud 'grel): spring rtsir sbyar// swA ri hUM gas so skyes sogs kyis nAd 'joms byed// tshor N+yan+ya shrIr shi'i rnga la ni// kha gnyis pags pos ji g.yogs byas// sbrul dgra'i rkang gis brdungs nas ni// ji srid skyes de drug 'joms// pa ni
495b6(rgyud 'grel): dza dang sU da R+Sha na lus btags kyang // Shi te pu nar na ba'i khu thud pas// me ning ka ko ti yi rtsa// ba mar dang 'thungs dug gsum sel// kan ta shor sha'i rtsa shun 'bras bkrus chur// sbyar ba e sha ra yau nya dag la// 'thungs na
496a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig drug ni thu ba yin// shu dag shing kun nimA pa'i khu ba dag/ snar thugs dug gis sgra rtse slebs kyang sel// ka ranA dza yi tsher can nim pa'i 'dab// mar sbrang yungasu kar gong nas yang sel// kha gnyis lus
496a2(rgyud 'grel): ne'u le yi mig+na/ sbrul dgA'i mkhris pa'i cha myany+dzam pa// khyim pa'i gzhag pas kyang sbru'i mgo 'gegs// shrI b+hA sa/ br-i rang ga/ u shi rA/ sar+dz+dza ra sa/ lpak+Sha b+hA lI lA ta ka/ kung+ga gr-i trI phA le/ Ardzu na/ ku su ma/ 'di dag /
496a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam du ba yis// lus skyes ce ri sbrang ma sogs// sbrul yang 'bros shing klu sbu bo gsung // me tog grong khyer zhes bya ba// brgya byin pho brang dang mnyim par// zla che zhes pa'i byab pa'i bram ze mo'i lo rgyus kyang ni
496a4(rgyud 'grel): lta ba yin// dpal mkha' lding grub pa'i bram ze shang sa mdzad pa rdzogs so// // su nA sa ga ra/ 'dir ni tha ma dam pa'i rjes 'brangs te// dpal ldan shang gu bdag gis mdor bsdus bris// dge ba de yis
496a5(rgyud 'grel): sring gsum ma lus pa// dug meng bdud rtsi'i glo 'phang bsten par shog/ rgya grwar gyi mkhan po dpal bram ze a ba d+hU tI pa chen po dpe med kyi zhal sbyarar+ya/ lots+tsha ba ban+d+ha pradz+nyA kI NIs bsgyur ba'o// / dbang phyug
496a6(rgyud 'grel): chen pos mkha' lding du sprul nas mkha' lding rgya mtsho ba 'bum phrag bzhi bshad/ de bram ze sang kus dbang bskur gyi tshe klu bdun gyi dug yod pa la/ 'jig po'i dug kham phor du mar dang sbrang rtsi byin
496b1(rgyud 'grel): pa mya yog/ bdun po kun gyi bu mo nub mo bkug nas chung mar byas/ 'jog po'i bkug pas mos phu byas pas dug gis zin nas shi la thug pA/ yul mi kun gyis khyed grong na nged kyi dug sus
496b2(rgyud 'grel): gso byas pas/ mchong sdong tshugs shig zer nas na mkha' lding gi mchod sdong rdo rings steng du btsugs steng nas rdo'i gdugs phub pa gcig byas/ khos 'khyud nas sngags bzlas
496b3(rgyud 'grel): kun dug zhi bar byed do// de lta bu'i shang kus mdzad do// // dus dang dus ma yin pa la lnga ste/ rma'i mtshan nyid dang / pa nya'i mtshan nyid dang / gnas dang
496b4(rgyud 'grel): tshes grangs dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / chos mthun pa dang / mi mthun pa dang / dus dang / dgos pa'i dbye ba dang / rags pa dang / stod+ha pa ste dug zin gyi mtshan nyid dang /
496b5(rgyud 'grel): dus ma yin pa mi 'chi ba bstan pa'o// / nyid dgos la gsum/ phrin las thams cad kyi snod du 'gyur pa'i dgos pa dang / sems kyi srog 'dzin pa'i dang / phyogs thums
496b6(rgyud 'grel): cad du grags pas khyab pa'o// mchod brjod dang / dgos 'brel dang / gzhung bshad pa gsum mo// gzhung la gnyis/ lus rnam gzhag dang / yan lag rgyas bshad do//
497a1(rgyud 'grel): a bkra ra ti \u0f7fkra D+hi da ni g+hA Na ti kA ra taM/ sa gzhi lci bas maN+Dal gru bzhi byug/ drung dang bu tsha bkrus la thug pa dang kha byang du bsnun/ rang yang khwa byung du
497a2(rgyud 'grel): bltas la dung la gu gul bdug/ gu yas g.yon gang du 'khor 'dod pa des ngos su ru ba bskor lag pa gnyis kyi bar du dung gzung / dug la kha gtad la sngags bzla bu tsha'i mgo la ma
497a3(rgyud 'grel): tog gtor/ rtswa rdzapa li tse ba'i phyag dpe las bris so//
497a4(rgyud 'grel): meHrnam ma ga tso rgyab / ma ma te ma tsha drim sa thamadas / da
497a5(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams stobs rgyas kyis mtshon mar gyur 'gro ba yis// tshe rabs du mar bsags pa'i sdig sgrib ma lus kun// dge 'dis dug lnga'i me lce chu yis bcil ba ba'in/ ring mi byang chub snying po'i go labang myur thob shog/ ces mi dbang po lnga bas sgo gsum tshig dril gyi smon lam btab pa'o//
